Es madre soltera y ese a sido el motivo principal por el que no ha podido comprar una vivienda. No tiene un salón de belleza pero ejerce su profesión a domicilio. De esta manera baja sus costos ya que ella visita a sus clientes. El trabajo es personalizado no tiene ayudantes y solo lo realiza cuando la llaman. Maricela nos comenta que esta forma de trabajar es provechosa para ella porque así cuida a su hijo y no gasta en guardería ni niñera. También vende productos del hogar los ofrece por su barrio a sus clientes. Su hijo asiste a la escuela fiscal y espera poderlo apoyar hasta la universidad. Con el crédito piensa adquirir cosméticos, tostadoras y olla para la venta. Su meta la cual espera lograr es abrir un local comercial para ayudar de manera económica a su familia y de esa manera devolver todo el apoyo que le han brindad a ella.
texts.en: Maricela is a stylist by profession.  She is 35 and lives in her parents' home, which is located on Trinitaria Island.  She is a single mother, and this has been her main motivation because she hasn't been able to buy a home.  She doesn't have a beauty salon, but she does her work in homes.  This way, her costs are lower because she goes to visit her customers.   Her work is personalized, she doesn't have assistants, and she only works when people call her.  Maricela tells us that this way of working is beneficial because she can care for her son and not spend money on child care.  She also sells products for the home and sells them to customers in her neighborhood.  Her son goes to public school, and she hopes to be able to support him through college.  With this loan, she plans on buying cosmetics, toasters, and pots to sell.  Her goal is to open a commercial location to help her family economically so she can return all of the support they have given her.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics, toasters, and pots.

loans.name: Mayra Isabel

texts.es: Desde Jujan recinto aledaño a Milagros conocimos a Mayra quien se dedica a la venta de ropa por catalogo. Como es madre soltera de 1 niño, inicio el negocio por la necesidad de brindarle un futuro estable. No le ha ido mal y gracias a esto ahora también vende productos de belleza. El trabajo lo realiza de 8 de la mañana hasta las 4 de la tarde de lunes a sábado el domingo le gusta descansar, pasar tiempo con su hijo y reponer sus fuerzas. Mayra nos cuenta que el negocio lo tiene hace 4 años y en ese tiempo no ha tenido problemas con la delincuencia y espera continuar así por mucho tiempo. Con el préstamo va a comprar ropa, es decir va a seleccionar las blusas, pantalones, camisas, mas pedidas en su catalogo las comprara y así venderlos posteriormente para obtener mayor ganancia.
texts.en: In Jujan, adjacent to Milagros, we meet Mayra who sells clothing via catalog.  Since she’s a single mother of one son, she started this business out of necessity to provide him with a stable future.  Things have not gone bad for her and thanks to this she also sells beauty products.  She works from 8:00 am to 4:00 pm, Monday through Saturday.  She likes to take off on Sundays to spend time with her son and rest.  Mayra says that she has had the business for four years and she has not had any problems with crime and hopes to continue this way for much time.  She will use the money from this loan to buy clothing, that is to say blouses, pants, and shirts.  She will place more orders through her catalog and then resell them to increase her income.

loans.use: to buy blouses, shirts, and pants.

loans.name: Celina Ana

texts.es: Celinda vive en Libertad, tiene 44 años de edad. Está casada con Carlos con quien se dedica a la venta de artículos del hogar. El negocio lo empezó hace 16 años porque necesitaba tener ingresos para su familia. Desde ese entonces le ha ido muy bien y el éxito del mismo está en que recorren diversos puntos de la cuidad. Su ruta más frecuentada es la conocida Ruta del Sol porque tiene bastante turismo. Su horario de trabajo lo realizan de lunes a domingos todo el día. El problema que siempre ha tenido es la distancia para la compra de la mercadería. Su esposo Carlos es quien mantiene el hogar trabajando como chofer gracias a esto es que pueden visitar diferentes puntos. Tienen dos hijos, la nena es especial y el niño asiste a la escuela. Con el crédito comprara bisutería, sabanas, productos del hogar.
texts.en: Celina lives in Libertad and is 44.  She is married to Carlos, with whom she makes a living by selling products for the home.  She started her business 16 years ago because she needed to have income for her family.  Since then, it has gone very well for her, and her success is due to the fact that she covers various areas in the city.  Her most frequented route is the well-known "Ruta de Sol" (Route of the Sun) because it has quite a bit of tourism.  She works all day from Monday to Sunday.  The problem that she has always had is the distance she has to go to buy her merchandise.  Her husband, Carlos, supports their home by working as a driver.  Thanks to this, they can visit various places.  They have two children.  The girl has special needs, and the boy goes to school.  With this loan, she will buy costume jewelry, sheets, and products for the home.

loans.use: to buy costume jewelry, sheets, and products for the home.

loans.name: María Gabriela

texts.es:
En la ciudadela Las Orquídeas  de la ciudad de Portoviejo se reúne cada quince días el Banco Comunal Niño Jesús De Las Orquídeas, esta es una zona urbana marginal donde las personas se dedican a diversas actividades.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora María, tiene 27 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen dos hijos de 3 años y el menor un bebito de 4 meses de nacido. Su esposo es guardia de seguridad. Ella es licenciada en Ciencias De la Educación.

Nuestra amiga con la intención de ganar algo por su cuenta y con esto poder salir adelante en el hogar ya que a su esposo no le alcanza, se dedica a la docencia pues da clases en un colegio particular de su localidad, pero además de esto también se dedica al comercio, vende ropa de todo tipo y su forma de  venta es puerta a puerta y también vende su lugar de trabajo ya que sus compañeras y madres de familia son sus mejores clientes, además por las noches ella realiza sus recorridos vendiendo y cobrando ya que  deja a crédito a sus clientes  y cobra cada 8 días. Su mercadería  la va a comprar a  Guayaquil cada vez que necesita. Tiene 4 años que se dedica a esta actividad y le va muy bien.

Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar más mercadería como: pantalones, blusas, camisetas, ropa de niños, entre otras prendas. Está en el Banco Comunal desde hace 2 años  y le gusta porque el grupo es muy responsable. 

Sus sueños son darles lo mejor a sus hijos y tener un nombramiento en un colegio del Estado.
texts.en:
In the Las Orquideas district of the city of Portoviejo, the communal bank Niño Jesús de Las Orquídeas meets every two weeks. This is an area on the edge of the urban zone, where the people work in a variety of activities.

Here we meet Señora Maria. She is 27 years old. She is married, and she and her husband have two children, a three-year-old and a 4-month-old baby. Her husband is a security guard. She has a degree in education.

Our friend, with the intention of earning something on her own and using it to be able to get ahead in her household, since her husband cannot achieve this, works in teaching. She gives classes at a private school in her neighborhood. But in addition to this, she also has a business. She sells clothing of all types, and her form of sales is door to door. She also sells at her workplace, since her coworkers and the mothers of the families are good customers. In addition, in the evening she makes her rounds, selling and collecting, since she leaves things with her customers on credit and collects every week. She goes to Guayaquil to buy her merchandise whenever she needs to. She has been working in this business for 4 years, and it is going very well for her.

She is going to use this loan to buy more merchandise such as pants, blouses, t-shirts, and children's clothes, among other items. She has been in her communal bank for 2 years, and she likes it because the group is very responsible.

Her dreams are to give the best to her children and to have an appointment to a state school.

loans.use: to buy pants, blouses, t-shirts, children's clothes, and other articles of clothing to sell

loans.name: Mitzi Asuncion

texts.es:
Picoaza consta en los libros como uno de los pueblos aborígenes parte de la cultura manteña, esta parroquia urbana situada a tan solo diez minutos de la ciudad de Portoviejo capital manabita está llena de muchas historias, aquí se reúnen cada quince días las socias del Banco Comunal María Asunción.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Mitzi, tiene 38 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos de  18, 12 y 5 años de edad,  los dos mayores  estudian en colegio y el menor en escuela. Su esposo es albañil.

Nuestra amiga  tiene una tienda en su casa, allí vende productos  como arroz, azúcar, aceites, detergentes, entre otras cosas, además también vende productos de papelería y bazar, realiza recargas y venta de tarjetas telefónicas,  trabaja todos los días desde las 6h00 hasta las 20h00 y a veces hasta más tarde, sus hijos y su esposo le ayudan cuando están desocupados, tiene su negocio 15 años y dice que  le ha ido bien. Con la ganancia que ha tenido lo ha ido utilizando en construir su casa la misma que aun no termina por completo.

Ella está repitiendo el crédito y nos cuenta le fue bastante bien, con el crédito que recibió ella surtió mas su negocio y con las ganancias que le quedaron  pudo mejorar mas su casa ya que ese es su sueños y espera seguir contando con la ayuda de los créditos para por fin terminar por completo su casa. Este crédito al igual que el anterior es para  surtir más su tienda, va a comprar arroz, azúcar, aceite, ropa y útiles escolares. Lleva 10 más de años en el  Banco Comunal y le gusta por la ayuda que siempre le dan los créditos.
texts.en:
Picoaza is described in books as one of the indigenous towns that is part of the Manteño culture. This urban parish is situated only ten minutes away from the city of Portoviejo, the capital of Manabí Province, a place filled with many stories. It is here that the members of the María Asunción Communal bank meet every 15 days.

It is in this place where one can meet Sra. Mitzi. She is 38 years old, married, and has three children (ages 18, 12, and 5). The two older children are in high school and the youngest is in elementary school. Her husband is a bricklayer.

Mitzi has a store in her home where she sell products such as rice, sugar, oil, detergents, and other items. In addition, she offers stationery and bazaar products, and engages in the recharging and sale of phone cards. Mitzi works every day from 6am to 8pm, and sometimes much later. Her children and her husband help out when they are not busy. She has been in business for 15 years and says that she is doing well. With the earnings she accumulated, she was able to build a house although the construction has not yet been completed.

Mitzi is repeating the loan process and says that things are doing well. With this loan she will be receiving, she will restock her business even more. Her profits will allow her to make additional improvements to her house. Her hopes and dreams are to continue with the help of the loans until her house is finally completed. This loan will be used in the same manner as the previous one. She will restock her store by purchasing rice, sugar, oil, clothing, and school supplies. Mitzi has been with her Communal Bank for more than 10 years and enjoys the help she has always received through the loans.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, oil, clothing, and school supplies.

loans.name: Ana María

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Virgen Del Rosario se reúne cada quince días en Colorado del Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. En este sitio la mayoría de los habitantes se dedican a la fabricación de botones de tagua, artesanía y comercio en general.

En este lugar vive la señora Ana María, tiene 27 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene cincos hijos de 10, 8, 6, 5 años  y el menor de apenas 7 meses de nacido, los 4 mayores  estudian en escuela. El marido es obrero. 
 
Nuestra amiga es una muy buena madre y esposa que para lograr ganar algo y con esto ayudar a su marido con los gastos del hogar se dedica a la elaboración y venta de harina de pescado. Trabaja de lunes a viernes en la elaboración de este producto, nos cuenta que ella se desplaza a Manta para comprar el pescado que no se utilizan para fabricar el atún, para luego trasladarlos hasta su casa y procesarlos hasta hacer la harina de pescado, la misma que luego entrega a comerciantes que la exportan al extranjero donde este producto es muy utilizado. Ella lleva más de 9 años en esta actividad y le ha ido bien.

Este crédito es para comprar pescado para  elaborar la harina. Está  en el Banco Comunal desde hace 5 ciclos y le gusta porque con los créditos ha podido salir de situaciones muy difíciles en su negocio por lo cual está muy agradecida con la institución.
 
Su sueño es darles lo mejor a sus pequeños hijos.
texts.en:
The communal bank, "Virgen del Rosario," meets every fifteen days in Colorado in the canton of Montecristi, which is known for its rich pre-colonial culture and its artisanry, which is recognized at the national and international level.  In this area, the majority of people make a living by making buttons from Tagua nuts, artisanry, and general business.

Ana María lives here.  She is 27 and lives in a common-law marriage, from which she has 5 children, who are 10, 8, 6, 5, and 7 months.  The 4 oldest are in school.  Her husband is a worker.

Our friend is a good mother and wife.  To earn some money and to help her husband with their home's expenses, she makes and sells fish meal.  She works from Monday through Friday to make this product.  She tells us that she goes to Manta to buy the fish that they don't use when they process tuna, then takes them home to make them into fish meal.  She then delivers it to merchants who export it to other countries where this product is used a lot.  She has done this work for more than 9 years, and it has gone very well for her.

This loan is to buy fish to make the fish meal.  She has been with her communal bank for 5 loans, and she likes it because the loans have let her come out of some difficult situations with her business, for which she is very grateful to the institution.

Her dream is to give the best to her small children.

loans.use: to buy fish.

loans.name: Karina Rocio

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Virgen Del Rosario que se reúne cada quince días en Colorado del Cantón Montecristi , conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. En este sitio la mayoría de los habitantes se dedican a la fabricación de botones de tagua, artesanía y comercio en general.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Karina, tiene 29 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos de  10, 7 y 2 años  de edad, los dos mayores estudian en escuela. Su esposo es obrero y trabaja en una fábrica en Montecristi.

Nuestra amiga es una muy buena ama de casa que para generar sus propios ingresos hace 16 años se dedica a la fabricación de botones hechos en tagua, para lo cual  tiene un torno (máquina para cortar tagua) con la que se elaboran los botones pero en forma cruda, producto que entrega en Manta a comerciantes al por mayor para que estos los envíen al extranjero para que sean terminados. Trabaja todos los días de la semana con la ayuda de su hermana en ciertas ocasiones desde las  08h00 hasta las 12h00, y de 14h00 a 17h00, comparte su tiempo entre su trabajo, su casa y el cuidado y ayuda que tiene que brindarles a sus pequeños hijos.
 
Este crédito lo va a utilizar en comprar tagua que es la  materia prima para la fabricación de los botones. Está en el Banco desde el principio, es la presidenta del mismo y le gusta por las facilidades de pago.
 
Su sueño es tener una fábrica grande con mayor tecnología.
texts.en:
The Virgen del Rosario Village Bank meets every 15 days in Colorado in the canton of Montecristi, known for its rich pre-colonial culture and for their crafts that are recognized around the country and the world. Here the majority of the inhabitants dedicate themselves to making buttons out of tagua [ivory palm nut], artisan crafts, and commerce in general.

Here we meet Karina, 29, who is married and has three children ages 10, 7 and 2. The older two are in school. Her husband works in a factory in Montecristi.

Our friend is a wonderful housewife who, in order to generate her own income, started a business 16 years ago crafting buttons from tagua. She uses a special lathe to cut the tagua and make the unfinished buttons. She sells the product in bulk to merchants in Manta and they send them abroad to be finished. She works every day from 8am to 12pm and 2pm to 5pm, sometimes with the help of her sister. She splits her time between her work, her house, and caring for her young children. 

This loan will be used to buy tagua, the basic material for making the buttons. She has been in the bank since it started and is now the president. She likes it because the payments are easy.

Her dream is to have a bigger workshop with better technology.

loans.use: to buy tagua [ivory palm].

loans.name: Perfecta Virginia

texts.es:
En la ciudadela Las Orquídeas  de la ciudad de Portoviejo se reúne cada quince días el Banco Comunal Niño Jesús De Las Orquídeas, esta es una zona urbana marginal donde las personas se dedican a diversas actividades.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Perfecta, tiene 52 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen 8 hijos, 7 de ellos ya son mayores de edad, el menor tiene 17 años de edad y estudia en colegio, tres de sus hijos aun viven en su casa. Su esposo se dedica a la agricultura.
 
Nuestra amiga con intención de poder obtener sus propios ingresos y con esto poder ayudar con los gasto que genera mantener el hogar empezó un negocio en su casa, ella tiene una pequeña granja en la cual cría pollos y chanchos, nos  cuenta que actualmente mete hasta 100 pollos por temporada los mismo que mantiene de dos a tres meses y que luego de este tiempo los entrega a comerciantes que llegan hasta su casa, de la misma forma lo hace con los chanchos los mantiene por un tiempo y cuando tengan buen peso los vende a comerciantes, nos cuenta que así ella ha podido ayudar en el hogar y sacar adelante a su familia, se dedica a esta actividad hace mas de 14 años y siempre le ha ido bien.

Este crédito es para comprar pollos, medicinas y alimento para los pollos y chanchos. Lleva 3 ciclos en el Banco Comunal y le gusta porque con los créditos se ayudan para salir adelante.
 
Su sueño es ver que su hijo menor sea un buen profesional.
texts.en:
The Niño Jesús De Las Orquídeas Communal Bank meets every fifteen days in the residential complex Las Orquídeas in the city of Portoviejo. This is a marginalized urban zone where people engage in diverse activities.

Here we meet Sra. Perfecta, 52, who is married and has eight children, seven of whom are adults with the youngest, 17, in school. Three of her children still live at home. Her husband is a farmer.

Perfecta, with the goal of earning her own income so that she could help with household expenses, began a business at home. She has a small farm where she raises chickens and pigs. She says that currently she gets up to 100 chickens per season, keeps them two or three months and then delivers them to traders who come to her house. She does the same with the pigs; she keeps them for awhile and when they reach a good weight she sells them to traders. She says that in this way she has been able to help with the household and move her family forward. She has been in business for more than 14 years and it has always done well.

This loan is to purchase chickens, medicine and feed for chickens and pigs. She has had three loan cycles with the Communal Bank and she likes it because the loans help her succeed.

Her dream is to see her youngest son become a good professional.

loans.use: to buy chickens, feed and medicine for chickens and pigs.

loans.name: Yadira Yajaira

texts.es: Yadira vive en Libertad zona turística de Ecuador muy conocidas por sus playas. Tiene 30 años  y se dedica a la venta de ropa y mochilas. Su historia en el comercio inicia desde muy joven ya que su mamá se dedicaba a esta actividad y ella le ayudaba. Su mamá ya no le acompaña porque falleció hace 2 años tiempo en el cual decidió continuar sola. En estos momentos está muy dedicada a su negocio trabajando de 8 de la mañana a 6 de la tarde. Ahora tiene una tienda ubicada en el centro comercial por lo que está protegida de la delincuencia. Como está casada su esposo Jorge mantiene el hogar trabando de manera independiente en la venta de puerta a puerta. Tiene 3 hijos de 11, 7 y 3 años de edad que asisten a la escuela pública. Espera con el crédito poder comprar ropa de hombre y mujer para aumentar el negocio. Su meta próxima es poder abrir otro negocio generando plazas de trabajo y mejorando su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Yadira lives in Libertad, a tourist zone in Ecuador which is very well known for its beaches. She is 30 years old and earns her living selling clothes and backpacks. She became involved in shop-keeping at a very young age, since her mother earned her living from this activity and she helped her mother. Her mother no longer accompanies her because she died 2 years ago and since then she has decided to continue alone.
 
At the moment she is very dedicated to her business. She works from 8 in the morning to 6 at night. She now has a shop located in a shopping centre which means that she is protected from street crime. Since she is married her husband Jorge looks after the home, working independently in door to door sales.
 
She has three children who are 11, 7 and 3 years old and who go to a public school. She hopes that with this loan she will be able to buy men’s and women’s clothing to expand her business. 

Her next goal is to open another business in job creation and to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: buy clothes.

loans.name: Julian

texts.es:
El señor Julian esta casado, tiene 40 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, tiene 5 hijos de los cuales 3 están estudiando, se dedica al tejido de cortes típicos, trabajo que inicio como laborante para otro negocio y hasta el momento lleva 20 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposa quien se dedica al mismo trabajo.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de hilos de varios colores y así poder mejorar su produccion de tejido y mejorar su ganancias, en el futuro espera tener un negocio bien capitalizado.
texts.en: Julian is married and is 40 years old. He did not have the opportunity to study. He has 5 children of whom 3 are studying. He earns his living weaving traditional fabrics. He started in this area working for another business and now has 20 years experience. He also has the support of his wife who works in the same business. He is asking for a loan to buy different-coloured thread so that he can improve his fabric production and increase his earnings. In the future he hopes to have a business with a good capital-base.

loans.use: to buy thread for weaving.

loans.name: América

texts.es:
América tiene 54 años, es una mujer con muchas ganas de salir adelante y brindar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia. Está casada con Julio, el padre de sus dos hijos: Luciana de 27 y Franco de 32 años. Juntos viven en su casa propia.
Ella se dedica a la venta de comida regional (juanes, pescado asado, tallarines y otros). Para ello, cada noche implementa una mesa en el frontis de su casa donde atiende muy amablemente a todos sus clientes, sus vecinos y transeúntes de la zona. Comenta que ha suspendido temporalmente sus actividades por problemas de salud, pero lo estará retomando en el transcurso de las siguientes semanas. Lleva más de 6 años en este negocio, empezando con un capital propio, luego fue creciendo con préstamos. Considera a su negocio bastante rentable por la demanda que tiene, ya que en su zona es muy conocida y solicitada.  Por tanto, desea continuar hasta hacerlo crecer y en un futuro poder abrir un restaurante, ya que le gusta la cocina.

Este es su préstamo número 8 con la institución MFP. Está contenta de saber que contará con un apoyo financiero para concretar sus planes. Por tanto, se compromete a ser responsable con el pago de sus cuotas como en los créditos anteriores. Además, comenta estar a gusto con su banco comunal por el apoyo que vienen dando las personas con el acceso a créditos.
Con el monto solicitado, de 2000 nuevos soles, invertirá en la compra de utensilios para su negocio como ollas, vasos, platos, y otros. También mesas y sillas, y los ingredientes necesarios para la preparación de sus comidas.
texts.en:
América, 54, is a woman with a great desire to get ahead and give her family a better quality of life. She is married to Julio, the father of her two children: Luciana, 27, and Franco, 32. They live together in the home they own.

América sells regional food (juanes [similar to tamales], grilled fish, noodles, etc). Each night she sets up a table in front of her house where she takes care of her customers - neighbors and passersby - with friendly service. She says she has temporarily suspended her activity because of health problems, but she will be starting again in the coming weeks. She has been doing this for more than 6 years, starting with her own capital and growing with the help of loans. She thinks her business is profitable enough due to the demand that she has, since in her neighborhood she's very well-known and sought-out. Given that, she wants to continue to grow and in the future to be able to open a restaurant because she enjoys being in the kitchen.

This is her 8th loan with MFP. She is happy to know that she can count on financial support to make her plans a reality. She promises to be responsible with her payments as she has been with previous loans. Additionally, she says that she likes the village bank because it supports people by making loans accessible. 

With the requested 2000 nuevos soles she will buy utensils for her business like pots, glasses, plates and other things. She will also buy tables and chairs and the ingredients needed to prepare her meals.

loans.use: to buy utensils and furniture for her business.

loans.name: Manuela Idaelba

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Virgen Del Rosario se reúne cada quince días en Colorado del Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. En este sitio la mayoría de los habitantes se dedican a la fabricación de botones de tagua, artesanía y comercio en general.

Aquí conocimos a la señora Manuela, tiene 57 años  de edad,  está casada y de esta relación tienen cinco hijos ya todos mayores de edad, dos de ellos aun viven en su casa. Su esposo se dedica a la agricultura.

Nuestra amiga es una muy buena madre y esposa que en su casa para ganar algo y con esto ayudar a su marido con los gastos del hogar tiene una pequeña granja donde cría hasta 100 pollos por temporada, además de esto también se dedica a la elaboración y venta de harina de pescado. Trabaja todos los  días en ambas actividades, nos cuenta que ella se desplaza a Manta para comprar el pescado que no se utilizan para fabricar el atún, para luego trasladarlos hasta su casa y procesarlos hasta hacer la harina de pescado, la misma que luego entrega a comerciantes que la exportan al extranjero. Lleva 8 años en esta actividad y le ha ido bien.

Este crédito es para comprar comida para los pollos y pescado para elaborar la harina. Está  en el Banco Comunal desde sus inicios y le gusta por la ayuda que le dan con los créditos para salir adelante.

Su sueño es tener buena salud.
texts.en:
The communal bank Virgen del Rosario [Virgin of the Rosary] gets together every fifteen days in Colorado in the canton of Montecristi. This area is known for its rich precolonial culture and for its nationally and internationally recognized arts and crafts. The majority of the residents make a living by making buttons of tagua [a nut with an ivory like interior], crafts and general trade. 

Here we met Manuela, she is 57 years old and married. Of this relationship they have five children, all grown and two still live with them. Her husband makes a living in agriculture. 

Our friend is a good mother and wife that in her house has a little farm where in season she breeds up to 100 chickens so she can make money and help her husband with the expenses of the household. In addition, she also makes a living producing and selling fish flour. She works everyday in both activities, and she shares that she goes to Manta to buy the fish not used in the making of tuna, to later bring it all the way to her house and process it to make the fish flour. She then delivers the flour to merchants that export it abroad. She has 8 years of experience in this activity and it has gone well for her. 

This loan is to buy food for the chickens and fish to make the flour. Manuela has been with the communal bank from the beginning and she likes it because the help of the loans keep her going. Her dream is to have good health.

loans.use: to buy food for chickens and fish

loans.name: Bertha

texts.es:
Bertha tiene 38 años, es una mujer muy trabajadora con ganas de salir adelante. Su pareja es Bernardo, quien se dedica al comercio y el padre de sus tres hijos: Neiser de 9, Gelber de 7 y Rusber de 7 años. Juntos habitan la casa que compró con mucho esfuerzo.
Su actividad es la venta de abarrotes, para esto cuenta con una tienda instalada en su propia vivienda, donde atiende muy amablemente a sus clientes que en su mayoría son sus vecinos. Lleva más de 6 meses dedicándose a este negocio y hasta el momento cuenta con el apoyo de su pareja, ocasionalmente, y de sus hijos, quienes atienden cuando ella está fuera de casa. Considera a su negocio rentable por las buenas ganancias que le deja y la regular demanda que tiene desde que se inició. Le gusta porque se siente ocupada, además de poder estar en casa para cuidar y atender sus hijos menores.

Este es su tercer préstamo con la institución MFP. Está muy contenta de saber que tiene un apoyo financiero para avanzar con su negocio. Además comenta sentirse bien con su banco comunal, pues le gusta el trabajo que vienen realizando apoyando a las personas.
Con el monto solicitado, de 1300 nuevos soles, invertirá en la compra de abarrotes para surtir su bodega, así como bebidas y ropa, esperando conseguir nuevos clientes.
texts.en:
Bertha is 38 years old and is a very hard-working woman who is eager to get ahead. Her partner is Bernardo, who earns his living as a shop-keeper and who is the father of her three children: Neiser who is 9, Gelber who is 7 and Rusber who is 7. They live together in a house which they bought with a lot of hard work. 

She works selling groceries. For this reason she has a shop set up in her house, where she is very friendly in serving her customers who are mainly her neighbours. She has been working in this business for 6 months and until now she has had the support of her partner, occasionally, and of her children who mind the shop when she is away from the house. She considers her business to be profitable because  of the good earnings she makes and the regular demand she has had since she started. She likes her business because she feels busy and it also allows her to stay at home and look after her younger children. 

This is her third loan from the MFP institution. She is very happy to know that she has financial support to continue making progress with her business. She also says that she feels happy about her communal bank, since she likes the work it does supporting others. 

She will use the 1300 soles she is asking for to buy groceries for her shop such as drinks and clothes, with the hope of attracting new customers.

loans.use: to increase her shop supplies.

loans.name: Viviana Elizabeth

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Virgen Del Rosario se reúne cada quince días en Colorado del Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. En este sitio la mayoría de los habitantes se dedican a la fabricación de botones de tagua, artesanía y comercio en general.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Viviana, tiene 28 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen dos hijos de  13 y 12 años de edad, los mismos que  estudian en colegio. Su esposo es chofer.

Nuestra amiga se dedica a la Fabricación de botones hechos en tagua, esto lo realiza en el taller de su hermana, también compra y vende tagua y para esto tiene un pequeño depósito de esta materia prima muy utilizada por sus vecinos y compañeros del banco. Nos cuenta nuestra amiga que para comprar estos productos ella tiene que trasladarse a Picoaza en el cantón Portoviejo donde compra a agricultores y comerciantes que le dejan a muy buen precio, luego ella en su depósito les entrega a todos los talleres que hay por la zona, lo cual le representa un negocio muy rentable ya que tiene su clientela asegurada. Lleva 7 años dedicada a esta actividad y le va bastante bien.

Este crédito lo va a utilizar en comprar tagua para la venta. Está en el Banco Comunal desde hace dos años y le gusta todo del banco.
 
Su sueño es tener un camión para realizar mejor el traslado de la tagua.
texts.en:
The village bank Virgen del Rosario meets every 15 days in Colorado in the canton of Montecristi, which is known for rich pre-colonial culture and for crafts that are recognized around the country and the world. Here the majority of the people work making tagua buttons, creating crafts and other general commerce.

Here we meet Viviana, 28, is married and has two children, 13 and 12, who are in school. Her husband is a driver.

Our friend makes buttons out of tagua [ivory palm nut] in her sister's workshop. She also buys and sells tagua and has a small warehouse of this material that is greatly used by her neighbors and fellow bank members. She tells us that to buy these products she has to travel to Picoaza in the canton of Portoviejo where she buys from farmers and merchants that give her a good price. Later from her warehouse she delivers them to all of the workshops in the area, which is a very profitable business since she has fixed clientele. She has been doing this for 7 years and it's going very well.

She will use this loan to buy tagua to sell. She has been in the village bank for 2 years and likes everything about it. 

Her dream is to have a truck to make it easier to transport the tagua.

loans.use: to buy tagua [ivory palm].

loans.name: Irene Gissela

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Virgen Del Rosario se reúne cada quince días en Colorado del Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. En este sitio la mayoría de los habitantes se dedican a la fabricación de botones de tagua, artesanía y comercio en general.

Aquí conocimos a la señora Irene, tiene 28 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos de 9, 5 y de 1 mes el menor, los dos mayores estudian en escuela. Su esposo es obrero.

Nuestra amiga es una muy buena madre y esposa que para lograr ganar algo y con esto ayudar a su marido con los gastos del hogar se dedica a la elaboración y venta de harina de pescado. Trabaja de lunes a viernes en la elaboración de este producto, nos cuenta que ella se desplaza a Manta para comprar el pescado que no se utiliza para fabricar el atún, para luego trasladarlos hasta su casa y procesarlos hasta hacer la harina de pescado, la misma que luego entrega a comerciantes que la exportan al extranjero donde este producto es muy utilizado. Ella lleva más de 10 años en esta actividad y le ha ido bien.

Este crédito es para comprar pescado para elaborar la harina. Está en el Banco Comunal desde hace 6 ciclos y le gusta por la ayuda que le dan con los créditos.
 
Su sueño es tener una gran fábrica para poder ella misma exportar sus productos.
texts.en:
The "Virgen Del Rosario" communal bank meets every two weeks in the Colorado area of Montecristi canton, known for its rich pre-colonial culture, and for its crafts, recognized at the national and international level. Here, the majority of the inhabitants work making tagua buttons, in crafts, and in commerce in general.

Here we met Irene, who is 28, married, and has three children, ages 9, 5 and the youngest,1 month. The two eldest go to school. Her husband is a laborer.

Our friend is a very good mother and wife, who in order to earn something and with this help her husband with the household expenses, makes and sells fish meal. She works Monday to Friday making this product. 

She tells us that she travels to Manta to buy the fish that is not used in the processing of tuna, to then transport it to her home and process it until it becomes fish meal, which she then delivers to merchants that export it overseas, where this product is used a great deal. She has been doing this for more than ten years, and it has gone well.

This loan is to buy fish for making fish meal. She has been in the communal bank for six loan cycles, and likes it because of the help they give her with the loans.  

Her dream is to have a large plant, so that she can export these products herself.

loans.use: To buy fish.

loans.name: José Dimas

texts.es: José Dimas tiene 34 años de edad y habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su esposa de 32 años y sus 4 hijos de 14, 12, 11 y 8 años. José  se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos como: maíz y  frijoles. Además de dedicarse al cultivo también trabaja en una granja, ya que los ingresos no le dan abasto para cubrir todas las necesidades de su numerosa familia.  Ha realizado esta actividad por mucho tiempo y es así como se gana la vida honradamente.  Él es un hombre muy responsable, generoso y dedicado en su trabajo. Es muy conocido por sus vecinos los cuales dan buenas referencias de su trabajo como de su persona. Cada año repite está actividad ya que es una persona muy humilde y de escasos recursos el cual no puede accesar a otro tipo de negocio o trabajo. Este año al igual que los anteriores ha decidido cultivar la tierra,  para lo que necesita invertir en los insumos agrícolas (abonos, semillas, insecticidas, etc.) necesarios para la siembra.  Esta es la razón por la cual solicita este crédito a esta institución, INTEGRAL, ya que no cuenta con los recursos económicos   necesarios para realizar la inversión.  De esta forma espera lograr cultivar los principales granos básicos de este año para poder llevar el pan de cada día a su familia y poco a poco ir mejorando sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Jose Dimas, 34, lives in the house he owns with his wife, 32, and their four children, ages 14, 12, 11 and 8. Jose grows basic grains like corn and beans. In addition to his own crops, he also works on another farm because the income from his own farm doesn't cover the needs of his large family. He has been doing this for a long time and earns his living honorably. He is a very responsible, generous and dedicated man. He is well-known amongst his neighbors who give him good work and personal references. 

Every year he does the same work because he's humble and his scarce resources don't allow him to access any other type of job or business. This year, as before, he has decided to work the land. In order to do so, he needs to invest in agricultural inputs (compost, seeds, insecticides, etc) that he needs for the planting. For that reason he has asked for a loan from INTEGRAL, because he doesn't have the financial resources to make the investment. He hopes to grow the main grains this year so that he can feed his family every day and little by little improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to buy compost, seeds, insecticides, etc.

loans.name: Apolinario

texts.es: Apolinario tiene 60 años de edad y a pesar de su avanzada edad sigue luchando por dar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia. Habita en casa de su propiedad junto con numeroso grupo familiar, el cual cada día le exige más.  Él  se dedica al cultivo de maíz, frijol y loroco desde hace muchos años. Ha cultivado la tierra toda su vida, debido que no tuvo la oportunidad de conocer otra forma de ganarse la vida. Gracias a los cultivos que cada año cosecha, puede llevar el sustento a su hogar. Esta actividad es su principal fuente de ingresos y es con lo único que cuenta para cubrir las necesidades básicas de su familia. Debido a que la temporada para la siembra ya comenzó, necesita iniciar la siembra lo antes posible, para  esto necesita invertir en los insumos agrícolas (abonos, semillas, venenos para plagas, etc.) ya que son indispensables para obtener una cosecha abundante. Solicita este crédito a INTEGRAL para dicha inversión ya que no cuenta con los recursos económicos para hacerlo por su cuenta. Tiene  mucha esperanza de que obtendrá una cosecha abundante y que con la venta de la misma  logrará saldar el préstamo y además podrá continuar llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar.
texts.en:
Apolinario is 60 years old and despite his age continues fighting to provide his family with a better quality of life. He lives in a house on his property with his large family, which requires more of him each day.  

He has earnt his living cultivating corn, beans and loroco for many years. He has cultivated the land all his life, since he has not had any opportunity to learn any other way of earning a living. Thanks to the harvests he reaps each year, he is able to support his household. This activity is his primary source of income and it is the only way he can meet the basic needs of his family. 

Since the seeding season has already started, he needs to start seeding as soon as possible. To do so he needs to buy agricultural supplies (fertilizers, seeds, poisons for plagues etc) since these are indispensable to reaping an abundant harvest. 

He is asking INTEGRAL for this loan since he does not have the economic resources to do this on this own. He hopes that he will have a good harvest so that with the sales he makes he will be able to repay the loan and continue putting food on the table each day.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, seeds, poison for plagues etc.

loans.name: Calista Lilian

texts.es: Calista Lilian tiene 62 años de edad y habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su esposo, hijos y nietos. Ella  se dedica  a la crianza de ganado de engorde. Compra ganado, lo cuida y cuando está listo lo pone a la venta en los puntos estratégicos de la zona donde habita. Trabaja muy duro para colaborar con la economía del hogar, ya que los ingresos percibidos por su esposo no logran cubrir las necesidades básicas de su familia. Junto con su esposo, tratan la manera de dar lo mejor a sus hijos. Ella  es una mujer trabajadora,  honrada y responsable.  Vive en condiciones muy humildes junto a su familia. Todo esto la motiva a trabajar duramente para dar lo mejor a su familia ya que es la única forma  de poder cambiar la realidad en la que se encuentran. No pierde las esperanzas que con la ayuda de Dios y su arduo trabajo logrará su objetivo. Todo esto la ha motivado a acercarse a esta  institución, INTEGRAL, para solicitar este crédito el cual solicita para invertir en la compra de ganado de engorde y concentrado para el mismo, ya que es uno de sus principales fuentes de ingresos y ha notado que de esta forma puede tener un poco mas de ingresos y poder suplir las principales necesidades de su familia. Espera tener resultados favorables y así poder continuar llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar.
texts.en: Calista Lilian, 62, lives in her own home with her husband, children and grandchildren.  She has a business raising and fattening cattle.  She buys cows, cares for them, and when they are ready she puts them up for sale in strategic places in the area where she lives.  She works very hard to contribute to the household finances, because the income that her husband earns does not cover all of the basic needs of the family.  She and her husband try to find a way to give the best to their children.  She is a woman who is hardworking, honest and responsible.  She lives in very humble conditions with her family.  All of this motivates her to work hard to give the best to her family, because this is the only way of being able to change the reality in which they find themselves.  She doesn't lose hope that, with the help of God and with hard work, she will achieve her objective.  All of this has motivated her to approach this institution, INTEGRAL, to request a loan.  She will use the loan to invest in the purchase of cattle to fatten, and to buy feed for them, because this is one of her main sources of income.  She has noticed that in this way she can have a bit more income and supply the main necessities to her family.  She hopes to have favorable results, so that she can continue to provide daily support to her household.

loans.use: to buy cattle to fatten, and cattle feed

loans.name: Calton

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 1 filho que frequenta a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
 É enfermeiro do Ministério da Saúde e com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (barrotes, cimento, ferro, tinta, e outros) para dar continuidade a obra da sua casa. 
No futuro pretende aumentar o nível académico e profissional para melhorar o seu salário, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é conquistar a progressão da sua carreira e adquirir uma viatura.
texts.en:
Calton is married and has one child who goes to school. He lives in his own house with his family and does not support anyone else. 

He is a nurse with the Ministry of Health and with this loan he intends to buy construction material (cement, iron, paint etc.) to continue the work on his house. 

In the future he wants to study again to move up the professional ladder and to increase his income. With this he promises to repay this loan so that he can ask for more loans in future. The challenge is to move forward with his career and buy a car.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (cement, metal, paint, and other things) to continue work on his house

loans.name: Ernesto

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 4 filhos que frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
 É polícia, com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, aros, vidros, ferro, tinta, e outros) para dar continuidade a obra da sua casa. 
No futuro pretende concluir a sua casa para melhor confortar a sua família, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é adquirir uma viatura para facilitar o transporte de casa ao serviço.
texts.en:
Ernesto is married and has four children who go to school. He lives in his own house with his family and does not support anyone else. 
He is a policeman and with this loan he intends to buy construction material (cement, windows, paint etc.) to continue the building work on his house. 
In the future he wants to finish the work on his house so that his family will be more comfortable there. For this he promises to repay this loan so that he can ask for more loans in future. The challenge is to buy a car so that he can get to work more easily.

loans.use: to buy construction material (cement, windows, paint etc) to continue building work on his house

loans.name: Alfonso Adalid

texts.es: Alfonso Adalid tiene 33 años de edad y habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su esposa. Desde niño aprendió a cultivar la tierra, lo que en la actualidad le permite llevar el alimento a su hogar. Cada año cultiva maíz y maicillo. Después de sacar la cosecha la pone a disposición en los puntos estratégicos para la venta de la zona donde habita. Es un hombre trabajador el cual es muy admirado por sus vecinos ya que se caracteriza por ser responsable, emprendedor y generoso. Trabaja con mucha dedicación en sus cultivos, ya que  es su principal fuente de ingresos y es como lleva el alimento a su hogar. Solicita este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra de los insumos agrícolas (abonos, semillas, insecticidas, etc.) necesarios para la cosecha ya que son indispensables para obtener una cosecha abundante y así  continuar siendo el soporte económico de su familia.
texts.en: Alfonso Adalid is 33 years old and lives at home with his wife. When he was a child he learned how to cultivate the land and nowadays he maintains a living with this work. Every year he grow corn and millet. After picking the crops he sells them around the area he resides in. He is a hardworking man who is admired by his neighbors since he is responsible, driven, and generous. He is very dedicated to his crops since it is his main form of income and allows him to feed him and his wife. He is requesting INTEGRAL a loan to buy agricultural materials (fertilizers, seeds, insecticides, etc.) necessary for his crops since they are needed to grow an abundant crop and continue being his family's financial support.

loans.use: buy: fertilizers, seeds, insecticides, etc.

loans.name: María Cristina

texts.es: María Cristina, es una mujer salvadoreña, caracterizada por su compromiso, responsabilidad y generosidad. Ella se dedica al cultivo de la tierra, en especial de maíz y sorgo. Realiza esta actividad desde que era muy pequeña. De esta forma es como lleva el pan de cada día a su numeroso grupo familiar con el que vive. Tiene 40 años de edad, y trabaja muy duro para sacar adelante a sus hijos que cada día le demandan más. Su deseo es poder cambiar las condiciones de vida en la que en la actualidad se encuentran ya que viven en condiciones muy sencillas y humildes. Debido a que la temporada para la siembra ya comenzó, solicita este crédito a INTEGRAL para comprar los insumos agrícolas (abonos, semillas, insecticidas, etc.) para la siembra, ya que son indispensables para obtener una cosecha abundante, con la cual espera tener la capacidad para cancelar el préstamo y continuar llevando el sustento a su hogar una vez venda dicha cosecha.  Tiene mucha confianza que obtendrá resultados favorables.
texts.en: Maria Cristina is a Salvadoran woman who is characterized as committed, responsible and generous.  She is a farmer who cultivates the land, especially corn and sorghum.  She has been farming since she was very young.  This is the way that she brings daily sustenance to the large family group that lives with her.  She is 40 years old, and she works very hard to get ahead with her children, who every day have greater demands.  Her desire is to be able to change her current living conditions, because they are living in very simple and humble conditions.  Because the season for planting has already started, she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL to buy agricultural supplies (fertilizers, seeds, insecticides, etc.) for her crops, because these are indispensable for getting an abundant harvest.  With this harvest, she expects to have the ability to pay off her loan and to continue to provide support to her household, once the crops are sold.  She has a lot of confidence that she will obtain favorable results.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, seeds, insecticides, etc.

loans.name: Ketty María

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Virgen Del Rosario se reúne cada quince días en Colorado del Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. En este sitio la mayoría de los habitantes se dedican a la fabricación de botones de tagua, artesanía y comercio en general.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Ketty, tiene 32 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos de 14, 9 y 4 años de edad, los  dos mayores estudian en colegio y escuela. Su esposo técnico en aparatos eléctricos.

Nuestra amiga  es una muy buena ama de casa que para generar sus propios ingresos y con esto ayudar con los gastos del hogar y los estudios de sus pequeños, se dedica a la fabricación de botones hechos en tagua, para esto ella tiene un torno (máquina para cortar tagua) con la que se elaboran los botones pero en forma cruda, productos que entrega en su sector a comerciantes mayoristas que llegan hasta este lugar a comprar para luego llevarlos a Manta para que estos sean enviados al extranjero para que sean terminados. Ella lleva más de 6 años dedicada a esta actividad la cual le deja buenos ingresos.

Este crédito lo va a utilizar en comprar tagua que es la  materia prima para la fabricación de los botones. Esta desde el inicio  en el Banco Comunal, es la secretaria del mismo y le gusta por las facilidades de pago.

Su sueño es tener una fábrica grande con mayor tecnología.
texts.en:
The Communal Bank "Virgen del Rosario" meets every 15 days in Colorado, which is located in the canton of Montecristi. This area is known for its rich pre-colonial culture and its handicrafts that are recognized on a national and international level. Most of the residents of this area engage in the manufacture of tagua buttons, handicrafts, and trade in general.

It is in this place that one can meet Sra. Ketty. She is 32 years old, married, and has three children (ages 14, 9, and 4). The two older children are in school. Her husband works as an appliance repair technician.

Ketty is a excellent homemaker who generates her own income so that she can help with the household expenses and pay for her children's education. She makes buttons out of tagua (a natural substitute for ivory). Ketty owns a lathe that she uses for cutting tagua in order to make the buttons, which are in crude form. The products are delivered to local wholesalers who come to the area to buy them. Later on, the goods are taken to Manta before being shipped abroad for the finishing touches. Ketty has been in this business for more than six years and has earned a good income.

This loan will be used to buy tagua, since it is the primary material used in making the buttons. Ketty has been with her Communal Bank from the very beginning. She serves as the group secretary and enjoys the convenience of the payments. Her dream is to have a large factory with the best technology.

loans.use: to buy "tagua" (a natural ivory substitute) for making buttons.

loans.name: Rene

texts.es: Rene de cincuenta y tres años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos en casa propia; él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y maicillo, tiene varios años de dedicarse a la agricultura por lo que ha adquirido gran experiencia en el ámbito; comercia por todos los alrededores de la zona donde reside y se ha hecho de mucha clientela porque les vende productos de buena calidad a excelentes precios además se caracteriza por atender bien su clientela, es muy servicial; Rene es un hombre emprendedor con muchas ganas de salir adelante, le gusta estar a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades pues sabe que son las que le ayudaran a alcanzar el éxito, en esta última cosecha debido al clima tuvo una pérdida del cuarenta por ciento de su producción y desea recuperarse para esta temporada 2012 por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz y maicillo, fertilizantes, herbicidas, herramientas etc. Rene tiene buenas referencia de pago es muy responsable sabe que obtendrá las ganancias suficientes para saldar el financiamiento y al mismo tiempo podrá ofrecerle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Rene, 43, lives with his life partner and their children in his own home.  He is a farmer who cultivates corn and sorghum.  He has been working as a farmer for many years, and so he has acquired a lot of experience in this line of work.  He sells his crops in all of the areas that surround the place where he lives, and he has gained a lot of customers because he sells top quality products at excellent prices.  In addition, he is known for serving his customers well, as he is very helpful.  Rene is an enterprising man who has a strong desire to get ahead.  He likes to be ready for new opportunities, as he knows that they will help him to become successful.  In his last harvest he suffered a loss of 40 percent of his crops due to the weather, and he wants to recover for the 2012 season.  For this reason, he is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow him to purchase corn and sorghum seeds, fertilizers, herbicides, tools, etc.  Rene has good credit references and is very responsible.  He knows that he will get enough earnings to pay off the loan, and at the same time he will be able to offer his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy corn and sorghum seeds, fertilizers, herbicides and tools

loans.name: Obed

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 2 filhos que frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
 É agricultor e trabalha numa pensão como servente e motorista, com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar insumos agrícolas (sementes de alface, cenoura, repolho, quiabo, e adubos) para aplicar na sua machamba. 
No futuro pretende crescer profissionalmente e ser gerente da pensão onde ele trabalha para melhorar o seu salário, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é o tempo chuvoso pois torna difícil o cultivo e a sementeira, e a pressão do trabalho não permite dar atenção adequada a produção.
texts.en:
Obed is married and has two children who go to school. He lives in his own house with his family and does not support anyone else. 
He is a farmer and works in a guest house as a server and driver. With this loan he intends to buy farming inputs (lettuce, carrot, cabbage and okra seeds and fertilizer) to use in his farm. 

In the future he wants to move on in his professional life and become part of the management at the guest house where he works, to increase his salary.  With this he promises to repay this loan so that he can ask for more loans in future. The challenge at the moment is the rainy season, it is difficult to prepare and work on the land, and the pressure of work does not allow him to dedicate enough time to the gardening activities.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs (lettuce, carrot, cabbage and okra seeds, and fertilizer).

loans.name: Salvador

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 6 filhos que frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
 É militar e quadro do Ministério da Defesa, com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar bens de consumo (mesa, cadeiras, geleira sofás, estantes, e outros) para mobilar a sua casa. 
No futuro pretende crescer profissionalmente e ser um empreendedor, não depender apenas do seu salário, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku
O desafio é adquirir uma viatura para facilitar a sua vida quotidiana.
texts.en:
Salvador is married and has six children who go to school. He lives in his own house with his family and does not support anyone else. 
He is in the military and with this loan he intends to buy household goods (table, chairs, sofa, shelving) to furnish his house. 

In the future he wants to grow professionally and become a businessman. He does not want to depend only on his salary. With this he promises to repay this loan so that he can ask for more loans in future. The challenge is to buy a car to make his daily life easier.

loans.use: to buy furniture and other domestic goods.

loans.name: Salvador Antonio

texts.es: Salvador Antonio de veintiocho años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos en casa propia; él se dedica a la agricultura específicamente al cultivo de maíz y frijol, tiene varios años de experiencia en el rubro que le ayuda a obtener las mejores cosechas, el terreno donde siembra está ubicado cerca de su casa y es alquilado, además comercia en todas las zonas aledañas es muy conocido por su excelente servicio por la calidad del producto y por qué posee los mejores precios; Salvador es un hombre dedicado a su labor siempre con gran disposición de superarse y llegar al éxito, quiere aumentar la producción en este periodo de siembra pero necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz y frijol, insecticida fertilizantes etc. Salvador Antonio no tiene experiencia crediticia pero si posee muy buenas referencias que confirman que es una persona de paga, está seguro que saldara la deuda y al mismo tiempo podrá darle a su familia una mejor vida.
texts.en: Salvador Antonio is 28 years old, lives with his life partner, and children in their home. He works in agriculture, specifically corn and bean cultivation. He has many years of experience in agriculture which helps him yield abundant crops. The land he grows his crops in is located close to his home and is rented. He sells his produce in all the neighboring areas. He is well known for his excellent service, the quality of his products, and having the best prices.  Salvador is dedicated to his work and always has the drive to improve his standard of living and succeed. He wants to increase his production during this growing season  but needs the funds. This is why he is requesting INTEGRAL a loan to buy corn and bean seeds, insecticide, and fertilizers, etc. Salvador Antonio does not have experience with loans but he does have reliable references that confirm that he is a person to pay back borrowed money. He is confident he will receive the loan so he can offer his family a better life.

loans.use: buy corn and bean seeds, insecticide, and fertilizers, etc.

loans.name: Daniel Antonio

texts.es: Daniel Antonio vive junto a su compañera de vida; él se dedica al cultivo de maíz, de hortalizas como el chile verde, pepino y ejote, y además a la crianza de cerdos, su negocio le da muy buenos resultados por lo que trabaja duro para mantenerlo activo,  él comercia en diferentes zonas aledañas al cantón donde vive y tiene mucha clientela pues saben que todo lo que vende es de calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es excelente; Daniel Antonio es un hombre activo, siempre dispuesto a entregar todo a su labor, sabe que entre más duro trabaje mayor será su recompensa;  en esta cosecha quiere enfocarse en el cultivo de maíz pero necesita capital libre para la inversión porque sus compras las hace al contado, por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz por mayor, fertilizante, insecticida, herramientas etc. Daniel Antonio tiene buenas referencias de pago y tiene la certeza que podrá cancelar la deuda en el tiempo establecido  y al mismo tiempo llevara a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Daniel Antonio lives with his life partner. He earns his living cultivating corn, vegetables such as green chilli, cucumbers and string beans and also raising pigs. His business is giving him very good results and for this reason he works hard to keep it going. He sells in different zones surrounding the canton where he lives and he has many customers since they know that everything he sells is of good quality, at accessible prices and comes with excellent customer service. 

Daniel Antonio is an active man, always ready to work to his full capacity, and he knows that he harder he works the bigger the reward. For this harvest he wants to concentrate on the cultivation of corn, but he needs money to invest since he makes his purchases in cash. For this reason he is asking for a loan from INTEGRAL so that he can buy corn seed wholesale, fertilizer, insecticide, tools etc.   

Daniel Antonio has good payment references and is sure that he will be able to repay the debt within the required time and at the same time provide his household with financial security.

loans.use: to buy corn seed wholesale, fertilizer, insecticide, tools etc.

loans.name: Guillermo

texts.es: Guillermo  de cuarenta y uno años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos en casa propia; él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y maicillo, tiene varios años de trabajar en la agricultura y está feliz porque eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia que utiliza en las siembras,  siempre obtiene las mejores cosechas por lo que comercia a sus clientes productos de calidad y a precios accesibles, con un servicio inigualable, Guillermo es el más amable de la zona, es un hombre soñador y muy trabajador sabe que solo si lucha por lo que desea alcanzara el triunfo, en este periodo de siembra Guillermo cultivara tres manzanas de parcela propia, por lo cual obtendrá mejores ganancias, pero necesita de capital para invertir en insumos  por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, maicillo, fertilizante, herramienta, etc. Guillermo tiene buenas referencias crediticias y está seguro que podrá cancelar el financiamiento con éxito y al mismo tiempo darle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en: Guillermo is 40 years old, lives with his life partner and children in their own home. He grows corn and millet for a living. He has been working in this business for many years and is happy since he has learned many things he now applies to his work.  He always has the most abundant crops and offers his clients quality products and unbeatable prices and service. Guillermo is the friendliest in his area. He is a man with dreams and very hardworking. He knows that if he strives for what he wants to accomplish he will succeed. In this growing season Guillermo plans on cultivating 7 acres of his own land to have more income but in order to do so he needs to invest in supplies. This is why he is requesting INTEGRAL a loan to buy corn and millet seeds, fertilizer, tools, etc. Guillermo has positive loan references and is sure he will be able to pay back the loan and offer his family a fulfilling life.

loans.use: maiz and millet seeds, fertilizer, tools, etc

loans.name: Ulmas

texts.ru: Более 10 лет Улмас занимается выращиванием картошки, пшеницы, капусты и ячменя. Улмас имеет дружную семью, женат и на воспитании имеет четверых детей. Жена занимается выращиванием сельхозпродуктов и помогает мужу в ведении бизнеса. Кроме того Улмас занимается скотоводством, имеет дойную корову, его жена продает молоко жителям села. Улмас начинал свою деятельность в сфере земледелия, выращивал картошку, за год увеличил урожайность и стал успешным дехканом. Улмас хочет улучшить свои жилищные условия, чтобы содержать свою семью в комфортном доме, с этой целью Улмас запрашивает займ для ремонта своего дома. Улмас и его жена надеются на вашу доброту и помощь.
texts.en:
Ulmas has been growing potatoes, wheat, cabbage and barley for more than ten years.  Married and raising four children, he has a loving family. His wife cultivates agricultural products and helps him run his business.

Ulmas is also involved in animal husbandry and he owns a dairy cow.  His wife sells milk to people in the village.

Ulmas started his farming business growing potatoes.  A year later he had increased his productivity and became a successful dehkan farmer.  

He wants to improve his family's living conditions and see them live in a comfortable house.  This is why he is requesting a loan to repair his house.  Ulmas and his wife rely on your kindness and your help.

loans.use: to repair his house

loans.name: Carmen Griselda

texts.es: Carmen Griselda de cuarenta y cinco años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos en casa propia; ella posee una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad, frijoles, huevos, leche, lácteos, pan, entre otros, su negocio está ubicado en el lugar de su residencia en una zona muy concurrida de personas, se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues su tienda es muy surtida siempre tiene lo que las personas necesitan con producto de calidad y a precio accesible; Carmen es una mujer visionaria, muy trabajadora le gusta mantenerse adelante de la competencia, sabe que solo con esfuerzo y dedicación alcanzara sus objetivos, como aumento la demanda de clientes, necesita invertir más en insumos por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, lácteos, embutidos, pan, golosinas, bebidas, etc. Carmen Griselda tiene buenas referencias de crédito y es muy responsable por eso está segura que saldara la cuenta, y a la vez tiene fe que le dará a su familia una mejor vida.
texts.en:
Carmen Griselda is forty-five years old and lives with her life partner and children in their own home. She has a shop where she sells essential items, amongst others beans, eggs, milk, dairy products and bread. Her business is located in her house in an area busy with many people. She has many customers since her shop is well-supplied and always has what people need, with quality products at an accessible price. 

Carmen is a visionary women and is very hard-working. She likes to keep ahead of competition, and knows that only with hard-work and dedication will she be able to reach her goals, such as increasing her customer demand. She needs to invest more in supplies and for this reason she is asking INTEGRAL for a loan which will allow her to buy basic grains, milk products, sausages, bread, sweets, drinks etc. Carmen Griselda has good credit references and is very responsible and for this reason she is sure that she will repay the loan, and at the same time she has faith that she will be able to provide her family with a better life.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, milk products, sausages, bread, sweets, drinks.

loans.name: Irma Elizabeth

texts.es: Irma Elizabeth de cuarenta y cuatro años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos; ella se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol y tiene varios años de trabajar en la agricultura, además tiene de respaldo una tienda que también le deja muy buenas ganancias; lo producido en la siembra lo comercia en todos los alrededores de la zona y tiene mucha clientela pues todo lo que vende es de calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es excelente; Irma es una mujer dedicada a su labor muy enérgica siempre buscando las mejores alternativas  para alcanzar el éxito, en este tiempo de cosecha necesita invertir en insumos para poder aumentar la producción pero necesita de un apoyo en el capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz y frijol, herbicidas, fertilizantes, herramientas, etc. Irma Elizabeth tiene buen record crediticio y excelentes referencias de pago, tiene fe que podrá saldar el financiamiento con puntualidad y a la vez obtener para su familia un futuro más próspero.
texts.en: Irma Elizabeth is 44 years old, lives with her life partner and children. She grows corn and beans for a living. She has been working in this business for many years. She also has a store that brings in a source of income.  She sells her produce in all of her area's outskirts and offers her clients quality products and unbeatable prices and service. Irma is dedicated to her work, always energetic, and in the look out for the best alternatives to succeed. In this growing season Irma needs to invest in materials to increase production and in order to do so she needs the funds. This is why she is requesting INTEGRAL a loan to buy corn and bean seeds, herbicides, fertilizer, tools, etc. Irma Elizabeth has good credit and excellent loan references. She is sure she will be able to pay back the loan and offer her family a fulfilling life.

loans.use: buy corn and bean seeds, herbicides, fertilizer, tools, etc

loans.name: Teresa Del Carmen

texts.es: Teresa del Carmen de cuarenta y seis años de edad vive junto a sus hijos; ella posee una tienda donde vende productos de primera necesidad, pan, huevos, arroz, frijoles, producto instantáneo, entre otros, el negocio está ubicado en su vivienda en una zona muy concurrida de personas, ya tiene  mucha clientela fija porque es una excelente vendedora y porque todo lo que comercia es de muy buena calidad y a precios accesibles, además se caracteriza por su gran amabilidad cuando atiende el negocio; Teresa es una mujer ejemplar, siempre dedicada a su labor y a la expectativa de oportunidades que le permitan superarse y alcanzar el éxito en el futuro; quiere hacer crecer el negocio pero necesita invertir por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, producto instantáneo, golosinas, pan, bebidas, etc. Teresa del Carmen tiene buenas referencias de pago y tiene confianza que podrá saldar la deuda, y a la vez ofrecerle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Teresa del Carmen is 46 years old and lives with her two children. She has a store where she sells basic necessity products like bread, eggs, rice, beans, and instant food products, among others. The business is located in her home in an area where lots of people pass by. She already has a lot of customers because what she sells is of the excellent quality and well priced, moreover, she is known for her friendliness when running the business. Teresa is an exemplary woman, she is always devoted to her work and convinced of the opportunities which will enable her to better herself and achieve success in the future. She wants to grow the business, but needs to invest which is which she has sought a loan from INTEGRAL which will enable her to buy basic grains, instant food products, sweets, bread, and drinks and so on. Teresa del Carmen has a good history of payment and is confident that she will be able to repay the loan, and at the same time give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: granos básicos, producto instantáneo, golosinas, pan, bebidas

loans.name: Josefina Del Carmen

texts.es: Josefina del Carmen de veinticuatro años de edad vive junto a su madre; ella se dedica al cultivo de maíz tiene varios años de trabajar en la agricultura y siempre obtiene buenas cosechas, además posee una pequeña venta de frutas y una crianza de pollos que le ayudan con los gastos del hogar, es muy conocida en el cantón donde reside y tiene mucha clientela pues todo lo que comercia es de muy buena calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es único, siempre está a la orden de las personas; Josefina es una mujer activa y dispuesta a lograr todas sus metas por eso día con día trabaja con todo su esfuerzo. En la última cosecha tuvo un poco de perdida, debido a un fenómeno climático, por eso ahora que viene otra temporada 2012 de cultivo quiere recuperarse y aumentar la producción pero necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, fertilizante, insecticida, herramienta, etc. Josefina del Carmen tiene buenas referencias crediticias y está segura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez darle a su familia un futuro próspero.
texts.en:
Josefina del Carmen, 24, lives with her mother. She makes her living growing corn and has been working in agriculture for several years and she has always reaped good harvests. She also has a small fruit business and rears chickens which help her with the household expenses. She is very well known in the canton where she lives and has many customers as everything she sells is of a very high quality and at a good-value. Moreover, the service is unique - it always caters to the people. 

Josefina is an active lady who ready to achieve all her goals, that is why everyday she works with such gusto. In the last harvest, she suffered a little loss due to a climatic event, which is why with the 2012 growing season underway, she wants to recover the losses and increase production, but she needs money - this is why she has requested a loan from INTEGRAL that will enable her to buy corn seeds, fertilizers, insecticide, tools, etc. Josefina del Carmen has a good loan history, and is confident that she will be able to repay the loan as well as offer her family a bright future.

loans.use: to buy corn seeds, fertilizers, insecticide and tools.

loans.name: Rigoberto Mauricio

texts.es: Rigoberto Mauricio vive junto a su compañera de vida en casa propia; él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y maicillo y tiene varios años de dedicarse a la agricultura, se ha hecho de experiencia muy valiosa, tiene mucha clientela pues todo  lo que comercia es de excelente calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es inigualable Rigoberto es muy amable con las personas; es un hombre activo y muy dedicado al trabajo siempre está aprovechando cada oportunidad que se le  presenta porque sabe que así podrá alcanzar el triunfo; debido a la tormenta tropical E12 del pasado año tuvo muchas pérdidas, quiere recuperarse y hacer una nueva inversión en insumos para el cultivo 2012,  pero necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL  un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, maicillo, fertilizante, insecticida, herramienta etc. Rigoberto Mauricio tiene buenas referencias crediticias y tiene la certeza de que podrá pagar el financiamiento en el periodo establecido y a la vez confía que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Rigoberto Mauricio lives with his life partner in their own home. He makes his living growing corn and sorghum and has many years of experience working in agriculture. He has valuable experience, with a large customer base as everything that he sells is of an excellent quality and at accessible prices; moreover, the customer service offered by the inimitable Rigoberto is very friendly. 

He is an active man, committed to working, always making the most of each opportunity which he is presented with as he knows that is how he will be able to achieve success. As a result of the E12 tropical storm last year, he suffered heavy losses, he wants to recover and make a new investment in supplies for the 2012 season, but he needs money which is why he has requested a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow his to buy corn seeds, sorghum, fertilizers, insecticide and tools and so on. Rigoberto has excellent credit references and he is sure that he will be able to repay the loan in the given time period. At the same time, he is confident that he will give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy corn seeds, sorghum, fertilizers, insecticide and tools.

loans.name: Ingrid Veronica
