texts.es: Ingrid Verónica de veintiocho años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus tres hijos en casa propia; ella posee un pequeño negocio donde vende protectores de celulares, de pantalla y manos libres, tiene varios años de trabajar en el comercio y tiene mucha experiencia se ha vuelto una excelente vendedora, los clientes la prefieren porque siempre tiene lo que necesitan; Ingrid es una mujer enérgica muy entregada a su labor piensa que con perseverancia y dedicación alcanzara la cima, quiere hacer crecer su negocio pero necesita de capital para invertir por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar protectores de celulares, de pantalla y manos libres, etc. Ingrid Verónica tiene buenas referencias crediticias y tiene la certeza que podrá saldar el financiamiento y a la ves tiene confianza que podrá darle a su familia un futuro más próspero.
texts.en:
Ingrid Verónica is 28 years old and lives with her partner and her three children in their own home.  She owns a small business and sells cellular phone covers, screen protectors, and hands-free devices.  She has worked in this business for a few years and has a lot of experience.  She's a great salesperson and her customers always buy from her because she has what they need.

Ingrid is an energetic woman that is very dedicated to her work and she believes that with perseverance and dedication she can get to the top.  She wants to grow her business but she needs money so that she can invest in supplies.  She is asking for a loan from INTEGRAL so that she can buy cellular phone cases, screen protectors, hands-free sets, etc.  Ingrid Verónica has good references and she is certain that she will be able to pay off the loan.  She is also certain that she will be able to provide her family with a better future.

loans.use: to buy mobile phone cases, screen covers, and hands-free devices.

loans.name: Ana Isabel

texts.es: Ana Isabel de treinta y ocho años de edad vive junto a su hijo; ella se dedica a la venta de verduras en el mercado municipal de la localidad, vende tomates, cebollas, pipianes entre  otros,  tiene muchos años de tener el negocio y tiene mucha experiencia en las ventas, se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues siempre tiene en su puesto lo que las personas buscan, todo de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es excelente; Ana es una mujer emprendedora con muchas ganas de salir adelante, quiere triunfar en un futuro corto por eso pone toda su motivación  y esfuerzo en la labor; el mes pasado sus ganancias bajaron por falta de productos que ofrecer,  quiere recuperarse y necesita invertir, por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar verduras por mayor, cebolla, pepino, chile verde, tomates, yuca, etc. Ana Isabel tiene un buen record crediticio, es una persona responsable y con una moral intachable, está segura que podrá cancelar la deuda con éxito y a la vez tiene esperanza que llevará seguridad económica a su hogar.
texts.en:
Ana Isabel is 38 years old and lives with her son.  She sells vegetables in the city market.  She sells tomatoes, onions, squash, and other vegetables.  She has had this business for many years and has a lot of sales experience.  She has acquired a lot of customers because she always has what people are looking for and she offers the best quality products at low prices.  Plus, her service is excellent.

Ana is a hard-working woman that strives to get ahead.  She wants to succeed in the short-term, which gives her a lot of motivation and strength in her work.  Last month her income was lower because she lacked products to sell.  She wants to recuperate from this loss so she needs to invest in more products.  Therefore, she is seeking a loan from INTEGRAL that will enable her to buy vegetables, mostly onions, cucumber, green chilies, tomatoes, yucca, etc.  

Ana Isabel has a great credit history.  She is a responsible person with a spotless moral character and she is sure that she will be able to successfully repay the loan.  She hopes to provide economic security for her household.

loans.use: to buy onion, cucumber, green chili, tomatoes, and yucca.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a car wash machine

loans.name: Sandra Yanira

texts.es: Sandra Yanira de cuarenta y cinco años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos; ella se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras, melones, mangos, sandia, tomates, cebolla, chile verde entre otros, su negocio está ubicado en un mercado cercano a su vivienda y su puesto está en un lugar muy estratégico, ya tiene mucha clientela pues saben que todo lo que comercia es de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es inigualable Sandra siempre está a la orden de las personas; es una mujer activa, responsable y muy entregada a su labor, piensa que su más grande secreto es el amor y la motivación en el trabajo, quiere extender su negocio , y necesita de capital para poder invertir en fruta y verdura por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar fruta y verdura por mayor como sandia, melon, papas, yucam chile verde, tomate, entre otros; Sandra Yanira tiene buenas referencias de pago, y tiene la certeza que podrá pagar el financiamiento y al mismo tiempo darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Sandra Yanira is 45 years old and lives with her partner and their children.  She sells fruits and vegetables such as melon, mangos, watermelon, tomatoes, onion, green chilies, and other things.  She began her business in a market close to her home and now her booth is in a strategic location.  She has a lot of customers that know her products are the highest quality and lowest prices.  She also provides unmatched service and is always ready to serve her customers.

Sandra Yanira is a very active woman, she is responsible, and she is very dedicated to her work.  She says that her big secret is that she loves her work and is very motivated by it.  She wants to grow her business and so she needs money to invest in more fruits and vegetables.  Therefore, she is seeking a loan from INTEGRAL which will allow her to buy fruits and vegetables such as watermelon, melon, potatoes, green chilies, tomatoes, and others.  Sandra Yanira has great references and she is certain that she will be able to repay the loan.  She wants to provide her family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables such as watermelon, melon, potatoes, green  chilies, tomatoes, and more.

loans.name: Madlen

texts.en:
Madlen is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her husband Mahmoud appears in her Kiva profile photo.

Madlen is a 30-year-old young woman. She is married to Mahmoud and is the mother to one son and three daughters, their ages between 1-6 years.

Madlen wants to improve her family home living conditions, so she is requesting a loan from FATEN to help her cover the costs of purchasing new living room seats. Taking this loan will offer Madlen and her family suitable and comfortable living room seats, which will reflect positively on their home living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase new living room seats

loans.name: Anahit

texts.en:
25-year-old Anahit runs her own trading business in Ijevan city. She rents a stall where she resells woman’s, men’s and children’s clothes and shoes. Anahit also sells handbags. Once a week Anahit goes to Yerevan where she buys merchandise for her business from wholesale markets. Her business income allows Anahit to meet the major part of her young family’s needs.

Simultaneously with her business, Anahit works at school as a teacher's assistant. Anahit’s husband is a military man. 2 months ago Anahit gave birth to a son and now she is very happy.

Anahit is seeking a 1,000,000 AMD loan, which will allow her to buy a large lot of dressing-up items and pumps to resell, as early summer is a time of high school graduation parties.

loans.use: to buy a large lot of dressing-up items and pumps for high school graduation parties

loans.name: Lubna

texts.en:
Lubna is a thirty-four-year-old woman. She is married and a mother to two sons and one daughter. Her husband is an employee in the local electricity company, but the salary he gets isn't enough to cover the family's needs. For the past two years, Lubna has been making and selling party gifts, which has been a profitable project, but also needs more support to cover the costs.

Lubna is requesting a 1,200 USD loan from FATEN to help her cover the costs of purchasing more party accessories and supplies to make party gifts. This will increase sales especially as occasions and parties increase during the summer season. It will also increase customers requests, which will help to improve the family's income. 

Lubna is photographed next to gifts she makes.

loans.use: To purchase party accessories and supplies.

loans.name: Khachik

texts.en:
For about three years, Khachik and his wife have run their own business: carbonated fruit drink production. Khachik constructed a workshop in the yard of his house. Khachik and his wife make carbonated fruit drinks and bottle them in glass bottles. They sell their production to Ijevan city’s food shops. Thanks to the family business they are able to provide for their big family and to pay for their younger daughter’s education.

Khachik intends to bottle drinks in plastic bottles as well so he needs a loan of 1.000.000 Armenian drams to buy a machine to put lids on plastic bottles. 
 
Khachik is forty-seven years old. He is married and has three children. Khachik and his wife are teachers. Khachik worked at different schools and his wife is still working as a teacher. Their elder daughter is married and she lives separately from her parents. Their younger daughter is a student, and their son is leaving school this year. Khachik’s retired mother also lives with them.

loans.use: to buy a machine to put lids on plastic bottles.

loans.name: Edgardo Isaac

texts.es: Edgardo Isaac tiene 27 años de edad y habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su grupo familiar al lado occidente del país en una zona rural.  Él se dedica al cultivo de la tierra desde hace muchos años. Cada año repite la misma actividad de sembrar, cosechar y poner a la venta una parte de dicha cosecha y la otra la conserva para consumo. Los principales cultivos que cosecha son  maíz y maicillo. Es un joven emprendedor, el cual no tuvo las oportunidades de terminar sus estudios, pero sus padres le enseñaron el oficio de cultivar la tierra. De esta forma es como colabora con la economía del hogar, trabaja muy duro para poder sacar una cosecha abundante que le permita llevar el pan de cada día a su casa. Es uno de los principales soportes de su hogar por lo que ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para que le den un impulso en la inversión de los insumos agrícolas ( abonos, semillas, insecticidas, etc.) necesarios para  dar inicio a la siembra de los granos básicos ya que es la única forma que conoce para ganarse la vida honradamente y desea continuar realizando dicha actividad por mucho más tiempo, para dar a su familia una mejor ayuda económica la cual le permita accesar a una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Edgardo Isaac is 27 years old and lives in his own house together with his family in a rural zone on the western side of the country. He has been earning his living cultivating the land for many years. Each year he repeats the same activities of seeding, harvesting and selling part of his harvest and retaining the other part for consumption. The main crops he grows are corn and sorghum. 

He is a young entrepreneur who did not have the opportunity to finish his studies, but his parents taught him the work of cultivating the land. In this way he contributes to the household income. He works very hard to be able to bring in a good harvest which allows him to put food on the table every day at his home. 

He is one of the key breadwinners of his household and for this reason he has decided to ask for a loan from INTEGRAL to give him a boost in the investment of agricultural supplies (manure, seeds, insecticides, etc.) necessary to plant basic grains. It is the only means of earning a living honourably he knows and he wants to continue working in this way for much longer to help his family financially so that it can have better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy manure, seeds, insecticides, etc.

loans.name: Jose Miguel

texts.es: José Miguel  de cincuenta y cuatro años de edad vive junto a su hijo, él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol tiene muchos años de dedicarse a la agricultura, ama su actividad productiva,  se ha hecho de mucha experiencia valiosa que le ha ayudado a obtener las mejores cosechas, el terreno de cultivo está ubicado en un lugar con alta incidencia agrícola y comercia en todos los alrededores, se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues saben que todo lo que venden es de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además de un excelente servicio; José Miguel es un hombre visionario con grandes metas para el futuro, el desea conquistar sus sueños, quiere ver crecer su negocio pero debido a las lluvias del año pasado ha tenido varias perdidas, por eso quiere invertir de nuevo en insumos y necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, frijol, fertilizante, herramientas etc. José Miguel tiene experiencia crediticia y es un hombre muy responsable con los pagosm  por eso está seguro que podrá saldar la deuda en el tiempo establecido y a la vez ofrecerle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
José Miguel is 54 and lives with his son. He makes a living growing corn and beans. He's been in to agriculture for many years and he loves doing it, He has gained very valuable experiences that have helped him to get the best crops.

His farming land is located in a very farming oriented place and he does business in all the surrounding areas. he has many customers because they know that everything he sells is the best quality and at affordable prices, also he gives them excellent service.

José Miguel is a visionary man with big goals for the future, he wants to realise his dreams, he wants to see his business grow but due to last year's rains he has had several loses, that is why he wants to, again, invest in supplies and he needs capital, that is why he requests this loan with Integral that will allow him to buy corn seed, bean seed, fertilizer, farming tools etc.

José Miguel has a good credit record and he is very responsible with his loan installment's payment, that is why he is sure he will be able to pay up his loan in the established time whilst also giving his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy corn seeds, bean seeds, fertilizer and farming tools

loans.name: Esteban

texts.es: Esteban de cincuenta y siete años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos; él se dedica a la agricultura, específicamente a la venta de maíz y frijol; el terreno que siembra está ubicado en una zona de incidencia agrícola, el comercia en todos los alrededores del lugar, ya tiene mucha clientela fija pues saben que todo lo que vende es de primera calidad, a precios bajos; Estebaban es un hombre trabajador, visionario, siempre está a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades que le ayuden a salir adelante, quiere llegar al éxito en un futuro, en esta nueva cosecha él quiere invertir más para aumentar las ganancias,  pero necesita del apoyo de un capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, frijol, fertilizante, insecticida, herramienta, etc. Esteban es muy responsable y con una moral impecable, tiene muy buenas referencias de pago por eso tiene la certeza que podrá cancelar el financiamiento y al mismo tiempo podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Esteban is 57 years old and lives with his life partner and children. He works in agriculture, specifically the sale of corn and beans. The place where he farms is located in an agricultural area, sales being made all around the place, and he has many customers because they know that everything he sells is of the best quality, and at low prices. Esteban is a hard working man, a visionary, always looking out for new opportunities to help him get ahead, wanting to be successful in the future. With this new crop he wants to invest more to increase his earnings, but he needs the help of capital and that is why he is asking Integral for a loan to permit him to buy corn seed, beans, fertilizers, insecticides, tools, etc. Esteban is very trustworthy with impeccable morals, has very good references and because of this he will be able to make his payments at the same time giving his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy corn and bean seed, fertilizers, insecticides and tools

loans.name: Saeed

texts.en:
Saeed is a thirty-one-year-old young man, he is married and a father to three sons.

For three years, Saeed has been selling electrical supplies, which has been a profitable project and the only source of income for the family. However, he needs more support to continue and cover the costs.

Saeed is requesting a 1,200 USD loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of purchasing more electrical supplies that are in high demand by customers. This will increase sales and improve the family's income.

Saeed is photographed inside his store.

loans.use: To purchase electrical supplies.

loans.name: Marvin Milton

texts.es: Marvin, de 29 años de edad, y habita en casa de habitación de su propiedad junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos: la mayor de 8 años, de 3 ½ años y el menor de 6 meses. Con la llegada de la primera de sus tres hijos, Marvin tuvo que buscar el medio de brindar un hogar seguro y estable a su familia que estaba iniciándose. Por ésta razón, y debido a que sólo ha cursado la educación básica, desde hace 8 años Marvin se dedica al cultivo de la tierra. Cada año cuando se llega la época de lluvia y la tierra es más fértil, inicia la ardua labor agrícola. Para cultivar 1 ½ Manzana de tierra, el cuenta con un pequeño terreno, pero además alquila una parcela; y así podrá sembrar maíz, frijol y loroco. Para ello, es necesario realizar labores de limpieza de la tierra, siembra de semillas, abono y control de plagas. Para esto, Marvin solicita este préstamo que le permita adquirir insumos agrícolas para el desarrollo de la actividad agrícola, como: semillas, abonos, e insumos para control de plagas. Obtener un préstamo, para Marvin significa la oportunidad y la satisfacción de brindar a su familia la seguridad económica de que tendrán alimentación, salud y educación.
texts.en:
Marvin is 29 and lives in his own house with his life partner and children, their oldest one is 8 years old, the second is 3 and a half and the youngest is 6 months.

with the arrival of the first of his 3 children, Marvin had to look for means to give a safe and stable home to his starting family. For this reason and because he only studied the basic educative years, he has made a living cultivating the land for the last 8 years. 

Every year when the rain season comes and the land is the most fertile, he starts the hard agricultural work. He wants to grow one and a half "manzanas" of land [about 1.05 hectares] he has a bit of land but he also rents a plot where he will grow corn, bean and loroco [a vine flower bud from Central America]. 

For him to grow his crops it is necessary to clean the land, to sow the seeds, to fertilize the land and use pest control; This is why Marvin in requesting this loan so he can get agricultural supplies to develop his farming activity, supplies like: seeds, fertilizer and pest control supplies.

To Marvin getting a loan means the opportunity and satisfaction of giving his family economic security, that they will have food, health and education.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers and pest control supplies.

loans.name: Glenda Natali

texts.es: Glenda Natali de veintiséis años de edad vive junto a su hijo en zona rural al occidente del país; ella se dedica a la venta de verduras de forma ambulante en los alrededores de la localidad donde reside , es muy conocida en la zona pues vende  tomates,  cebollas,  chiles entre otros, todo de calidad, fresco y a muy buen precio, Glenda es un persona muy humilde, servicial, y con muchas ganas de salir adelante, quiere lo mejor para su familia, desde hace algún tiempo su casa necesita reparaciones debido a algunos deterioros, uno de los arreglos es el baño se necesita un poco más formal y con privacidad, pero para esto ocupa realizar una inversión y es necesario de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar materiales como ladrillos, cemento, tejas, y hierro. Glenda Natali tiene experiencia con créditos, es responsable en sus pagos y tiene una moral intachable está segura que podrá saldar a tiempo el financiamiento y a la vez podrá darle a su familia un hogar digno.
texts.en:
Glenda Natali is twenty-six years old and lives with her son in a rural zone in the west of the country. She earns her living selling vegetables from place to place in the area surrounding where she lives. 

She is very well known in the area and she sells tomatos, onions and chillis amongst other vegetables, all of good quality, fresh and at a very good price. 

Glenda is a very humble, helpful and and determined woman. She wants the best for her family. For a while now her house has needed repairs due to some deterioration. One of the repairs required is to make her toilet more proper and private. To do so she will need to make an investment and needs money and so she is asking INTEGRAL to provide her with a loan which allows her to buy materials such as bricks, cement, tiles and iron. 

Glenda Natali has loan experience, is responsable in her repayments and has an impeccable carácter. She is sure that she will be able to repay the loan on time and at the same time be able to provide her family with decent housing.

loans.use: to buy materials such as bricks, cement, tiles and iron.

loans.name: Riselda Elizabeth

texts.es: Riselda Elizabeth, de 27 años de edad, vive en casa de habitación de su propiedad, junto a su compañero de vida y su hijo de 4 años. Elizabeth vive de los ingresos que genera su negocio, una tienda de granos básicos y productos comestible de primera necesidad. Su compañero de vida trabaja prestando servicios de seguridad. Elizabeth es una mujer muy trabajadora y honrada. Junto a su familia se esfuerza cada día por mejorar las condiciones de vida bajo las cuales ella creció. Ella logró terminar la educación básica, pero aspira a que su hijo, logrará finalizar una carrera universitaria. Para esto, Elizabeth considera que debe mejorar las condiciones de su casa, y así brindar un espacio saludable y cómodo para que su hijo crezca, a la vez que ellos puedan sentirse orgullosos del fruto de su trabajo. Por esta razón, está solicitando un préstamo que le permita invertir en los materiales necesarios (arena, ladrillos, cemento, et.) para instalar un piso de ladrillo en su vivienda.  Si obtiene el financiamiento que necesita, espera que poco a poco podrá mejorar su vivienda. Y así su hijo pueda crecer y desarrollarse en condiciones mas dignas.
texts.en: Riselda Elizabeth is 27 years old.  She lives in her own home together with her life partner and her 4-year-old son.  Elizabeth lives off the income she makes in her business: a store where she sells basic grains and basic food products.  Her partner works providing security services.  Elizabeth is a very hard-working and respectable woman.  Together with her family, she works hard every day in order to improve the living conditions in which she herself grew up.  Elizabeth managed to complete her 'basic education' (education for students aged 7-15) but she aspires for her son to complete a university degree.  In order to achieve this, Elizabeth believes that she must improve conditions in her home so that she can provide a healthy and comfortable space for her son to grow up in and so that they can feel proud of the fruit of their labor.  She is requesting a loan to invest in buying the materials she needs (sand, bricks, cement, etc.) to install a brick floor in her house.  If she obtains the loan that she needs, she hopes to gradually improve her home so that her son can grow up in more decent conditions.

loans.use: to buy sand, bricks, cement, etc.

loans.name: Héctor Osmel

texts.es: Héctor Osmel, de 19 años de edad, vive en casa de habitación de su propiedad junto a otro pariente. Su casa, como la mayoría de casas en su comunidad, no cuenta con acceso a los servicios básicos de una vivienda por estar ubicada fuera de la ciudad. Proviene de una familia muy humilde y sencilla, donde aprendió a valorar la tierra y todo lo que ella produce. Ya que de el buen cuido que hace de éste recurso, depende su futuro. Héctor, se dedica al trabajo agrícola. Desde hace 4 años, cultiva maíz y loroco. La agricultura es su única fuente de trabajo, y por consecuencia, su única fuente de ingresos. Es por ello, que se ve en la necesidad de solicitar este préstamo, que le permita continuar con ésta actividad productiva, garantizando que tendrá los recursos económicos para la compra de semillas, abonos, insecticidas y herramientas de trabajo. Héctor aspira a tener una vida con menos limitaciones de las que ahora tiene, y eso sólo es posible, si obtiene la ayuda que solicita en INTEGRAL, y así puede cada año trabajar en la tierra y en su futuro.
texts.en:
Héctor Osmel is 19 years old. He lives in the home of a relative. His house, like most houses in the community, does not have access to basic housing services because it is located outside of the city. He comes from a humble and simple family, where he learned to value the land and all that it produces, always taking good care of this resource, as his future depends upon it. 

Héctor works as a farmer, for 4 years growing corn and loroco [perennial tropical plant which produces an edible flower used in the cuisine of El Salvador and often used as the stuffing for the popular dish of pupusa], and accordingly, it is his only source of income. This is the reason why he has seen the need to ask for a loan, in order to continue with this productive activity, guaranteeing that he will have the financial resources in order to buy seed, fertilizer, insecticides, and working tools. 

Héctor wants to have a life with less limitations than he has now, and this is only possible if he obtains the help that he is requesting through Integral, and thus be able to work the land each year in the future.

loans.use: to buy seed, fertilizer, insecticides, and working tools

loans.name: Hebert

texts.es:
Hebert tiene 28 años de edad, es conviviente y vive con su pareja y 3 de sus 8 hijos, en casa propia de material rustico y  de corte tradicional, en el anexo Santa Rosa, una zona rural y agrícola del distrito de Mórrope, provincia de Lambayeque, ubicada a 45 minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Hebert tiene en la parte posterior de su casa corrales en los cuales cría animales menores tales como pavos, patos, pollos, etc. también cría ganado vacuno, caprino y porcino. Adicionalmente viaja a Bayovar para realizar labores como peón de pesca.  El nos comenta que su negocio nace ante la necesidad de contar con un ingreso adicional que le permitiera sacar adelante a su familia.

Hebert desea comprar alimento para animales menores con fines de engorde, y así poder venderlos a mejor precio y con esos ingresos poder mejorar la calidad de vida tanto de él como sus menores hijos.  Para lograr su objetivo ha creído conveniente obtener un préstamo de 1500 nuevos soles.

Hebert presenta buenas referencias personales.
texts.en:
Hebert is 28 years old.  He lives with his partner and three of his eight children in his own home.  His house is built in the traditional style and made from rustic materials.  It is located in Santa Rosa, a rural and agricultural area of Mórrope district, in Lambayeque province, 45 minutes from the city of Chiclayo.

Hebert has some pens behind his home where he raises animals such as turkeys, ducks and chickens.  He also raises cows, goats and pigs.  In addition, he also travels to Bayovar to carry out work as a fishing laborer.  He tells us that he started his business because he needed an additional income so that he could provide for his family.

Herbert would like to buy feed to fatten his animals so that he can sell them at a better price.  He will use the income to improve his own quality of life, as well as that of his younger children.  In order to achieve his goal, he has decided to request a loan for 1,500 soles.  Herbert has good personal references.

loans.use: to buy feed with which to fatten his animals

loans.name: Marta Elizabet

texts.es:
La señora Marta tiene 50 años de edad, esta separa de su esposo y tiene una hija. Ella se dedica al comercio informal ya sea de ropa o verduras desde hace aproximadamente cinco años, ya que sus necesidades eran grandes y no contaba con una fuente de ingresos. Esas actividades le generan los ingresos para el alimento diario.  Los materiales que necesita para su negocio, las compra en una ciudad que esta a una hora y media en autobús, esto le implica tiempo y dinero, ella quisiera ampliar más su negocio; pero por falta de dinero no la ha realizado.

Ella solicita un préstamo a Fundación Campo, para comprar lamina y cuartones de madera, para reparar su vivienda, ya que se acerca la época lluviosa y su casa se moja, hasta la madera de su casa se esta cayendo por partes, porque esta bien deteriorada. Con la inversión ella se sentirá muy satisfecha al reparar su vivienda, pues no se le mojaran sus cosas. Por lo que dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida, seguridad y confianza, ya que el negocio lo podrá mantener sin ningún problema y evitara enfermedades a sus hijos por la humedad.
texts.en:
Sra. Marta is 50 years old, separated from her husband, and has a daughter. She is an informal merchant who has been selling clothes and vegetables for approximately five years, given that her needs were great and she had no source of income. These business activities generate the income for her daily needs. In order to purchase supplies for her business, Marta must make an hour-and-a-half trip by bus into the city. This requires time and money, but she wants to expand her business even more. However, she lacks the money to make this happen.

Marta is requesting a loan from Fundación Campo in order to buy sheets and planks of wood for repairing her home. The rainy season is approaching and her house could get drenched to the point that the wood falls apart in some sections because it has greatly deteriorated. With this investment, she will be pleased to be repairing her home so that her belongings can stay dry. Marta will be able to provide her family a better quality of life, security, and reliability. She will be able to maintain her business without any problems and prevent her children from getting sick because of the moisture.

loans.use: to buy sheets and planks of wood for repairing her home.

loans.name: Jose Wilmer

texts.es:
José tiene 36 años de edad, es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos.  José y su familia viven en el caserío Huaca Blanca correspondiente al Distrito de Tambogrande, un distrito dedicado principalmente al cultivo de frutas, las cuales son procesadas para ser exportadas a otros países. Pertenece a la provincia de Piura, en la región del mismo nombre, ubicada a más de tres horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo. Y solo cuenta con servicio de energía eléctrica.

La actividad que desarrolla José es la crianza aves de corral y cerdos los cuales cría, engorda y comercializa en el mercado local, además cuenta con 0,50 has de terreno agrícola sembrado de limón, su conviviente lo apoya en sus actividades.  Con los ingresos que percibe cubren sus gastos personales y familiares.

José desea invertir dinero en la compra de alimentos para ganado menor, lo cual permitirá engordarlos más rápido y mejor, y de esta manera venderlos a un mejor precio, esto le permitirá mejorar su calidad de vida. Es por ello que ha creído conveniente obtener un préstamo de 1000 nuevos soles para lograr su objetivo.
texts.en:
Jose is 36 years old, is in a de facto relationship and has 2 children. Jose and his family live in Caserio Huaca Blanca in the district of Tambogrande, a district with an economy based principally on the cultivation of fruits which are processed for exportation to other countries. It is part of the province of Piura, in the region of the same name, located over three hours from the city of Chiclayo. It has its own electricity service. 

Jose raises poultry and pigs, which he raises, fattens and sells in the local market. He also has 0.5 hectares of agricultural land sown with lemons. His partner supports him in his work. With the income he hopes to cover his personal and family expenses. 

Jose hopes to invest the money in buying animal feed for small livestock so that he can fatten them faster and better, and in this way sell them at a better price. This will allow him to improve his quality of life. For this reason he has considers that it will be useful to obtain a loan of 1000 nuevos soles to reach his goal.

loans.use: to buy animal feed for small livestock.

loans.name: Piarina Anali

texts.es:
Piarina tiene 27 años de edad, es soltera y no tiene hijos a su cargo.  Vive en casa de su mamá en Morropón, distrito que pertenece a la Región Piura, ubicado a 3 horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital del Departamento de Lambayeque.  Dicho distrito cuenta con más de 15 mil habitantes.
Piarina se dedica a la venta de abarrotes y respuestos de ferreteria desde hace 2 años en el distrito de Morropón.  La venta lo realiza en su domicilio.
Piarina desea invertir en su negocio, específicamente en compra de andamios, compra de respuestos, tales como pernos, tubos, alambres, clavos, entre otros, venderlos y de esa forma obtener más ingresos para ella y su familia.  El mercado es bueno para la inversión en este tipo de negocio, ya que la mayoría de comerciantes ofertan su producto en su domicilio y las perspectivas son buenas para la inversión y esto dará como resultado mejores utilidades.  Para lograr su objetivo ha creído conveniente obtener un préstamo de 2000 nuevos soles.
Uno de sus objetivos primordiales es vender más y sobre todo captar más clientes potenciales, y para lograr todo esto, la cliente se esfuerza al máximo y trabaja desde muy temprano.
texts.en:
Piarina is 27 years old, single, and does not have any children in her care.  She lives in her mom's house in Morropón district, in Piura region, three hours from the city of Chiclayo, the capital of Lambayeque department.  This district has 15,000 inhabitants.

Piarina has been selling groceries and hardware products in Morropón district for two years.  She makes her sales from home.

Piarina would like to invest in her business.  In particular, she would like to buy scaffolding poles and hardware such as bolts, pipes, wires, nails, etc.  She will sell these products and thereby make more income for herself and her family.  The market is good for investment in this type of business because most shopkeepers sell their products from home and prospects are good for investment.  Such an investment will help Piarina make better profits.  In order to achieve her goal, Piarina has decided to request a loan for 2,000 soles.  One of her main aims is to sell more and to attract more potential customers.  In order to achieve all this, she works as hard as she is able, starting very early in the morning.

loans.use: to buy scaffolding poles and hardware such as bolts, pipes, wires, nails, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy raw materials such as fabrics, threads, elastic, etc.

loans.name: Rosa Jacqueline

texts.es: Rosa tiene 30 años y vive en Quevedo con su familia. Se dedica a la venta de legumbres. Nos comenta que el negocio lo puso porque le gusta ser independiente y tener sus propios ingresos. Se animo desde muy joven cuando veía el desenvolvimiento de su hermana en el negocio y lo bien que le iba. Deicidio seguir sus pasos y aprender ahora lo realiza de con su esposo en horarios rotativos desde las 3 de la mañana en días de carga y desde las 6 am en días normales. Rosa nos explica que llaman días de carga cuando llegan los productos que normalmente es pasando un día, es aquí donde hay más ventas por el aumento de compradores. Está casada con Victor con el que mantiene una relación favorable y estable ayudándose mutuamente con el objetivo principal de brindar una mejor forma de vida para sus hijos. Tienen 3 hijos, Cristhian y Anahi que asisten a la escuela fiscal y Josue que está a su cuidado. Con el préstamo comprara frutilla, tomate de árbol. Manzana, pera, papas, frutas para aumentar sus ventas. Rosa nos cuenta que su sueño es tener dos negocios grandes para poder progresar con su familia.
texts.en: Rosa is 30 years old and lives in Quevedo with her family.  Her business is selling vegetables.  She tells us that she set up her own business because she likes to be independent and make her own income.  She became motivated when she was very young as she watched her sister develop her own business and saw how well she did.  Rosa decided to follow in her sister's footsteps and learn.  Now Rosa carries out her business together with her husband.  They work shifts, starting work at 3.00am on 'delivery days' and at 6.00am on other days.  Rosa explains that 'delivery days' are the days when produce arrives, every other day.  This is when she makes most sales, owing to the increase in customers.  Rosa is married to Victor and they have a good, stable relationship.  They help each other work together towards their main goal which is to provide their children with a better life.  They have three children: Cristhian and Anahi, who attend a state school, and Josue who they care for.  Rosa will use her loan to buy strawberries, tamarillos, apples, pears and other fruit so that she can increase her sales.  She tells us that her dream is to have two large businesses so that she and her family can make progress.

loans.use: to buy strawberries, tamarillos, apples and pears

loans.name: Don Bosco Group

texts.es: Isabel es integrante de la Alcancía Comunal “Don Bosco” La cual está conformada por 09 personas, siendo la gran mayoría vecinos de la zona. Isabel de 29 años de edad es conviviente con 02 hijos aún dependientes. Actualmente  se dedica a la venta de golosinas y comidas en un colegio cerca de su comunidad. Gracias a este negocio a podido apoyar a su pareja con los gastos del hogar. El dinero que percibe es de mucha ayuda para ella, ya que puede ayudar a sus hijos en su educación. Isabel es una madre emprendedora que tiene como meta estudiar la carrera técnica de cosmetología, pues al culminar pondrá su salón de belleza. Con el crédito que solicito comprara gaseosas, chocolates, caramelos, etc. para poder ofrecer a sus clientes.  Isabel junto a la Alcancía Comunal “Don Bosco” agradecen el crédito brindado.
texts.en: Isabel is a member of the 'Don Bosco' community bank.  This bank has nine members who are mostly neighbors living in the same area.  29-year-old Isabel lives with her partner and two dependent children.  Her current business is selling candies and food in a school near her town.  Thanks to this business, she is able to support her partner with their household expenses.  The money that she makes is very helpful to her as she is able to help her children with their education.  Isabel is an entrepreneurial mother whose goal is to study for a technical degree in cosmetology and set up her own beauty salon.  She will use the loan that she requested to buy soda, chocolates, candies, etc. to sell to her customers.  Isabel and the other members of the 'Don Bosco' community bank are grateful for the loan they have been given.

loans.use: to buy soda, chocolates and candies

loans.name: Jose Asuncion

texts.es:
José es un padre de familia de 45 años de edad que reside junto a su esposa y a su hijo en el caserío San Pablo Hualtaco del distrito agrícola de Tambogrande, una zona agrícola situada en la región Piura, a más de cuatro horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.

Se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de ganado ovino y aves de corral como gallinas, patos, pavos, etc. Criándolos en un ambiente ubicado en la parte posterior de su domicilio y cuando estos ya han alcanzado un buen nivel de desarrollo las ofrece en venta a los negociantes que suelen visitar la zona en donde reside, esta actividad la realiza hace 6 años. Adicionalmente trabaja como agricultor en un terreno agrícola de 3 hectáreas donde siembra limón para después comercializarlo con ayuda de su esposa.

José desea adquirir una moto carguera para el traslado de sus animales y el traslado de la cosecha semanal de limón  hasta el mercado donde se comercializa, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 4500 nuevos soles.
texts.en:
José is a 45-year-old father who lives together with his wife and child in the small village of San Pablo Hualtaco, in the agricultural district of Tambogrande, in Piura region, more than four hours from the city of Chiclayo, the capital of Lambayeque region.

José's business is raising and selling sheep and farmyard birds such as hens, ducks, turkeys, etc.  He raises these animals in an area behind his home and, when they have reached a good level of development, he sells them to traders who visit his area.  José has been in this business for six years.  He also works as a farmer, growing lemons on a 3-hectare plot of farmland.  He sells the lemons with his wife's help.

José would like to buy a motorcycle with cargo trailer for transporting his animals and his weekly lemon harvests to the market where he sells them.  For this reason, he has requested a loan for 4,500 soles from Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle with cargo trailer for transporting his livestock and his weekly lemon harvests to the market where he sells them

loans.name: Fatima

texts.en:
Fatima has been engaged in gardening for a long time. Her husband helps her and with a joint effort they grow Oriental persimmons, figs, plums, mulberries, etc. in Aknaghbyur village (Tavush region). As their garden is not big they are able to sell fruits only in productive years. Therefore Fatima is seeking a 1.000.000 AMD loan to lay out a new, bigger garden. She will use her Kiva loan to buy young plants and fencing for the new garden. Fatima will sell fruits in Aknaghbyur as well as neighboring villages. 

Fatima is 50 years old. She works at a school as an Armenian language and literature teacher. Her husband works in the village's administration. Fatima and her husband have 3 children: two sons and a daughter. Fatima's elder son lives and works in Yerevan. Her daughter is a student and gardening allows Fatima to pay for her daughter's education. Fatima's younger son is a pupil.

loans.use: to buy young plants and fencing for a new garden

loans.name: Emprendedoras Del Milenio Group

texts.es:
La señora Yenny de 39 años de edad natural de la provincia de Satipo (Selva de Junín) está casada y tiene 2 pequeños hijos, ella pertenece a la alcancía comunal EMPRENDEDORAS DEL MILENIO, Yenny se dedica a la confección de prendas de vestir exclusivo de niños (polos, faldas, casacas, etc.) que los vende en la provincia de satipo y zonas aledañas, ella cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo que trabajan duramente en su taller de confecciones que funciona en su casa; ya que las ganancias le ayudan a educar y mantener a su familia, el préstamo solicitado lo invertirá en la compra de insumos para sus confecciones.
En la fotografía la señora Yenny es la segunda de la derecha, viste con un buzo negro con aplicaciones de color morado.
texts.en:
Yenny is 39 years old, married, and has two young children.  She is from Satipo province (the jungle in Junín).  She is a member of the 'Emprendedoras del Milenio' community bank.  Yenny's business is making children's clothing (tops, skirts, jackets, etc.)  She sells these products in Satipo province and neighboring areas.  She has the support of her husband and they both work hard in the dressmaking workshop which is located in their home.  The profits they make help them to educate and support their family.  Yenny will invest the loan that she has requested in buying supplies for her dressmaking business.

In the photograph, Yenny is the second lady from the right.  She is wearing a black and purple jacket.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her dressmaking business

loans.name: Saeed

texts.en:
Saeed is a 35-year-old man. He is married and a father to two sons and two daughters, ages  between two to five years. He is employed, but the salary he gets isn't enough to cover the family's needs.
For the past four years, Saeed has also been selling groceries, which has been a profitable project, but he also needs more support to cover the costs.

Saeed is requesting a 2,000 USD loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of purchasing a selection of  groceries that customers often request that are not currently in stock. He also needs help to cover the costs of buying a refrigerator for keeping frozen food. This will improve the store's condition,  increase sales and improve the family's income.
Saeed is photographed in his grocery store.

loans.use: To buy groceries and a refrigerator for keeping frozen food

loans.name: Gotitas De Amor Group

texts.es: La Señora Judith tiene 38 años es conviviente, tiene 3 hijos. Judith es integrante de la alcancia comunal  "Gotitas de Amor" , grupo conformado por 8 socios que se dedican a diversas actividades de comercio. Judith trabaja vendiendo en un colegio dulces, comida, bocaditos desde hace  4 años inicia este negocio ya que el sueldo de su pareja no alcanzaba para cubrir los gastos basicos, servicios, alimentaciòn, educaciòn ,gracias  a su esfuerzo y dedicacion sus hijos van a la escuela,ha podido terminar los acabados de su casa. Judith a solicitado un nuevo prestamo para comprar insumos (dulces, arroz, leche etc). Judith cumplira sus metas con mucho trabajo y esfuerzo y que los prestamos de Edaprospo y kiva le ayudaran.
texts.en: Judith is 38 years old and lives with her partner.  They have three children.  Judith is a member of the 'Gotitas de Amor' community bank.  This group has eight members who all work in the field of commerce.  Judith works selling sweet treats, food and snacks at a school.  She started her business four years ago as her partner's salary wasn't enough to cover all their basic expenses, bills, food and education.  Thanks to her hard work and commitment, her children go to school and she has been able to put the finishing touches to their home.  Judith has requested a new loan to buy supplies (sweet treats, rice, milk, etc.)  She will achieve her goals with a lot of work and effort, and loans from Edaprospo and Kiva will help her.

loans.use: to buy supplies (sweet treats, rice, milk, etc.)

loans.name: Doaa

texts.en:
Doaa is conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her husband, Hani, appears in her Kiva profile photo, pictured next to his taxi.
Doaa is a 22-year-old young woman. She is married to Hani and a mother of one daughter.
Doaa's husband has been a taxi driver for the past two years, which has been a profitable project and the only source of income to the family. But they need more support.
Doaa is looking to improve her family's source of income for the better by requesting a 2,000 USD youth loan from FATEN to help her husband complete the price of purchasing the taxi. This will give Doaa's husband his own taxi which will enable him to work extra hours and take more requests. This will improve the family's income  and allow them to live in better conditions.

loans.use: To complete the price of purchasing the taxi

loans.name: Katherine

texts.es:
Katherine tiene 23 años, es una mujer trabajadora y dinámica, además de sociable y muy amable.  Es soltera, madre de un hijo (Josmer , de 6 años de edad), vive con sus padres y su hermano.
Se dedica a la venta de madera desde su casa, la compra en un aserradero cercano. Tiene la ventaja de trabajar como despachadora en un aserradero, donde aprendió el negocio y consigue a sus clientes. Se inició hace más de 2 años, de a pocos, viendo la oportunidad de negocio y hasta el momento cuenta con el apoyo de sus padres en el cuidado de la madera almacenada.
Considera a su negocio bastante rentable por la demanda y las buenas ganancias que le deja, además le gusta lo que hace. El problema es cuando algunos de sus clientes la subestiman por su edad, pero no se desanima, pues quiere aumentar el volumen de sus ventas.

Este es su segundo préstamo con la  institución MFP, por tanto espera que pueda cumplir con sus objetivos. Por otro lado, se compromete, una vez más, a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas, como en el anterior crédito que tuvo. Además, le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y solidarias.
Con el monto solicitado, de 1500 nuevo soles, junto a sus ahorros, invertirá en la compra de más madera para atender los pedidos que tiene pendientes.
texts.en:
Katherine is 23 years old.  She is a dynamic and hard-working woman who is also very kind and sociable.  She is single and has one son (6-year-old Josmer).  Katherine lives with her parents and brother.  Her business is selling timber from her home.  She buys the timber from a nearby sawmill.  Katherine has the advantage of working as a dispatcher in a sawmill and this is where she learned the business and gains her customers.  She started two years ago, seeing the business opportunity that existed.  She has the support of her parents in looking after the stored timber.

Katherine believes her business to be profitable.  She has demand and makes good profits.  In addition, she enjoys what she does.  The problem she has is that some customers underestimate her because of her age.  However, she does not become discouraged and she would like to increase her sales volume.

This is Katherine's second loan from MFP.  She hopes that she will be able to achieve her goals.  She pledges, once again, to make her repayments on time as she did with her previous loan.  Katherine enjoys being a member of her community bank because all the members are responsible and supportive people.  She will put the 1,500 soles she has requested together with some savings she has to invest in buying more timber so that she can fill some orders that she has pending.

loans.use: to buy more timber

loans.name: Flor Maria

texts.es:
Flor es una madre de familia de 37 años de edad que reside junto a su familia con su esposo y sus hijos en el sector San Carranco, una zona rural que tiene como principal actividad a la agricultura, pertenece al distrito de Jayanca, en la provincia de Lambayeque y se encuentra situada a más de 50 minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica desde hace cuatro años a la comercialización de verduras y frutas, en especial con la venta de limón en el exterior del mercado de Jayanca teniendo como beneficio ser la única en la zona que vende limón. Con los ingresos que percibe de esta actividad se encarga de ayudar a su esposo con el sostenimiento de la economía de su familia el mismo que se dedica a al a agricultura.

Flor desea comprar más frutas y verduras para incrementar su negocio que le permita seguir comercializando sus productos lo que le permitirá tener mayor margen de ganancias, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles.
texts.en:
Flor is a 37-year-old mother who lives with her family, her husband and her children, in San Carranco which is a rural area where agriculture is the main activity, belonging to the Jayanca district in the Lambayeque province and is found at more than 50 minutes from the city of Chiclayo.

For the last four years, she has worked selling fruit and vegetables, in particular, selling lemons outside of the Jayanca market, she benefits from the fact that she is the only one in the area selling lemons. With the profits she earns from this activity, she ensures she can help her husband support the finances of her family which makes their living in agriculture. 

Flor is keen to buy more fruit and vegetables to grow her business as it will enable her to continue selling her products which will enable her to have a greater profit margin that is why she found it convenient to seek a loan of 1,000 Peruvian nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: to buy products: fruit and vegetables to grow her business.

loans.name: Luis Gustavo

texts.es:
Luis tiene 22 años de edad, es conviviente y reside junto a su cónyuge en el Sector de Cruz Verde del distrito de Illimo, una zona agrícola bastante comercial que pertenece a la provincia de Lambayeque, se encuentra situada a más de cuarenta  minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica a la apicultura y  comercializa miel de abeja dedicándose a esta actividad desde hace más de 2 años, adicionalmente  trabaja ofreciendo el servicio de transporte de pasajeros por la zona del distrito teniendo como herramienta de trabajo una mototaxi. El negocio le ayuda a solventar sus gastos familiares y a apoyar en el sostenimiento de la economía de su hogar.

Luis desea ampliar su negocio de venta de miel de abeja para ello necesita adquirir más colmenas de abejas, lo que le permitirá obtener mayor producción y lograr un mayor utilidad y para lograr su objetivo ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles.
texts.en:
Luis is 22 years old, is in a de facto relationship and lives with his partner. They live in the Cruz Verde sector of the Illimo district, a largely commercialised agricultural zone in the province of Lambayeque. It is situated over forty minutes from Chiclayo. 

His work is beekeeping and selling the honey, having earnt his living this way for over two years. He also has works providing transport to passengers through the district, as he has a mototaxi as his tool. His business helps him to pay family expenses and to support the household financially. 

Luis would like to expand his business of selling honey, and to do so he needs to obtain more beehives, which would allow him to increase his production and earn a greater profit. To reach his goal he is asking Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 1000 nuevos soles.

loans.use: to buy beehives to expand his honey-selling business.

loans.name: Williams

texts.es:
Williams tiene 46 años, es un hombre trabajador, además de alegre y sociable. Está casado con Dolisex, la madre de su único hijo, quien ya es independiente. Vive en compañía de su esposa y su suegro en su casa propia.
Él tiene una línea de transportes en motocarro, su oficina está en su misma vivienda. Se encarga de realizar el papeleo para los permisos de circulación y servicio público a los choferes. Cuenta en la actualidad con 3400 asociados. Se inició hace más de 6 años con un préstamo bancario, ya que tenían necesidades económicas y por idea de su esposa decidieron por este negocio. Al comienzo lo hacía solo, pero ahora ya cuneta con apoyo de una secretaria. Le gusta su labor porque no le ocupa mucho tiempo y puede realizar otras actividades. Tiene planes de ampliar su negocio o constituir otro de servicios múltiples, donde pueda vender seguros vehiculares de motos, lubricantes y servicio de fotocopiado.

Este es su quinto préstamo con la institución MFP, por tanto espera continuar con sus objetivos. Además, comenta sentirse bien con su banco comunal, pues considera a sus miembros buenas personas.
Con el monto solicitado, de 1500 nuevos soles, invertirá en la compra de una máquina fotocopiadora valorizada en 600 nuevos soles, con el resto arreglará su oficina (pintado de pisos, paredes y otros).
texts.en:
Williams is 46 years old, he is a hard-working man, as well as being happy and sociable. He is married to Dolisex, the mother of his only child who is already an adult. Williams lives with his wife and his mother-in-law in their own house. 

He has a three-wheeler transport business with his office located in his own home. He manages the paperwork for the traffic and public service permits for the drivers. He currently has 3,400 members. He started up more than 6 years ago with a bank loan, as they were in financial need, and it was upon his wife's suggestion that they decided to opt for this business. 

In the beginning, Williams worked alone, but he now has a secretary. He likes his work because it doesn't take up too much of his time and he can undertake other activities. He plans to expand his business or set up another one with multiple services where he can sell motorbike insurance, oils and photocopying services. 

This is his fifth loan with the MFP institution, therefore he hopes to continue with his objectives. Moreover, Williams comments that he feels comfortable with his communal bank as he believes its members to be good people. 

With the sum requested, of 1,500 Peruvian nuevos soles, he will invest in the purchase of a photocopying machine worth 600 nuevos soles, and with the rest, he will reorganise his office (paint the floors, walls and others).

loans.use: to organize his office and invest in a new business.

loans.name: Lina

texts.es:
Lina tiene 47 años, es una mujer trabajadora y empeñosa, además de amable y cordial. Está separada del padre de sus tres hijos. Vive en compañía de dos de ellos: Sharon de 20 años y Estalin de 15 años. 
Su negocio es el arreglo y confección de ropa. Se inició con dos máquinas de coser que compró con un préstamo, las cuales instaló en su casa y en la actualidad cuenta con tres máquinas.  Atiende a todos sus clientes de manera amable y cordial, quienes terminan satisfechos con su buen trabajo. Ella estudió costura en un centro de educación ocupacional y lleva 8 años en esta actividad, contando con la ayuda de su hija mayor, quien está aprendiendo y le gusta ese oficio.
Adicionalmente, tiene planes de adquirir otra máquina que le ayude a realizar un mejor acabado en sus prendas.

Este es su préstamo número 19 con la institución MFP, por lo que espera concretar sus planes. Está comenta y se siente bien con su banco comunal, pues considera a sus miembros personas responsables.
Con el monto solicitado, de 1600 nuevos soles, invertirá en la compra de materiales de costura (agujas para máquina, hilos, telas y otros). De esta manera contará con un stock disponible para realizar su trabajo.
texts.en:
Lina, age 47, is a hard-working and diligent woman.  She is also kind and friendly.  She is separated from the father of her three children.  She lives with two of her children, 20 year old Sharon and 15 year old Estalin.

Her business is making clothes and altering clothes.  She started with two sewing machines that she bought with a loan.  She set them up in her house, and now she has three machines.  She tends to all of her customers in a kind and friendly way, and they end up being pleased with her good work.

She studied dressmaking at an occupational education center.  She has been doing this business activity for eight years.  Her oldest daughter helps her. Her daughter is learning this trade, and she and likes.  Lina has plans to get another machine so her garments will have a better finish to them.

This is her 19th loan with MFP, and she hopes to realize her plans.  She says that she feels good with her communal bank.  She considers the members to be responsible people.  She will use the requested 1,600 soles to buy sewing materials (needles for machines, thread, fabric, and others).  This way she will have available stock to do her work.

loans.use: to buy sewing materials.

loans.name: Digna

texts.es:
Digna tiene 39 años, es una mujer trabajadora y dinámica, además de alegre y sociable. Está casada con Rubén, quien es comerciante y el padre de sus tres hijos: Alain de 23 años, Ronald de 21 años y Cindy de 11 años. Vive en compañía de su esposo y sus hijos, más una nuera, a los que quiere bastante.
Su negocio es la venta de abarrotes desde la bodega que implementó en su casa. Se inició con un capital propio, fruto de los ahorros con su pareja y fueron invirtiendo de a pocos, dándole una rotación constante a sus productos y logrado hacer crecer su negocio y tener una buena clientela. Lleva más de 15 años en este negocio y hasta el momento cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo para la atención a los clientes cuando ella está fuera de casa. Le gusta lo que hace, pues le permite estar en la comodidad de su  casa y tener tiempo libre para ocuparlo en otras actividades, además del ingreso económico que le sirve para apoyar a su pareja con los gastos del hogar. Pero lo que no le gusta es cuando sus clientes se retrasan en el pago de sus créditos, pero ella sabe que eso no debe perjudicar sus obligaciones con MFP. 
Este es su préstamo número 19, por tanto espera continuar con sus objetivos. Además, comenta sentirse bien con su banco comunal, pues sus integrantes son personas puntuales con sus obligaciones de pago.
Con el monto solicitado, de 2500 nuevos soles, invertirá en la compra de abarrotes al por mayor para surtir su negocio.
texts.en:
Digna is 39 years old. She is a hardworking and dynamic woman as well as a cheerful and sociable woman. She is married to Ruben, who is a merchant and the father of her three children: Alain,  23, Ronald, 21, and Cindy,11. She lives with her husband and her children, plus a daughter in law. She loves them all very much. 

Her business is selling from a little store she has set up in her house. She started with her own capital, the fruit of her saving with her spouse. They invested little by little, constantly rotating the products and creating her business and establishing a good clientele. She has been in this business for more than 15 years and so far she has had her husband's support for the customers when she is not at home. She likes what she does, because it allows her to stay in her own home and have free time to spend doing other activities. It also brings in income, which she uses to help her spouse with the household expenses. What she doesn't like is when her customers are late paying off their credit with her, but she knows that this shouldn't affect her obligations to MFP. 

This is her 19th loan, so she hopes to continue with her goals. In addition, she comments that she feels good with her communal bank, because its members make their payments on time. With the amount she has asked for, 2,5000 nuevos soles, she will buy vegetables wholesale to stock her business.

loans.use: to buy vegetables for her store.

loans.name: Martha

texts.es:
Martha tiene 31 años, es una mujer muy alegre y trabajadora. Su pareja es Nicanor, quien es agricultor y el padre de sus dos hijos: Kleper de 14 años y Karen de 8 años. Juntos vive en la casa que compraron con mucho esfuerzo.
Su negocio es la venta de mercadería variada: comestibles, medicamentos, ropa, zapatos, cosméticos y otros. Todos estos artículos los lleva a los caseríos en la rivera de los ríos, negocio que aprendió de su padre y lo hace sola desde hace 4 años. Comenzó comprando en pequeñas cantidades y ha logrado crecer a base de mucho esfuerzo. Le gusta lo que hace porque le permite tener los ingresos económicos necesarios para su hogar. Notó la oportunidad de negocio, ya que en esas zonas alejadas, la demanda es grande y los precios de los productos son elevados, por lo que se obtiene mayores ganancias.  Lo que no le gusta es que algunos de sus clientes le piden crédito y cuando llega el momento del pago se retrasan, pero aun así viendo la buena acogida que tiene su negocio desea crecer y tener un local en su casa.

Este es su tercer préstamo con la institución MFP, por lo que espera concretar sus planes. Además, comenta sentirse bien con su banco comunal, pues conoce a la mayoría de sus compañeros y aunque están ingresando algunos nuevos, espera que sean responsables como el resto del grupo.
Con el monto solicitado, de 2000 nuevos soles, invertirá en la compra de abarrotes, ropa y sandalias al por mayor. También de productos de belleza para aumentar su stock.
texts.en:
Martha, age 31, is a very happy and hard-working woman.  Nicanor, her life partner, is a farmer.  He is the father of their two children, 14 year old Kleper and 8 year old Karen.  They live together in the house that took them a great deal of effort to buy.

Her business is selling varied merchandise like food, medicine, clothes, shoes, cosmetics, and others.  She takes all of these items to the rural communities on the riverbanks.  She learned this business from her father.  She has been doing this alone for four years.

She started by purchasing small quantities, and she has managed to grow through a lot of effort.  She likes what she does because it allows her to have the income needed for her household.  She noticed the opportunity for her business because there is a big demand in the remote areas.  The prices for products there are high, so she gets greater income.  

What she does not like is that some of her customers ask for credit, and when it comes time to pay they delay.  Even so, seeing how well-received her business is, she wishes for it to grow and to have a place in her house.

This is her third loan with MFP, and she hopes to realize her plans.  Also, she says that she feels good in her communal bank.  She knows the majority of her colleagues.  New members are joining, and she hopes that they will be as responsible as the rest of the group.

She will use the 2,000 soles she has requested to buy groceries, clothes, and sandals wholesale.  She will also buy beauty products to increase her stock.

loans.use: to buy groceries, clothes, and sandals wholesale, and to buy beauty products to increase her stock.

loans.name: Duo San Juaneras Group

texts.es:
DUO SAN JUANERAS
LA señora Vidalia de 55 años de edad casada, y comerciante desde  hace 22 años, doña Vidalia cuenta con un local en el mercado municipal, donde vende ropa para bebe, ropa interior de dama, ropa para niños, ropa casual, colchas etc. Doña Vidalia también es vendedora de los productos ONMILIFE (medecina natural)el cual ella proporciona a  sus clientes que la visitan en su negocio, ambas se conocieron en los talleres que esta empres brinda a sus vendedores  en donde ellas manifiesta ha aprendido bastante y la motiva a perseverar a seguir trabajando aunque para ello ella necesitan de capital para  lograr sus objetivos  como pequeñas comerciante.
texts.en:
The SAN JUANERAS DUO

 Vidalia is 55 years old. She is married and has been a merchant for 22 years. Vidalia has a locale in the city market where she sells clothing for babies, women's underwear, children's clothing, casual wear, blankets, etc. Vidalia also sells ONMILIFE products (natural medicine) which she supplies to her customers when they visit her business. The members of this duo met in the workshops that the organization offers salespeople. They say that they learned a lot and are motivated to perservere in their work, although they need capital to meet their goals as small businesswomen.

loans.use: to buy a variety of new clothes.

loans.name: Ana Lilian

texts.es:
La señora Ana tiene 47 años de edad, es casada y tiene tres hijos. Ella se dedica a la venta de comida en la Terminal de autobuses desde hace dos años.  Aprendió el oficio debido a la necesidad de llevar el alimento a su familia, pues ella ha sido siempre una mujer muy luchadora. Los materiales para la elaboración de los alimentos los compra en el mercado central, debido a que esta cerca, compra los productos frescos y a su gusto. 

Doña Ana solicita un préstamo a Fundación Campo, para construir una habitación a su vivienda, para que su hija que esta casada viva allí. Ella ha construido su vivienda con mucho esfuerzo y con la ayuda de su esposo que es motorista. Así ella podrá tener un hogar digno para su familia, ya que cada día se dificulta más la construcción por los costos de los materiales y los precios de la tierra. Ella desea mejorar su calidad de vida, vivir con mayor espacio y ordenado. Por supuesto que doña Ana quiere seguir en su negocio ya que la demanda proyectada incrementa y seguir mejorando su vivienda.
texts.en:
Ana is 47 years old, married, and has three children.  She has been selling food in the bus station for two years.  She learned this business because she needed to provide food for her family.  Ana has always been a very tenacious woman.  She buys the supplies that she needs for making her food in the central market because it is close by.  She buys fresh produce that is to her liking.

Ana is requesting a loan from Fundación Campo to build an extra room in her home so that her married daughter can live there.  Ana and her husband, who is a driver, have put a lot of hard work into building their home.  This loan will allow Ana to have a decent home for her family to live in as building houses is becoming more difficult every day owing to the high cost of both materials and land.  She would like to improve her quality of life and have more space and order in her home.  Ana would like to continue in her business as her demand is increasing.  She would also like to continue improving her home.

loans.use: to build an extra room in her home so that her married daughter can live there

loans.name: Josefa

texts.es: Doña Josefa de 30 años es  casada tiene dos hijos uno de ellos ya estudia, su esposo se dedica a la venta de verdura en el mercado CENMA Guatemala ya desde hace 8 años, doña Josefa se dedica a la venta de ropa típica en el mercado municipal desde hace 11 años,  las personas ya la conocen y trabaja al crédito sus ventas con sus clientes más conocidos, ya que algunas personas no pueden pagar al contado el valor de estos trajes típicos, ella solicita un nuevo crédito  para surtir su negocio con nuevos diseños de trajes que sus clientes le piden.(ropa tipica) Doña Josefa se siente feliz porque aunque hay competencia sus ventas no han bajado, ella piensa que es por el servicio que le da a sus clientes,  ella es una mujer muy trabajadora y ella menciona que se siente muy contenta y agradecida por el apoyo que ha recibido con los créditos que se le han otorgado en diferentes ocasiones, por lo que ella siempre cumple con sus pagos cada mes.desde ya les desea bendiciones.y gracias por su ayuda.
texts.en: Josefa is 30 years old. She is married and has two children. On eof them goes to school. Her husband has sold  vegetables in the CENMA Guatamalaya market for 8 years. Josefa has sold traditional clothing in the city market for 11 years. People knw her and she sells on credit to her the customers she knows the best, since some people can't pay the price of this traditional clothing up front. She is asking for a new loan to stock her business with new designs of the clothes her customers ask her for. Josefa is happy because although there is competition, her sales haven't gone down. She thinks it is because of the service she gives her customers. She is a very hardworking woman and says that she is very happy and grateful for the support she has received with the loans that have been given to her at different times. She always makes her payments every month. She sends you her blessings and thanks you for her help.

loans.use: to sell traditional clothing

loans.name: Ramón

texts.es:
El señor Ramón tiene 35 años de edad, es casado y tiene tres hijos. Él se dedica a la agricultura desde su niñez, aprendió el oficio de su padre, quien desde que él tubo uso de razón se dedico a ayudarle en los trabajos agrícolas por la mañana estudiaba y por las tardes se dedicaba a realizar los trabajos familiares. También aprendió el oficio de fontanero y albañil, así que él tiene distintas formas como desempeñarse trabajando para poder salir adelante. 
Don Ramón tiene un hogar bien constituido por su esposa e hijos y tiene que buscar la manera de llevar el sustento a su hogar y poder darles una buena educación a sus hijos. Ellos estudian en el centro escolar de la comunidad, por ese motivo él se dedica a trabajar muy duro para poder salir adelante con todos esos gastos.
 El compra los materiales que utiliza en cada uno de sus trabajos en la ciudad más cercana que esta a unos 15 kilómetros de su casa y tiene que trasladarse en autobús todo el camino y retornar a su casa de la misma manera  llevando su mercadería en el mismo medio de transporte.
 El préstamo que esta solicitando don Ramón es para comprar cemento, hierro, arena y cancelar a la persona que le ayude en la construcción, ya que el principal albañil será é. de esta manera continuara con la construcción de su vivienda, la cual ya tiene un poco avanzada pero le hace falta un poco de dinero. La principal necesidad que será satisfecha es que él podrá comprar todos los insumos que necesita para la construcción de su vivienda y así poder tener su hogar donde ir a vivir junto con su familia ya que por el momento están viviendo en la casa de la hermana mientras termina de construir su casa.
Él manifiesta que su vida mejorara, ya que el podrá terminar la construcción de su casa y tendrá un hogar digno en donde vivir junto a su familia.
Su deseo es  tener terminada su casa y poder ver a sus hijos jugar en lo propio. También planea ampliar más su vivienda, ya que continuara trabajando para poder tener un mejor ingreso y poder ampliar más su construcción y llevar siempre el sustento a su familia.
texts.en:
Sr. Ramón is 35 years old, married, and has three children. He has been involved in agriculture since childhood, having learned the trade from his father who he helped with the work around the farm. In the morning he would be studying, and then help with the family chores in the afternoon. Ramón also learned the skills required to be a plumber and bricklayer, so that he could rely on different ways of working in order to get ahead.

Don Ramón has a a good home life with his wife and children. He looks for ways to maintain his household and provide a good education for his children. They study at the central school in their community, so he has decided to work very hard to stay on top of all the expenses.

Ramón purchases materials for each of his jobs in a city that is about 15 kilometers from his house. He must travel by bus both ways and carry his merchandise using the same method of transport. Don Ramón is requesting a loan in order to buy cement, iron, and sand. He will also pay another person to help with construction since he is the primary builder. This will enable him to continue with the construction of his home, which has made a bit of progress, but he lacks the money. The main need to be satisfied is the purchase of necessary supplies for building his home. Ramón and his family are living at his sister's house at the moment until his house is completed. He says that his life will improve once the construction of his house is finished. Ramón will have a decent home where he can live with his family. His wish is to finish the construction of his house so that his children can have a place of their own to play. He also wants to expand his home even more. By continuing to work and earn more income, he will able to add more room to his house and still sustain his family.

loans.use: to buy cement, iron, and sand, and to pay someone to assist him with building his home.

loans.name: Mary

texts.es:
Mary tiene 33 años, es una mujer alegre, trabajadora y con muchas ganas de progresar. Es soltera, vive en la casa de sus padres en compañía de sus cuatro hermanos, a quienes quiere mucho y apoya en sus estudios.
Su actividad es la compra y venta de madera, la cual que adquiere en los aserraderos de su localidad y también compra a los extractores. Comparte este negocio con su padre, donde ambos invierten. Tiene más de dos años dedicándose a esto y le gusta porque le genera un ingreso económico adicional, además de realizarlo con su familia. Lo considera bastante rentable, por la demanda y el precio elevado que tiene este producto, dejándole buenas ganancias. Pero lo que no le gusta es la informalidad, deseando en un futuro poder regularizarse y aumentar sus ventas.

Este es su préstamo número 6 con la institución MFP, por lo que espera poder cumplir con sus objetivos. Además, nos comenta sentirse a gusto con su banco comunal, pues lo considera un grupo unido y solidario.
Con el monto solicitado, de 1500 nuevos soles, invertirá en la compra de más madera, buscando los precios más bajos por su compra al contado y en volumen.
texts.en:
Mary, age 33, is a very happy and hard-working woman with a great desire to progress.  She is single, and she lives in her parents’ house with her four siblings.  She loves them very much, and she supports them in their education.

Her business activity is buying and selling wood.  She gets the wood in the local sawmills.  She also buys from the tree extractors.  She shares this business with her father, and they both invest in it.  She has been doing this for over two years.  She likes it because it generates an additional income for her and because she does it with her family.

She considers it to be very profitable.  Due to the demand and the high price that this product has, it gives her good income.  What she does not like is the irregularity.  In the future she wishes to be able to make it more regular and to increase her sales.

This is her 6th loan with MFP.  She hopes to be able to meet her objectives.  Also, she tells us that she feels comfortable with her communal bank.  She considers the group to be united and supportive.  She will use the 1,500 soles that she requested to buy more wood.  She will be looking for lower prices because she will be buying in volume and for cash.

loans.use: to buy wood.

loans.name: Mujeres De Choestancia Group

texts.es:
La señora Sonia Araceli esta casada, tiene 34 años de edad, cursó los 3 años de educación primaria, tiene 3 hijos, 2 de los cuales están estudiando, se dedica al comercio, a la venta de ropas, inició este negocio con poco capital y hasta el momento lleva 10 años de experiencia.

Organiza un grupo para solicitar un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de mas mercadería, suéteres, playeras, blusas, servilletas, etc. Espera en el futuro tener un negocio con mas variedad. Las demás integrantes del grupo se dedican a la crianza de animales y al comercio.
texts.en:
Sonia Araceli is 34 years old, married, and has 3 children who are in school. Sonia completed 3 years of primary education, and makes a living by selling clothes. She started this business with little capital and now she has 10 years of experience.

She organizes a group to request a loan that she will use to buy more merchandise, sweaters, sneakers, blouses, napkins, and other items. She hopes that her business will have more variety in the future. The other members of the group make a living by raising animals and commerce.

loans.use: to buy merchandise

loans.name: Florinda

texts.es: La Señora Florinda se dedica a la venta de frijol  en el mercado  Municipal de Santiago Sacatepequez desde hace 8 años,  es casada y  tiene dos hijas una de ellas ya asiste a la escuela, su esposo se dedica a la albañilería.
