Las demás integrantes del grupo se dedican a la crianza de animales, confección de prendas y a la atención a tienda en general.
texts.en:
Aura is single, and is 22 years old.  She completed 6 years of elementary school.  She raises animals and also tends to a general store.  She started this store selling only candy, and as of now she has 6 years of experience with it.  In this future, she hopes to have a grocery store.  

She organized this group so that they could request a loan.  She will use the loan to buy more products for her store, including: mineral water, juices, candy, dairy products, noodles, etc.  She will also buy pigs to raise.  The other members of this group specialize in raising animals, making garments, and tending to a general store.

loans.use: to buy products for her store, and to buy pigs to raise

loans.name: Guillermo Enrique

texts.es: Guillermo Enrique, de 32 años de edad, vive en casa de habitación de su propiedad, junto a su esposa. Se esfuerza cada día por construir un buen futuro para sus hijos, por lo que, trabaja con mucho empeño cada día. Cada vez que surge una oportunidad, acepta contrataciones para realizar labores de jornal, sin descuidar sus propias labores de agricultor. El maíz es parte de la alimentación de ésta familia, pero también es una de sus principales fuentes de ingresos, por lo que cada año, apoyándose de su terreno, más una pequeña parcela que arrenda, logra cultivar hasta 1 manzana de maíz. Recolectar la cosecha y luego venderla, significa para ellos la oportunidad de tener acceso a servicios básicos de alimentación, salud, educación, vestuario y entretenimiento. Con los ingresos que obtiene de su trabajo de jornal y de agricultor, logra cubrir algunos costos para la siembra, pero no es suficiente para invertir en la adquisición de semillas, fertilizantes, insecticidas y otros insumos agrícolas. Por ésta razón, Guillermo solicita este préstamo que le permita adquirir la materia prima e insumos para la siembra, lo cual significa para él, brindar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Guillermo Enrique, age 32, lives with his wife in his own house.  He puts forth great effort every day in order to build a better future for his children.  Consequently, he works with great determination each day. 

Every time that an opportunity arises, he agrees to be hired as a day worker.  He does this without neglecting his own farm work.  Corn is part of the food for his family, but it is also one of his main sources of income.  Every year, by maintaining his land and a small parcel that he rents, he manages to cultivate one “manzana” (one manzana is about 1.75 acres) of corn.  He gathers the harvest and then sells it.  For them this signifies the opportunity to have access to basic food, health, education, clothing, and entertainment services.

With the income that he gets from being a farm day worker he manages to cover some of the planting costs.  However, it is not enough to buy seeds, fertilizers, insecticides, and other agricultural supplies.  That is the reason that Guilleromo is requesting this loan.  He will use the loan to buy raw materials and supplies for sowing.  To him this means providing his family with better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, and insecticides, etc.

loans.name: Azat

texts.ru:
Азат 58 лет, воспитала 6 детей. Азат в качестве основного источника дохода для своей семьи, с 1991 года занимается животноводством и земледелием, начав этот бизнес с покупки 2 коров. На сегодня в хозяйстве Азат насчитывается 10 голов мелкого рогатого скота, 6 коров, 4 теленка, также Азат обрабатывает 3,0 га земли с кукурузой, огруцами и помидорами. Ежемесячная прибыль от хозяйства составляет - около 10,000 сом (KGS) в месяц. 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Азат обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 70,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку удобрения для земли и  закуп стройматериалов для ремонта сарая в целях обеспечения хороших условий для скота.  Доходы от кредита Азат  планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение бизнеса за счет постройки загона.
texts.en:
Azat is 58 years old, and has raised six children. As the main source of income for her family, Azat has been working in animal husbandry and farming since 1991. She started her business with the purchase of two cows. Today Azat's business has 10 goats and sheep, six cows, and four calves. Azat also grows corn, cucumbers, and tomatoes on 3 hectares of land. Her business' monthly profit is about 10,000 somi (KGS) a month.

To further develop her business, Azat has asked Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan of 70,000 somi (KGS) to buy fertilizer and construction materials for repairing her barn to improve the living conditions for her livestock. Azat plans on investing the proceeds from the loan into further expanding her business by building a new livestock pen.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and construction materials

loans.name: Jose Alberto

texts.es: Jose tiene 33 años de edad y es mecánico de profesión. Está separado en la actualidad y sus hijos viven con la mamá. Su taller de electromecánica lo tiene ubicado en su domicilio ciudad Libertad.  Sus primeros pasos los dio trabajando para otra persona donde aprendió la mecánica reparando e instalando motores en los vehículos. Jose nos cuenta que le gusta mucho su trabajo, sobre todo la satisfacción que le causa cuando sus clientes agradecen y pagan su excelente servicio. Trabaja de lunes a sábado junto a un empleado a quien le enseña el labor. Tiene 12 años de experiencia y es gracias a esto que mantiene su clientela. El nos comenta que hasta el momento no ha sufrido ningún problema con la delincuencia. Sus 2 hijos a quienes ve los domingos estudian en la escuela fiscal. No se ha desentendido de ellos ya que les pasa la manutención. Con el crédito comprara maquinaria para su mecánica esperando acaparar la clientela que no iba por la falta de ellas. Su sueño futuro es tener una mecánica grande donde pueda abastecer la cantidad de autos y maquinaria que tiene.
texts.en:
Jose is 33 years old and a mechanic by profession. He is currently separated and his children live with their mother. 

His electromechanical workshop is located in his hometown of Libertad. He first worked for another person where he learned the mechanics of repairing and installing engines in vehicles. Jose tells us that he likes his work very much, being especially satisfied when his clients acknowledge and pay for his excellent service. He works from Monday through Saturday with an employee and is teaching him the work. He has 12 years experience and thanks to this he keeps his clientele. He tells us that so far he has not had any problems with criminal activity. 

He visits his 2 children on Sundays and they are school students. He has not forgotten about them and he financially supports them. 

With this loan he will buy some equipment he needs to do mechanical work so he can steal the clients that don’t come to him as he lacks the tools. His dream is to have a large workshop where he can supply the large quantity of autos and machinery that exists.

loans.use: to buy machinery for cleaning panel trucks

loans.name: Duo Flor Del Café Group

texts.es: Duo Flor del Cafe, este duo esta integrado por doña Jesus ella se dedica a la venta de verduras en el mercado Municipal del municipio donde ella vive,ella sale a vender todos los dias desde muy temprano sale a vender ya que es muy conocida por sus clientes nos cuenta que en el puesto que tiene en el mercado es visitado por casi toda la poblacion, le da gracias a Dios porque cada año que pasa poco a poco ban creciendo y nos cuenta que kiva a sido de muchas vendiciones en su vida y les agradesen por el apoyo que les han brindado, esta solicitando este credito para la compra de mas verduras en variedad por mayor ya seguir aumentado su capital.
texts.en: The Flor del Cafe duo includes Ms. Jesus who sells vegetables in the city market where she lives.  She goes out to sell early every day and her customers know her very well.  She says that her market stall is visited by nearly everyone and thanks God because her business grows little by little each year.  She says that Kiva has been one of her greatest blessings and she appreciates the support.  She is asking for this loan so she can buy more and a greater variety of vegetables and to increase her working capital.

loans.use: to buy vegetables.

loans.name: José Santos

texts.es: José Santos, vive en casa de habitación familiar, junto a su compañera de vida, su hijo de 13 años, y su hija de 9. El es un hombre muy trabajador, impulsado cada día a salir del hogar para ir a trabajar como jornalero, y en sus fines de semana se dedica a actividades agrícolas, cultivando maíz. De la siembra y cosecha anual del maíz, José Santos obtiene los ingresos para cubrir la manutención de su esposa e hijos, compensando los días en que no consigue trabajo como jornal.  José anhela que sus hijos tengan una buena educación y mayores oportunidades para que, cuando crezcan puedan llevar una vida con menores dificultades económicas de las que ellos actualmente viven. Es por ello, que él decide buscar un préstamo, el cual le permitirá invertir en la adquisición de insumos agrícolas como semillas, fertilizantes, insecticidas y herramientas de trabajo. Confía que con la ayuda de esta institución y su arduo trabajo logrará una cosecha abundante, la cual le permitirá cancelar el préstamo y continuar llevando el sustento a su hogar.
texts.en: José Santos lives in a family house, together with his life partner, his 13 years old son, and his 9 years old daughter. He is a very hard working man, he feels driven every day to get out of the house and go to work as a day laborer, and during the weekends he works in agricultural activities, growing corn. From the sowing and the yearly harvest of corn, José Santos gets the income to support his wife and children, making up for the days in which he doesn't find work as a day laborer. José yearns for his children to have a good education and more opportunities so that, when they grow up, they can have a life with less financial problems than those they currently face. That's why he decides to seek a loan to allow him to invest in the acquisition of agricultural supplies such as seeds, fertilizers, insecticides and tools to work with. He is confident that with the help of this institution and his hard work he will achieve a plentiful harvest, which will allow him to pay back the loan and continue to support his home.

loans.use: to buy: seeds, fertilizers, insecticides and tools to work with

loans.name: María Estela

texts.es: María Estela tiene 35 años de edad, terminó sus estudios de bachillerato, tuvo dos hijos, y ahora se dedica al comercio. Estableció hace 2 años una tienda, que funciona de lunes a domingo, de 7:00am a 9:00pm. En la tienda comercializa productos comestibles de primera necesidad y artículos de limpieza e higiene, tales como pan dulces, galletas, sardinas, salsas, condimentos, golosinas, dulces, pastas dentales, jabones, detergentes y otros. Ella, es una mujer muy responsable y trabajadora, y vive en casa de habitación familiar de su propiedad, junto a su compañero de vida e hijos. María Estela, tiene aspiraciones de brindar a sus hijos la oportunidad de obtener mejores condiciones de vida, de las que ella en su calidad de micro empresaria, y su compañero de vida que es empleado de un hotel, han obtenido. Por éste motivo, ella desea obtener un préstamo que le permita invertir en adquisición de mercadería para la venta, lo cual le permitirá posicionar su tienda con mayor preferencia entre sus clientes y obtener los ingresos mensuales necesarios para lograr sus aspiraciones.
texts.en: Maria Estela is 35 years old, and she has a high school degree.  She has 2 children, and now works in retail trade.  Two years ago, she established a store that is open each day from 7am until 9pm.  In the store she sells staple groceries and cleaning and hygiene products.  For example, she sells: sweet breads, cookies, sardines, sauces, condiments, candy, sweets, toothpaste, soap, detergent, and other items.  She is a very hardworking and responsible woman.  She lives in the family home, which is her own property, along with her life partner and their children. Maria Estela aspires to provide her children with the opportunity to obtain better living conditions than she, working as a small businesswoman, and her husband, an employee of a hotel, have had.  For this reason, she wants to get a loan that will allow her to acquire merchandise to sell.  This will allow her to position her store to receive the business of more customers, so that she can have the higher monthly income she needs to fulfill her aspirations.

loans.use: to buy sweet breads, cookies, sardines, sauces, condiments, candy, sweets, toothpaste, soap, detergent, and other items

loans.name: Ana Silvia

texts.es: Ana Silvia, es una mujer trabajadora y sencilla, que se esfuerza cada día por obtener una vida de mejores oportunidades. Ana no pudo finalizar la educación básica, terminando hasta el 8 grado, por lo que su mejor opción de trabajo, debido a que en ello cuenta con la experiencia de toda su vida, es cultivar la tierra. Ella tiene 28 años de edad, vive en casa de habitación familiar de su propiedad, junto a su esposo y sus dos hijos. Realiza todas las labores domésticas de su hogar, pero además, cultiva la tierra y cría peces para la venta. Lograr una vida de mayor calidad para ella y sus hijos, es su inspiración diaria para el trabajo. Por esto, Ana busca un préstamo que le permita invertir en abonos para desarrollar sus cultivos con una mejor calidad. Obtener una buena cosecha significa para ella, contar con la oportunidad de satisfacer las necesidades básicas de su hogar, brindando a sus hijos la seguridad y protección que como madre desea darles.
texts.en: Ana Silvia is a hard-working and modest woman who works hard every day for a life of better opportunities. Ana could not finish her basic education, finishing up to the 8th grade, and so her best option for work is cultivating the land due to her lifelong experience in this area. She is 28 years old and lives in a family house which she owns with her husband and two children. She carries out all the domestic chores in her household as well as cultivating the land and breeding fish to sell. Achieving a better quality of life for herself and her children is what inspires her to work every day. For this, Ana is looking for a loan which will allow her to buy manure so that she can grow better quality crops. Getting a good harvest gives her the opportunity to satisfy the basic needs of her household, as well as to provide her children with the security and protection which as a mother she wishes to give them.

loans.use: to buy manure for her crops.

loans.name: Ainagul

texts.ru:
Айнагуль 65 лет. Айнагуль в качестве основного источника дохода для своей семьи, с 1986 года занимается животноводством, начав этот бизнес с суммы 9,000 сом (KGS). На сегодня в хозяйстве Айнагуль насчитывается 10 голов мелкого рогатого скота, 2 коровы, 1 лошадь, 20 овец. Ежемесячная прибыль от продажи молока и молочных продуктов составляет около 15,000 сом (KGS) в месяц. 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Айнагуль обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 30,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку телят.  Доходы от кредита Айнагуль  планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение бизнеса.
texts.en:
Ainagul is 65 years old. As the main source of income for her family, Ainagul has been working in animal husbandry since 1986, after starting her business with 9,000 somi (KGS). Today Ainagul's business has ten goats, two cows, one horse, and  one sheep. Her monthly profits from the sale of milk and dairy products are about 15,000 somi (KGS).

To grow her business, Ainagul has asked Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan of 30,000 somi (KGS) to buy calves. Ainagul plans to invest the proceeds from the loan into the continued growth of her business.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Clara

texts.es: Clara, de 51 años de edad, ella se dedica a la venta de refacciones en una escuelita de la localidad y tambien se dedica a la crianza de animales (pollos) ella nos cuenta que con la ayuda de su familia a logrado salir adelante ya que todos los dia hace los preparativos de su negocio y ahora ya es bien conocida por las personas de la localidad nos comenta que la vida hoy en dia es muy dura y es muy dificil de conseguir un trabajo, por eso ella hace todo lo posible de mandar a sus hijos a la escuela para que en un futuro tengan mejores oportunidades de empleo,ella esta solicitando este credito para la compra de materia prima para la elavoracion de refacciones y para surtir un poco mas su negocio para poder obtener un poco mas de ganancias.
texts.en:
Clara, 51, sells snacks at her local school and also raises animals (chickens). She tells us that, with her family's help, she has been able to get ahead, and everyday she does the preparations for her business. She is well known in her community. She says that it is very hard to find work now, and she does everything she can to keep her children in school so that, in the future, they have better employment prospects.

She is requesting this loan to purchase commodities to make snacks and to have a little more stock for her business so that she can make a little more profit.

loans.use: to make and sell snacks.

loans.name: Nasiba

texts.ru: Насиба-женщина средних лет,замужем и воспитывает троих детей. Она работает техничкой в областной физиотерапевтической больнице. Её заработная плата  уходит только на повседневные нужды.Ее муж находиться на заработках в Российской Федерации и каждый месяц по возможности он присылает деньги своей семье.Дети помогают маме по дому.Дом у Насибы нуждается в ремонте и она хочет обновить свой дом,улучшить свои условия проживания.Она сама не может накопить большую сумму и поэтому обратилась в нашу организацию.Очень надеется на нашу помошь и поддержку.
texts.en:
Nasiba is a middle-aged woman. She is married and has three children. She works as a technician in the regional physiotherapy hospital. Her salary goes only for the daily needs. Her husband is working in the Russian Federation and every month as possible he sends money to his family. The children help their mother around the house. 

Nasiba's home is in need of repairs and she wants to upgrade their home and improve their living conditions. 

She is not able to accumulate a large amount and therefore she appealed to Arvand. Arvand hopes to be of some help and support.

loans.use: home repairs

loans.name: Blanca Lidia

texts.es: Blanca Lidia tiene 43 años de edad y habita con su esposo quien es agricultor. Sus hijos son mayores de edad y ya hicieron sus propios hogares. La señora Blanca se dedica al comercio de tienda, la cual mantiene bastante surtida. Además de su tienda también elabora y vende tortillas. Es bien conocida en la zona como una mujer trabajadora, responsable e higiénica. Es muy emprendedora ya que ha sabido mantener su negocio activo por mucho tiempo y es una de las más preferidas de la zona donde habita ya que gracias a su carisma ha sabido ganarse la confianza de sus vecinos los cuales cada día la prefieren más. Es muy trabajadora y dedicada en sus labores. Posee muchas metas, una de ellas es continuar siendo la preferida de la zona en el negocio de  tienda y tortillería. Para lograr lo anterior, solicita este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su tienda en la compra de mercadería de tienda como: granos básicos, aceite, pan, macarrones, café, productos de higiene y limpieza, gas propano y maiz. para incrementar el inventario y así poder continuar siendo la número 1 en servicio de tienda y tortillería y  poder seguir llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar.
texts.en: Blanca Lidia is 43 years old and lives with her husband, who is a farmer.  Her children are now adults, and already have their own homes.  Blanca has a store which she keeps well-stocked.  In addition to this, she also makes and sells tortillas.  She is well-known in her neighborhood for being a woman who works very hard in a sanitary way, and is also very responsible.  She is very enterprising, because she has known how to keep her business running for a long time.  It is one of the most popular businesses in the area where she lives because, due to her great charisma, she has known how to win the confidence of her neighbors, who every day prefer her business more.  She is very hardworking and dedicated to her labors.  She has a lot of goals; one of them is to continue being the preferred store and tortilla business in her neighborhood.  To achieve this, she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL to invest in her store by purchasing merchandise such as: staple grains, cooking oil, bread, pasta, coffee, hygienic and cleaning products, propane gas, and corn.  This way she will increase her inventory so that she can continue to be number one in servicing her store and her tortilla business, and so that she can continue to bring daily sustenance to her household.

loans.use: to buy staple grains, cooking oil, bread, pasta, coffee, hygienic and cleaning products, propane gas, and corn

loans.name: Elsy Elizabeth

texts.es: Elsy Elizabeth tiene 35 años de edad  y habita junto con su esposo, dos hijas de 11 y 18 años y dos hijos de 14 y 16 años de edad. Tiene mucha experiencia  en los negocios. Desde hace años, se dedica a la venta frutas y verduras. Su puesto lo tiene ubicado en las afueras del mercado municipal de la zona donde habita. Su negocio es muy conocido y transitado ya que ella siempre mantiene frutas y verduras frescas a los mejores precios. Para ayudar a sus hijos a terminar sus estudios ha decidido invertir en su negocio en la compra de mercadería al por mayor, aprovechando la demanda que hacen sus clientes y vistas las necesidades básicas del hogar. Solicita este crédito a INTEGRAL para hacer dicha inversión en frutas y verduras, para impulsar su negocio al crecimiento y poder alcanzar su sueño de dar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida y terminar de dar la educación a sus hijos e hijas.
texts.en:
Elsy Elizabeth is 35 and lives with her husband, two daughters ages 11 and 18, and two sons ages 14 and 16. She has a lot of business experience. She has been selling fruits and vegetables for years. Her stand is located on the outskirts of her local city market. Her business is very well known and busy because she always offers fresh fruits and vegetables at the best prices. 

To help her children finish their education, she has decided to invest in her business and purchase wholesale products, taking advantage of her customers' demand for their basic household needs. She is requesting this loan from INTEGRAL to make this purchase of fruits and vegetables, to grow her business, to achieve her dream of providing better conditions for her family, and to finish educating her daughters and sons.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Ezequiel

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 3 filhos que frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
 É policial e quadro do Ministerio do Interior, com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construcao (chapas de zinco, ferro, barrotes, portas, cimento e outros) para continuar com a obra da sua casa. 
No futuro pretende crescer profissionalmente ate a um supertendente da polícia, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku
O desafio é melhorar a vida iniciar uma actividade comercial e criar animais de grande porte.
texts.en:
Ezequiel is married and has three children who go to school. He lives in his own house with his family and does not support anyone else. 

He is in the police, as part of the Ministry of the Interior. With this loan he intends to buy construction material (doors, cement, iron, paint etc.) to continue the work on his house. 

In the future he wants to grow in his professional life and become a superintendent. With this he promises to repay this loan so that he can ask for more loans in future. The challenge is to improve his life, start a business and rear livestock.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (tiles, iron, doors, cement and others) to continue work on his house

loans.name: Paquix De Jutacaj Group

texts.es:
La señora Anastacia esta casada, tiene 31 años de edad, curso solamente un año la educación primaria, tiene 5 hijos 3 de lo cuales están estudiando, se dedica  a la venta de relojes y accesorios de teléfonos, juntamente con su  esposo, inicio este negocio junto con su esposo y llevan 8 años de experiencia.

Organiza un grupo para poder solicitar un préstamo que lo utilizaran para la compra de relojes y cadenas, y así mejorar sus ventas y sus ganancias, Esperan en el futuro tener un negocio bien acreditado y rentable. Los demás integrantes se dedica al comercio, y a la crianza de animales.
texts.en:
Anastacia is married, 31 years old, and attended only one year of primary education. She has 5 children, 3 of whom are studying. She and her husband sell watches and accessories for telephones. Anastacia began the business jointly with her husband and she now has 8 months experience.

She organized a group so that she could solicit a loan to use to buy watches and chains, and thus improve her sales and their earnings. They hope in the future to have a good, recognized, and profitable business. The remaining members of the group are dedicated to commerce and animal raising.

loans.use: to buy merchandise, including watches and chains, to sell.

loans.name: Solidario Solidarista Group

texts.es:
Solidario  Solidarista

Este grupo esta conformado por tres integrantes Graciela, Manuela y Ana,  las cuales se dedican a diferentes actividades  económicas 
Ana se dedica a la venta de queso, crema y venta de cosméticos, ella inicio su negocio hace 4 años aproximadamente, es casada  tuvo 8 hijos de los cuales uno es el que vive con ella él le ayuda a vender tres veces por semana  y ella vende por las tardes en su domicilio,  también  tiene un trabajo de medio tiempo el cual le permite  ayudarle a su hijo a seguir estudiando.  Ella realiza estas actividades económicas para que su hijo tenga un mejor futuro y pueda seguir ayudándola  y así juntos  abrir  un local en el cual ella pueda distribuir lácteos, embutidos etc. Ella solicita el crédito para poder invertir en la compra de mas lácteos, agradece a Dios la oportunidad tan grande de obtener una fuente mas de trabajo.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Solidario Solidarista" is made up of 3 members: Graciela, Manuela and Ana.  Each of them has a different type of business.  

Ana has a business selling cheese, cream and cosmetics.  She started her business about 4 years ago.  She is married and has 8 children, one of whom lives with her and helps her to sell 3 days a week. She sells her products from her house in the afternoons.  She also has a part-time job that allows her to help her child, who is still in school.  She does this work so that her child can have a better future and so that she can continue to help her.  This way, together, they can open a store where she could distribute dairy products, sausages and other products.  She is requesting a loan to invest in the purchase of more dairy products.  She thanks God for this great opportunity to have another source of work.

loans.use: to sell dairy products (cheese and cream) and cosmetics

loans.name: Lina

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 2 filhos que frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
 É empregada doméstica e o marido é policial e quadro do Ministério do Interior, com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (tintas, ferro, portas, cimento e outros) para concluir a sua casa. 
No futuro pretende construir mais uma casa para os seus filhos, para tal compromete-se a pagar pontualmente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku
O desafio é melhorar a vida iniciar uma actividade comercial para aumentar a sua renda mensal para poder atingir as expectativas futuras.
texts.en:
Lina is married and the mother of two children who go to school. She lives in her own house with her family and does not support anyone else. 
She works as a cleaner and her husband is a policeman with the Ministry of the Interior. With this loan she intends to buy construction material (doors, cement, iron, paint etc.) to finish her house. 
In the future she wants to build another house for her children. She promises to repay this loan promptly so that she can ask for more loans in future. The challenge is to improve her life, start a small business so that she can improve her monthly income and achieve her future wishes.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (paint, iron, doors, cement and others) to continue work on her house

loans.name: Marta Elisa

texts.es: Marta Elisa, de  44 años de edad, habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su hijo desde hace 30 años. Ella es una mujer increíble, ya que hace todo lo que esté en sus manos para llevar el pan de cada día a su familia. La señora Marta se dedica a la confección de ropa. El negocio está ubicado en su misma casa, para ello acomodo un espacio en donde ha instalado su maquina de coser, mesa de cortar, planchador y mueble en donde deposita sus prendas. Todos los días se levanta muy temprano para atender sus tareas domesticas y luego atender su negocio. Gracias a su experiencia de 16 años en el negocio y a su buen desempeño en el mismo, se ha ganado la confianza de sus vecinos, los cuales cada día la prefieren más. Ofrece calidad y buenos precios en sus prendas confeccionadas. Como toda una mujer visionaria con deseos de superarse ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra de materia prima (telas, elásticos, botones, hilos, etc.) para la elaboración de las prendas de vestir, que con frecuencia demandan sus clientes. Desea obtener resultados favorables en su negocio lo cual le permita mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Marta Elisa, 44, has lived in her own house with her son for 30 years. She is an incredible woman, as she does everything possible to earn the daily bread for her family. Marta makes a living making tailored clothing. The business is located at her own house, for which she arranged a space where she has put a sewing machine, a cutting table, a clothes press, and a piece of furniture where she places her garments. 

Every day she gets up very early to complete her housework and then see to her business. Thanks to her 16 years of experience in her business and her good performance in it, she has gained the trust of her neighbors, who prefer her more each day. She offers quality and good prices in her tailored garments. Like any visionary woman with wishes to better herself, she has decided to  apply for this loan with Integral to invest in the purchase of materials (cloth, elastic, buttons, thread, etc.) to make her tailored clothing garments. She wants to obtain favorable business results which will allow her to improve the quality of her life and that of her family.

loans.use: to buy cloth, elastic, buttons, thread, etc.

loans.name: Duo Triunfantes De San Juan Group

texts.es:
DUO  TRIUNFANTES DE SAN JUAN

El grupo está integrado po la señora Geily de  32 años de edad ella vive en la aldea de Cruz Blanca, el  negocio que tiene es una tienda de granos basicos de consumo diario ubicada en la misma aldea donde vive desde hace 5 años, ella inicio con su negocio  con la ayuda de su esposo que le dio un capital con una pequeña cantidad de productos  y con el tiempo fue agrandando su tienda y ahora tiene un local propio donde vende  variedad de productos  el mayor deseo es poder darle estudio a su dos hijos  que tiene  y poder crecer más la tienda colocando mas diversidad en productos comestibles,espera que Kiva le pueda ayudar con el credito Solicitando.
texts.en: Geily, 32 years old, is a member of Duo Triunfantes de San Juan Group. She lives in the village of Cruz Blanca. Her business sells basic everyday groceries and is located in the same village, where she has been living for 5 years. She started her business with the help of her husband, who gave her a  starting capital and a small quantity of products. Over time, she expanded her shop and now has her own locale, where she sells a variety of products. Geily's biggest wish is to be able to pay for both her children's studies. She also hopes to make her shop grow even more by selling a wider variety of groceries. She hopes Kiva will be able to help with the loan she is asking for.

loans.use: to buy basic everyday groceries to sell.

location.town: Aldea Vista Hermosa, San Pedro Sacatepequez

loans.name: Rodrigues

texts.pt:
preferiu sair na foto com sua esposa.
Casado e pai de 2 filhos menores sem idade Escolar, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
 É segurança e comerciante dono do negócio de venda de produtos diversos, com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (óleo, massa, mechas, refrescos, e outros) para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria. 
No futuro pretende ampliar o seu negocio para atrair mais clientes, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku
O desafio é ver o negocio crescer o seu negocio para poder ver outros projectos.
texts.en:
Rodrigues prefers to have his photo taken with his wife. He is married and has two small children who are not yet old enough to go to school. He lives in his own house with his family and does not support anyone else. 
He works as a security guard and owns a small business selling a range of items. With this loan he intends to buy products (oil, pasta, drinks and others) to increase the stock in his shop.  
In the future he wants to increase the size of his business to attract more clients. With this he promises to repay this loan so that he can ask for more loans in future. The challenge is to see his business grow so that he can start other projects.

loans.use: to buy and sell products (oil, pasta, soft drinks) in his store

loans.name: Rosa Estela

texts.es: Rosa Estela tiene 44 años de edad y habita con su grupo familiar el cual está integrado por su esposo y sus tres hijos. Tiene más de 12 años de habitar en casa de su esposo, razón por la cual es muy conocida en la zona. Ella se dedica al comercio informal desde hace mucho tiempo. Todos los días se levanta muy temprano para comercializar productos de uso personal en las diferentes áreas de la zona donde habita. Gracias al buen desempeño de su trabajo ha logrado ganarse la confianza de muchas personas las cuales dan muy buenas referencias de su persona y de los productos que comercializa. Todo lo anterior le ha permitido mantenerse en el mercado de las ventas por mucho tiempo. La señora Rosa es uno de los soportes económicos de su hogar, ya que junto a su esposo trabajan duramente para poder llevar el sustento a su hogar. Siempre están buscando mejores alternativas de vida para sus hijos los cuales son su principal inspiración para continuar luchando por una calidad de vida diferente.  Solicita este préstamo a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra de mercadería como: lociones, cremas, cosméticos, desodorantes, champú, etc. para impulsar su negocio a mejorar las ventas y los ingresos. Con esto espera tener acceso a mejores condiciones de vida para ella y su familia.
texts.en:
Rosa Estela is 44 years old and she lives with her family which is made up of her husband and their three children. She has lived in her husband's house for more than 12 years, so she is well-known in the area. She has been working in the informal economy for a long time. Every day she gets up very early to sell personal hygiene products in the different districts of the area where she lives. Thanks to her diligent carrying out of her work, she has managed to win the trust of many people who give very good references about both her as a person and about the products which she sells. All of this has allowed her to remain in the sales market for a long time. Rosa is one of the breadwinners of her household, as both she and her husband work hard to support their family. They are always looking for better alternatives for their children, who are their main inspiration to carry on fighting for a better quality of life. 

Rosa is requesting this loan from INTEGRAL to invest in buying merchandise such as lotions, creams, cosmetics, deodorants, shampoo, etc. to boost her business and improve her sales and income. With this, she hopes to be able to access better living conditions for her and her family.

loans.use: to buy lotions, creams, cosmetics, deodorants, shampoo, etc.

loans.name: Pueblo Viejo Group

texts.es:
La señora Esbia Demetria esta casada, tiene  48 años de edad, cursó los 3 años de educación primaria, tiene 4 hijos, se dedica a la preparación y venta de comida y bebidas, lleva 10 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su su esposo quien también se dedica al comercio.

Organiza un  grupo para solicitar un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de insumos para preparar comida, especias, carnes, arroz, fideos, etc. Espera en el futuro tener un negocio aceptable y con ganancias.  Los demás integrantes se dedica a la produccion agrícola, crianza de animales, y a la atención a tienda de consumo diario.
texts.en: Esbia Demetria is married, 48 years old, and has 4 children. She completed the 3 years of primary school. She prepares and sells food and drinks. She has 10 years of experience in this business, and has the support of her husband, who is also a tradesman. Esbia puts together a group to ask for a loan to buy ingredients for preparing food: spices, meat, rice, pasta, etc. In the future, she hopes to have an acceptable business that turns a profit. The other members of the group deal in agriculture, animal husbandry or the sale of basic groceries.

loans.use: to buy ingredients and spices.

loans.name: Maria Romelia

texts.es: Maria Romelia. ella vive en aldea Xesuj paraje el sause, tiene 58 años de edad,ella es dueña de una tienda de productos comestibles de consumo diario,el cual se abica en la aldea donde ella vive(aldea antes mencionada)ella nos cuenta que ha tenido que luchar sola ya que no resibe el apoyo economico de su esposo, nos cuenta que la ayuda que a resivido de los credito le a ayudado mucho ya que parte del crecimientos de su negocio se lo deve a ello, es por eso que esta solicitando este credito para la compra de productos comestibles y agrandar mas su negocio.
texts.en: Maria Romelia lives in the village of Paraje el Sauce, which belongs to the municipality of Aldea Xesuj. She is 58 years old and owns a shop that sells common groceries, located in the municipality where she lives. She tells us that she has had to fight alone since she does not receive economic support from her husband. She tells us that the help she received from past loans helped her immensely, since they were partly responsible for the growth of her business. This is why she is asking for this loan to buy groceries and have more products to sell.

loans.use: to buy everyday groceries to sell.

loans.name: Maria Adelina

texts.es: Maria Adelina,de 40 años de edade ella es orijinaria de aldea Xesuj paraje el Sauce, ella posee una ditribuidora de articulos donde venden al contado y por abono,ella vende articulos como Vajillas,de peltre,sabanas,televisores tec,ella nos cuenta que su esposos a sido una parte importante ya que el la ayuda en todo,ya que con sus ingresos les dan estudios a sus hijos ya que aun, unos de sus hijos todavia son menores de edad, ella esta solicitando este credito para la compra de mas articulos ya que nececita capital para agrandar su negocio,espera que le puedan dar la ayuda que ella nececita para seguir adelante en su negocio.
texts.en: Maria Adelina is 40 years old. She is from the very small town El Sauce, near the town of Xesuj. She owns a business that sells household items for cash or on credit. She sells items such as pewter dish sets, sheets, televisions, etc. She tells us that her husband is important to her business because he helps in everything. They use the income they earn to pay for their children’s schooling because some of their children are still young. She is requesting this loan to buy more household items because she needs capital to grow her business. She hopes you will be able to help her with what she needs to continue forward with her business.

loans.use: to buy household products for resale, such as dish sets, sheets, and televisions.

loans.name: Duo Latino Group

texts.es: Marta, tiene 52 años de edad es casada y tiene dos hijos, ella tiene una tortilleria y se dedica a la elavoracion y venta de tortillas desde hace varios años ella empeso con un quintal de maiz luego fue creciendo y contrato a dos personas que le ayudaran porque no se daba a basto ella sola, actual mente tiene su tortilleri y aparte de eso tiene una tienda donde vende productos comestibles de consumo diario,el credito lo esta solicitando para la compra de maiz para la elavoracion de tortillas. ella sueña con poder agrandar su tortilleria y poner otro local.
texts.en: Marta is 52 years old. She is married and has two children. She has a tortilla making business. She has been making and selling tortillas for many years. She began with a 100-pound bag of corn and then her business grew and she hired two people to help her because she couldn’t keep up by herself. She now has her tortilla business and she also has a small store where she sells basic food items. The loan she is requesting is to buy corn for making tortillas. Her dream is to grow her tortilla business and open another store.

loans.use: to buy corn for making tortillas

loans.name: Joice

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 2 filhos que frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta os seus pais que vivem com ela. 	
 É camareira, com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, e outros) para dar continuidade a obra da sua casa e pagar o pedreiro. 
No futuro pretende concluir a sua casa e iniciar um negócio para aumentar a renda familiar, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku
O desafio é concluir a sua casa e mobilar.
texts.en:
She's married and has two children who attend school. She lives with her family in a house she owns and also supports her parents who live with her.
She works as a chambermaid. With the present loan she intends to pay the bricklayer and purchase construction supplies (cement, etc.) in order to continue building her house.
In the future she plans to finish building her home and to start a business so that she can increase her family's income. For that purpose she pledges to repay the loan as scheduled in order to request more loans from Hluvuku.
Her challenge is to finish building and furnishing her home.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (cement, etc.).

loans.name: Eugenio

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 4 filhos dos quais 3 frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
 É empregado doméstico, com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, portas, janelas e outros) para finalizar a obra da sua casa. 
No futuro pretende tirar uma carta de condução profissional, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku.
O desafio é concluir a sua casa para oferecer conforto a sua família como prometera a sua esposa.
texts.en:
He's married and has four children, three of which attend school. He lives with his family in a house he owns and does not support anyone else.
He's a domestic servant. With the present loan he intends to purchase construction supplies (cement, doors, window frames, etc.) in order to finish building his house.
In the future he plans to get a professional driving licence. For that reason he pledges to repay the loan as scheduled so that he can request more loans from Hluvuku.
His challenge is to finish building his home in order to provide comfort for his family, as he has promised his wife.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (cement, doors, window frames, etc.) in order to finish building his house.

loans.name: Leonidas

texts.es:
Leonidas tiene 60 años, vive en compañía de Oswaldo, su esposo desde hace 28 años. Ambos tienen 8 hijos, a los que criaron con mucha dedicación, amor y esfuerzo. Ahora viven con el menor de ellos, Robinson, al que cuidan en su casa propia ubicada en la localidad de Hualahoyo.
Toda su vida la dedicó a la agricultura, con ello pudo mantener a sus hijos y otorgarles una mejor calidad de vida. Ahora solo se encuentra sembrando productos para su propio consumo (papa, maíz y alverja). Pero su principal ingreso económico, en la actualidad, es la producción de leche, cuenta con 4 vacas, las que se encuentran preñadas y a punto de dar cría. Producen un promedio de 18 litros diarios, los que a primeras horas del día son recogidos por una de las principales procesadoras de leche del país. Por otra parte, crías animales como cuyes, cerdos y gallinas en cantidad. Esto le ayuda a obtener un ingreso extra, pues comercializa a los carniceros de la zona, además de consumir ella misma para su alimentación diaria. Su secreto es sembrar la alfalfa, que es el principal alimento de sus animales. Su deseo a futuro es aumentar la cantidad de ganado que tiene para poder obtener mayores ingresos.

Este es su segundo crédito con MFP y agradece el apoyo brindado, con el cual podrá mejorar su negocio y por ende sus ingresos. Además, promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas, pues desea seguir logrando sus objetivos y trabajando con los miembros de su grupo, porque son personas responsables y solidarias.
Leonidas invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de una vaca lechera para aumentar su ganado y producción de leche, además de fertilizantes para mejorar la alfalfa que tiene sembrada.
texts.en:
Leonidas is 60 years old and has lived in Oswaldo with her husband for 28 years.  The two of them have 8 children, who they raised with dedication, love, and effort.  Now they live with the youngest, Robinson, in their own home located in Hualahoyo.

Leonidas has worked her whole life in farming, and has been able to support her children and give them a better quality of life.  Now she grows products only for her own consumption (potatoes, corn, and peas), while her main source of income is producing milk.  She has 4 cows, which are pregnant and about to give birth.  They produce an average of 18 liters of milk a day, which is collected every morning by one of the best milk processors in the country.  

Additionally, Leonidas raises animals like guinea pigs, pigs, and chickens in quantity.  This helps her gain extra income; because she sells to local butchers what she doesn’t eat herself.  Her secret is to plant alfalfa, which serves as the primary feed for her animals.  

Her wish for the future is to increase the number of livestock she owns to be able to make better profits.  This is her second loan with MFP and she is grateful for their support, with which she is able to better her business and therefore her profits.  Also, she promises to be punctual with her payments, because she hopes to continue reaching her goals and working with the members of the group who are all responsible and caring.  Leonidas will invest the money requested in the purchase of a milk cow to increase her livestock and milk production, as well as fertilizers to improve the alfalfa she grows.

loans.use: buy a milk cow and fertilizers.

loans.name: María De Jesús

texts.es: María, es una mujer muy responsable y trabajadora. Cada mañana se despierta con la convicción de que es una nueva oportunidad para salir adelante y mejorar sus condiciones de vida. Vive junto a su esposo, quien la apoya económicamente con los gastos del hogar. María es comerciante informal, se dedica a la compra y venta de productos alimenticios, como pan, galletas, dulces artesanales, etc.  En su canasto de forma ambulante,así es como se costea el pago de su vivienda, alimentación y otras necesidades vitales de su familia. Sus grandes deseos de superación, la han llevado a solicitar este préstamo que le permita invertir en mercadería para la venta como: galletas, pan, dulces artesanales, etc. ya que prevé, que de esta forma logrará aumentar sus niveles de venta e ingresos. Además,  María desea que su negocio crezca y se formalice pensando en la oportunidad de pagar un local y desde ahí contar con vendedores como ella y así sus ganancias se multipliquen, por ahora esta es la oportunidad para continuar llevando el alimento a su hogar y buscar la forma de mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
María is a very responsible and hardworking woman.  She awakens every morning with the conviction that it is another opportunity to get ahead and improve her living conditions.  She lives with her husband, who helps her economically with the household expenses.

María is a vendor in the informal sector.  She buys and sells food products such as bread, cookies, handmade sweets, etc., as a street vendor with her basket.  This is how she pays for her house, food, and her family's other vital necessities.

Her biggest desires for improvement have led her to request this loan, which will allow her to invest in merchandise to sell, such as cookies, bread, handmade sweets, etc.  She anticipates that this way she will manage to increase her sales and income levels.

In addition, María wants to expand and formalize her business.  She is thinking about the possibility of paying for a store where there are other vendors like her and her profits will multiply.  For now, this is the opportunity to continue bringing home food and looking for the way to improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to buy cookies, bread, handmade sweets, etc.

loans.name: Norma

texts.es:
Norma tiene 39 años, es una mujer muy trabajadora, vive en compañía de Javier, su esposo, con quien crió a sus hijos en su casa propia ubicada en la localidad de El Tambo.  
Ella tiene muchos deseos de salir adelante por el amor a su hijo, quien es su razón de progresar.  Luego de capacitarse en la elaboración de yogures decidió elaborarlos, habilitando en su misma casa un laboratorio de procesamiento de su yogurt, y sigue las estrictas normas para su preparación, tomando en cuenta el cálculo exacto de cada ingrediente para que el producto resultante sea de calidad. Es así que Norma está  satisfecha con su producto, el cual vende en las ferias locales de su zona. Esta actividad la viene realizando hace varios años y desea mejorar, por ello necesita constantemente capital de trabajo para la compra de los insumos necesarios. 

Este es su octavo crédito con MFP y agradece el apoyo brindado, con el cual podrá mejorar su negocio y por ende sus ingresos. Además, promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas, pues desea seguir logrando sus objetivos y trabajando con los miembros de su grupo que son personas responsables y solidarias.
Norma invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de insumos para la elaboración de Yogurt.
texts.en:
Norma is 39 years old.  She a very hard-working woman who lives with Javier, her husband, with whom she has raised their children in her own house located in El Tambo.  She is motivated to succeed by the love she has for her son.  

After qualifying for the production of yogurt she decided to prepare it in a laboratory in her own house, where she follows strict processing guidelines, keeping in mind the exact amount of each ingredient so that the resulting product is of high quality.  It is that which gives Norma satisfaction with her product, which she sells at the local markets in her area.  

She has been involved in this activity for a number of years and she hopes to improve upon it, so she needs a constant stream of working capital in order to buy the necessary ingredients.  This is the eighth loan with MFP and she is grateful for the support offered her.  With this loan she will be able to improve her business and as a result, her income.  In addition, she promises to be punctual with paying off her loans, since she wants to continue to reach her objectives and work with the members of her group, who are responsible and loyal.  Norma will invest the money requested in the purchase of ingredients for the production of yogurt.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for yogurt.

loans.name: Duo Rubi Group

texts.es: Myrna Leticia, tiene 44 años de edad es casada pero esta separada de su esposo,vive con sus tres hijos,menores de edad y estan en edad escolar ella inicio su negocio cuando tenia 24 años de edad,su primer negocio fue vender utencilio de plasticos luego empeso a comprar y vender zapatos,despues de tres años viajo a Tapachula(Mexico)para comprar mercaderia y venderla en Guatemala, actual mente vende Ropa nueva de forma ambulante, y tambien vende por catalogo,es por eso que esta solicitando este credito para la compra de ropa nueva, y poco a poco ir superandose en su negocio,sus sueño es que sus hijos terminen su carrera y poner una abaroteria en la comunidad donde vive.
texts.en: Myrna Leticia is 44 years old and married but separated from her husband.  She lives with her three young school-aged children.  She started her business when she was 24 years old.  Her first business was selling plastic utensils and later she began to buy and sell shoes.  After three years, she traveled to Tapachula, Mexico to buy merchandise to sell in Guatemala.  Now she sells by catalog and is requesting the loan to buy new clothes so that, little by little, she may improve her business.  Her dream is that her children finish their schooling and establish a grocery store in the community where they live.

loans.use: sell new clothes.

loans.name: Nito

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 3 filhos todos frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta mais 1 primo que vive com ele. 	
Trabalha como guarda numa empresa de turismo, com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (barrotes, chapas de zinco, pregos, e outros) para a cobertura da obra da sua casa. 
No futuro pretende concluir a sua casa e iniciar um negocio de venda de produtos de primeira necessidade, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku.
O desafio é concluir a sua casa e mobilar.
texts.en:
He's married and has three children, all of which attend school. He lives with his family in a house he owns and also supports a cousin who lives with him.
He works as a guard for a tourism company. With the present loan he intends to purchase construction supplies (beams, zinc sheets, nails, etc.) in order to build the roofing for his house.
In the future he plans to finish building his home and to start a business selling essential goods. For that reason he pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so that he can request more loans from Hluvuku.
His challenge is to finish building and furnishing his house.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (beams, zinc sheets, nails, etc.).

loans.name: Lydie Clémence

texts.fr: Lydie Clémence est mariée et mère de 02 enfants. Le plus âgé a 18 ans et le moins âgé a 05 ans. Tous ses enfants sont scolarisés. Elle vend des pagnes, mèches et produits cosmétiques depuis 06 ans. Lydie Clémence s'approvisionne dans l'un des marchés de la place et de l'extérieur. Lydie Clémence veut s'acheter des pagnes, des mèches et des produits cosmétiques. C'est dans cet optique qu'elle a sollicité et a obtenu un micro crédit à Finadev.
texts.en: Lydia Clémence is married with two children. The older is 18 and the younger 5 years old. Both children attend school. She has sold traditional textiles, locks of hair and cosmetics for five years. Lydia Clémence buys her products at one of the local markets and further afield. Lydia Clémence wants to buy textiles, locks, and cosmetic products. It is with this intention that she has requested and obtained a micro credit from Finadev.

loans.use: to purchase 40 lengths of  traditional cloth of all sorts,30 locks and 20 cosmetic products.

loans.name: Palmira

texts.pt:
Solteira e mãe de 2 filhos todos frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
 É camareira, com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, areia, mosaico, e outros) para dar continuidade a obra da sua casa e pagar a mão-de-obra. 
No futuro pretende concluir a sua casa e iniciar um negócio para aumentar a sua renda mensal, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku.
O desafio é concluir a sua casa e mobilar.
texts.en:
She's single and has two children, all of which attend school. She lives with her family in a house she owns and does not support anyone else.
She works as a chambermaid. With the present loan she intends to pay for labor costs and purchase construction supplies (cement, sand, mosaic, etc.) in order to continue building her house.
In the future she plans to finish building her home and to start a business so that she can increase her monthly income. For that reason she pledges to repay the loan as scheduled in order to request more loans from Hluvuku.
Her challenge is to finish building and furnishing her house.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies (cement, sand, mosaic, etc.) in order to continue building her house.

loans.name: Jhon

texts.es:
Jhon (24 años), es un joven trabajador y soltero. Vive en compañía de su madre, Agripina, con quien forjó su destino y trabaja, en su casa propia ubicada en la localidad de Pampas.  
Junto a su madre implementó una peluquería donde no solo brinda servicios de corte, peinados y teñido de cabello, sino también tienen máquinas para terapias de relajamiento a vapor, asimismo masajes y alquiler de vestidos de noche y ternos para caballeros. Todo esto hace que su servicio sea completo. Para esa labor también contrató personal para que ayuden a su madre, pues él sólo se encarga de administrarlo y visita por horas su negocio, pues está estudiando Psicología en una universidad de la localidad, además de trabajar en una empresa de videojuegos donde realiza mantenimiento de las máquinas. “Este trabajo no es todo el día, solo me llaman cuando se malogra una de sus máquinas”, afirma. Ahora se encuentra en el proyecto de renovar sus máquinas por unas que ahorran energía y sobre todo, ayudan con la conservación del medio ambiente. Asimismo planea reducir costos con la adquisición de insumos en cantidad, “con ello, el precio de compra por unidad de los productos que utilizó bajará considerablemente”, comenta.  

Este es su quinto crédito con MFP y agradece el apoyo brindado, con el cual podrá mejorar su negocio y por ende sus ingresos. Además, promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas, pues desea seguir logrando sus objetivos y trabajando con los miembros de su grupo, pues son personas responsables y solidarias.
Jhon invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de una máquina lavadora de cabello, además de tintes, shampoo y otros insumos en cantidad, para realizar su trabajo.
texts.en:
Jhon (24 years old) is a hardworking, single young man. He lives with his mother, Agripina, with whom he has forged his destiny and work, in his own home located in the town of Pampas.

Along with his mother he opened a beauty salon, with not only haircutting services, styling, and dyeing hair, but also they have steam relaxation therapy machines, also massages and they rent evening wear and suits for men. All of this means they offer a complete service. 

In this work they also have hired people to help his mother, as he is in charge of managing it, and he visits during business hours, as he is studying psychology at the university in town, and he also works in a video game business where he maintains the machines. “This work is not all day, they only call me when one of the machines breaks down,” he says. Now they are about to start the project of renewing their machines to save energy and especially to help with the environmental conservation. Also, he plans to reduce costs with the acquisition of supplies in quantity, “doing this, the price of purchase per unit of products deployed will drop considerably,” he says.

This is the fifth loan through MFP and he is grateful for the support given, with which he could better his business and as a consequence, his income. In addition, he promises to be punctual with the repayment of his loan, because he wants to continue achieving his goals and working with the members of his group, who are trustworthy and united.

Jhon will invest the money from the loan in the purchase of an appliance for shampooing hair, hair dyes, shampoo, and other supplies in quantity, in order to do his work.

loans.use: to buy an appliance for shampooing hair

loans.name: Cristo Rey Group

texts.es: “CRISTO REY” es el nombre de la nueva alcancía formada en el distrito de los Olivos Lima Perú, uno de sus integrantes es Carlos él es soltero y  mecánico de profesión. Por ahora trabaja para una empresa automotriz, es por lo mismo que desea abrir una tienda de repuestos,  quiere  buscar un local adecuado donde empezara con su negocio, su primer préstamo será de mucha utilidad para su proyecto; básicamente lo usara para gestionar permisos municipales.Por otro lado ha sido elegido el presidente del la alcancía y está muy deseoso de trabajar con el grupo.
texts.en:
"Cristo Rey" (Christ the King) is the name of a new Communal Bank that was formed in the District of Los Olivos in Lima, Peru.

One of the members is Carlos. He is single and a mechanic by profession. Carlos now works for an automobile establishment, but he also wants to open a parts store. He wants to find an adequate location where he can start his business. His first loan will be a great help for his project. Carlos will use the funds to obtain city permits.

Carlos was elected to serve as president of the Communal Bank, so he is very eager to work with the group.

loans.use: to obtain city permits for his business.

loans.name: Duo Reyes Group

texts.es:
Dúo Reyes,
doña Tania de 30 años viuda hace tres años falleció su esposo, tiene dos hijoS que estan estudiando, Tania se dedica a la venta de ropa como blusas, pantalones y lencería ella lo vende ambulante en la escuela donde asisten sus hijos, ella tiene clientes y todos los lugares que visita aprovecha para conseguir clientela empezó con su  negocio hace cinco años para ayudar a la economía en su hogar antes de que enviudara ahora pues gracias a Dios nos cuenta que sabe de un oficio para poder mantener a sus hijos y seguir un futuro mejor,esta solicitando este credito para la compra de ropa nueva variada. ella espera que Kiva le pueda ayudar por medio del credito solicitado.
texts.en:
Tania, age 30, is a widow.  Her husband died three years ago.  She has two children, and they go to school.

Tania sells clothes like blouses, pants, and lingerie.  She sells in an itinerant manner at the school that her children attend.  She has customers, and she takes advantage of every place she goes to get clientele.  

She started her business five years ago, before she was widowed, in order to help with the household finances.  Now, thank God, she says, she knows a trade in order to be able to support her children and move towards a better future.

She is requesting this loan to buy varied new clothes.  She hopes that Kiva is able to help her through the requested loan.

loans.use: to buy varied new clothes.

loans.name: Duo Inspiracion Group

texts.es:
DUO INSPIRACION

Este duo esta Integrado por la señora Ana como líder de este dúo, se ha  dado a conocer en su localidad como una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora ya que con mucho esfuerzo inicio hace 7 años con  la venta de huevos  en la vecindad donde ella vive, doña Ana ha sabido aprovechar las oportunidades y la confianza de su clientela ella también vende queso, crema,  y tambien se dedica a la venta de pollo destazado en su mayoría solo pedidos. con esa intencion esta solicitando este credito para la compra de mas mercaderia para la venta.
texts.en:
Inspiration Duo

Part of this duo is Ana, the leader, who is known in the area for being a hardworking, entrepreneurial woman.  Seven years ago, with a lot of effort, she started a business selling eggs in her neighborhood.  Ana knows how to maximize opportunities and her customers trust her.  She also sells cheese, cream and chicken, by order only.  She requests the loan to buy more merchandise to sell.

loans.use: sell eggs and purchase chickens for sale.

loans.name: Duo Lluvias De Oro Group

texts.es: Duo Lluvias de Oro.este duo esta integrado por la señora Estefana,de 42 años de edad ella se a dedica a la confeccion de tejidos, desde hace varios años,ella nos comenta que es una activida que le gusta mucho ya que por medio de ello a podido ayudar a su familia, y esta muy contenta porque tiene la oportunidad de solicitar este credito que le serbira para la compra de materia prima para seguir confeccionando tejidos tipicos.
texts.en: The communal bank "Dos Lluvias de Oro" is made up by this pair of women.  Estefana, 42, has had a business making woven items for a number of years.  She tells us that it is an activity that she enjoys a lot, because through this business she has been able to help her family.  She is very pleased that she has the opportunity request this loan, which will allow her to buy raw materials so that she can continue to make traditional woven items.

loans.use: to make and sell traditional woven products

loans.name: Santa Rosita Group

texts.es: La Sra. Sulma es casada,  tienes 4  hijos, actualmente es integrante  en la alcancía comunal “Santa Rosita”  grupo  conformado por  9  socios que se dedican a diversas actividades de comercio.  Sulma  se dedica a la confeccion y ventas de prendas de vestir en su domicilio cuenta con un taller, este negocio surge a raiz que la idea de ofrecerle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia, Sulma empezo vendiendo en un mercado poco a poco se hizo de un capital y ahora ya tiene su propio taller de confeccion, gracias a su esfuerzo y dedicación a logrado mejores ingresos económicos, sus hijos pudieron estudiar y sobre todo cuentan con una mejor calidad de vida , con el fin de seguir creciendo a solicitado un nuevo préstamo para comprar mercadería,( tela, hilo etc) para confeccionar prendas de vestir (polos, buzos, etc). Sulma cumplirá sus metas con mucho trabajo y esfuerzo y que los préstamos de Edaprospo le ayudaran.
texts.en: Sulma is married and has 4 children. She is currently a member of the “Santa Rosita” communal bank. The group is made up of 9 members that work in a variety of commerce activities. Sulma makes and sells clothing items. She has a workshop in her house. This business came about from the idea of offering a better quality of life to her family. Sumla began selling at a market. Little by little she saved up her capital and now she has her own workshop. Thanks to her hard work and dedication she has achieve improved income. Her children have been able to study, and, above all, they have a better quality of life. With the goal of continuing to grow, she has requested a new loan to buy materials (fabric, thread, etc.) to make clothing items (polo shirts, sweaters, etc.). Sulma will achieve her goals with a lot of hard work and effort and the loans from Edaprospo will help her.

loans.use: to buy materials (fabric, threads, etc.)

loans.name: Máxima

texts.es:
Máxima, de 62 años, es una mujer sencilla, vive junto a Rodrigo, su esposo, con quien tiene ocho hijos, todos ya mayores e independientes. Ambos viven en su casa propia ubicada en la localidad de Chilcas.
La agricultura le dio la satisfacción de obtener todos los ingresos económicos para educar a sus hijos, los que se encuentra viviendo en la ciudad de Lima. Posee 5 vacas, todas ellas lecheras, y producen un promedio de 35 litros diarios. Cuenta que cuando tienen cría, llegan a producir hasta 70 litros. Le va muy bien en la crianza de sus animales, su secreto es sembrar ella misma la alfalfa, que es su principal alimento. “También les doy comida balanceada, las desparasito y cuido mucho”. A su vez, siembra maíz, alverja y cebada en terrenos propios y otros arrendados; luego, cada cosecha la comercializa en la capital del país, donde sus hijos la apoyan, ya que ahí obtiene mayores ganancias.

Este es su sexto crédito con MFP, se siente tranquila por el apoyo que recibe, además de agradecer la confianza que depositan en ella. Promete cumplir con sus cuotas de manera puntual, pues no defraudará a su grupo, conformado por personas solidarias y responsables.
Máxima invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de fertilizantes naturales para esparcir entre sus sembríos de alfalfa, además de alimento balanceado para sus animales.
texts.en:
Máxima, who is 62 years old, is a simple woman.  She lives with Rodrigo, her husband, with whom she has eight children.  All of her children are older and independent.  She and her husband live in their own home, which is located in Chilcas.

Algriculture has given her the satisfaction of obtaining the income needed to educate her children, who live in the city of Lima.  She has five dairy cows which produce on average 35 liters per day.  She said that when they are calving, they produce up to 70 liters.  She does very well raising her animals.  Her secret is that she plants the alfalfa - their main source of nutrition - herself.  “I also provide them with a balanced diet, I deworm them, and I take good care of them.” she says.

In turn, she plants corn, peas and barley on her own land as well as on leased land.  Later, each harvest is sold in the capital, where her children help her, since it is there that they can make the most money.

This is her sixth loan with MFP.  She feels good about the support that she gets and is grateful for the confidence they have in her.  She promises to pay back her loan in a punctual manner, as she does not want to disappoint her group, which is made up of people who are loyal and responsible.
Máxima will invest the money requested in the purchase of natural fertilizers to spread among her plantings of alfalfa and the other food for her animals.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and food for her animals.

loans.name: Diana Estela

texts.es:
Diana tiene 24 años de edad, es casada. Desde hace dos años se dedica al comercio siendo la administradora de su propia tienda. Una vez terminados sus estudios se caso y por eso surgió la idea de la tienda para ayudar a su esposo con los gastos, comenzando con poca mercadería y con las ganancias que recibía fue invirtiendo en la compra de más mercadería. Ella desea que su tienda este bien surtida para atender mejor a sus clientes y siempre tener lo que buscan.

Para comprar la mercadería ella debe caminar a pie unos treinta minutos, luego aborda un autobús que la conduce hasta una ciudad, una vez que ha terminado sus compras paga a una persona con vehiculo para que la lleve hasta su casa.

Diana desea surtir su negocio, satisfaciendo la demanda de sus clientes, por lo que solicita un préstamo a Fundación Campo, para comprar 4 quintales de maíz, 1 quintal de fríjol, 1 quintal de azúcar, 1 quintal de arroz, 1 galón de aceite, 2 cajas de jabón para lavar, papel higiénico, etc. Con esta inversión ella tendrá disponible la mercadería que solicitan sus clientes y obtendrá mejores ganancias, con las que planea ahorrar para construir su casa ya que actualmente vive con su mamá y ya esta esperando a su primer bebe, por lo que nos comenta que quiere dejarles una casa a sus hijos pues sueña con tener tres hijos.
texts.en:
Diana is 24 years old and married.  She started running her own store two years ago.  Once she finished her education, she got married.  The idea of the store emerged from wanting to help her husband with the expenses.  She started with little merchandise, and she used her earnings to buy more merchandise.  She wants her store to be well-stocked in order to provide her customers with better service and to always have what they are looking for.

In order to buy more merchandise she needs to walk on foot for 30 minutes.  She then boards a bus that goes to a city.  Once she has completed her purchases she pays a person with a vehicle to take her to her house. 

Diana wishes to stock her business and satisfy her customers’ demand.  That is why she is requesting a loan from Fundación Campo.  She will use the loan to buy 4 “quintales” (1 quintal = 100 kg) of corn, 1 quintal of beans, 1 quintal of sugar, 1 quintal of rice, 1 gallon of cooking oil, 2 cases of soap, and toilet paper, etc.  

With this investment she will have on-hand the merchandise that her customers’ request.  Then she will get better income.  She plans to save the income in order to build her house.  She currently lives with her mother, and she is expecting her first baby.  She tells us that she wants to leave a house to her children, and she dreams of having three children.

loans.use: to buy 4 “quintales” (1 quintal = 100 kg) of corn, 1 quintal of beans, 1 quintal of sugar, 1 quintal of rice, 1 gallon of cooking oil, 2 cases of soap, and toilet paper, etc.

loans.name: Duo Seguidoras Del Exito Group

texts.es:
DUO SEGUIDORAS DEL ÉXITO
Es integrada por las señora Miriam de 43 años de edad doña Miriam se ha dedicado desde hace varios años al comercio,doña Miriam en medio tiempo vende en la escuela de su localidad lo que son productos comestibles( refacciones, golosinas, frutas , gaseosas,etc.) Y por las tardes sale a realizar la venta de huevos de manera ambulante en las tiendas o casas de su localidad.es por eso que esta solicitando este credito para la compra de mas mercaderia para la venta.
texts.en: Miriam, age 43, is a member of the “Duo Seguidoras Del Éxito” (Two Followers of Success) communal bank.  Miriam has devoted herself to commerce for several years.  Miriam works half time selling food products (snacks, sweets, fruit, and soft drinks, etc.) at a school in her area.  In the afternoons she leaves to sell eggs in an itinerant manner.  She goes to stores and houses in her area.  That is why she is requesting this loan to buy more merchandise to sell.

loans.use: to buy food products like snacks, sweets, fruit, and soft drinks, etc.

location.town: Aldea Cruz Blanca San Juan Sacatepequez

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.fr: La cliente est un entrepreneur  courageusement ambitieux, âgée de 35  ans, mère de 5 jeunes enfants qui étudient. Elle est  vendeuse de farines. Son mari est un couturier. Elle installe ses marchandises dans un entrepôt agricole à Birere. Elle commença son business avec son fonds propre reçu de son mari, alors, plus tard elle bénéficia un fond additionnel de crédit de 50$ de l’IMF Hekima. Il y a 8 ans révolus qu’elle exerce ces petites activités génératrices de revenus de ce genre. Cependant, elle vient de bénéficier plus de 15 cycles de programme de microcrédit de l’IMF Hekima. Ce nouveau crédit doit lui servir de s’approvisionner avec 8 sacs de farine de maniocs et le reste d’argent sera affecté dans le modeste investissement et soutenir mon mari. En plus, elle souhaite  voir ses enfants grandir et construire honorablement sa maison. La cliente remercie Hekima pour  ses actions dédiées de pauvres femmes pour leur émancipation économique et financière.
texts.en: The client is a bravely ambitious 35 year old businesswoman with five young children who all study. She sells flour. Her husband is a dressmaker. She sets up her merchandise in an agricultural warehouse in Birere. She started her business with her own money that her husband gave her, then subsequently she received a further credit of 50$ from IMF Hekima. She has been doing these small money making activities for more than 8 years. However she has just received a further loan after 15 loans, from the micro-credit program IMF Hekima. This new loan will enable her to stock up on 8 sacks of manioc flour and the rest of the money will be used for modest investment and to help her husband. In addition, she wants to see her children grow up and build her house decently. The client thanks Hekima for their action dedicated to poor women to help them on the way to economic and financial emancipation.

loans.use: to buy 8 sacks of manioc flour etc.

location.country: The Democratic Republic of the Congo

loans.name: Geremías

texts.es:
Geremías tiene 24 años, es un responsable padre de familia que vive en compañía de Margarita, su esposa desde hace 5 años. Tenen dos hijos menores: Alex y Joshy, a los que cuidan en su casa propia ubicada en la localidad de Pampas.  
Aunque sólo siembra una vez al año, es agricultor, como sus padres. Desde niño comenzó a cuidar la tierra y producirla. Gracias a ello pudo obtener su casa propia y un camión con el que transporta la carga de las cosechas de papa, habas cebada y demás. Todos los viernes, sábados y domingos trabaja, no solo llevando carga, sino también comercializándola, pues compra productos para venderlos en las ferias de las ciudades cercanas, obteniendo de esa manera un ingreso superior. Los demás días de la semana se dedica al transporte público. Ahora está planeando mejorar sus cultivos para poder sembrar en mayor cantidad, además de ahorrar para comprar sus propios terrenos agrícolas.

Este es su primer crédito con MFP y agradece el apoyo brindado, con que podrá mejorar su negocio y por ende sus ingresos. Promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas, pues desea seguir logrando sus objetivos y trabajando con los miembros de su grupo, pues son personas responsables y solidarias.
Geremías invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de cebada, olluco y papa en cantidad para abastecer los pedidos que tiene.
texts.en:
Geremías is 24 years old. He is a responsible head of the family living with Margarita, his wife for 5 years. They have 2 young children: Alex and Joshy, caring for them in their own home in the town of Pampas. Although he plants only one time a year, he is a farmer, like his parents. From childhood he began to care for the land and cultivate it. Thanks to this he could obtain his own home and a truck to use to transport his harvest of potatoes, beans, barley and others. 

Every Friday, Saturday and Sunday he works, not only carrying his cargo, but also selling it, buying products to sell in the markets in nearby cities, in this way getting a higher income. The other days of the week he works in public transportation. He is now planning to improve his crops in order to plant in larger quantity, and also to save in order to buy his own farmland.

This is his first loan through MFP and he is grateful for the support given, with which he can improve his business and as a consequence his earnings. He promises to be punctual in his loan payments as he wants to continue achieving his goals and working with the members of the group as they are trustworthy and united people.

Geremías will invest the requested funds in the purchase of barley, olluco [grown primarily as root vegetable, secondarily as leaf vegetable] and potatoes in quantity to meet the orders he has.

loans.use: to buy merchandise in order to sell it

loans.name: Duo Daniel Group

texts.es:
DUO DANIEL
