El dúo está formado por doña Miriam de 29 años de edad ella está casada y tiene 3 hijos, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa típica (cortes, güipiles, delantales)tiene este negocio desde hace 1 año, nos cuenta que solicita este crédito para comprar otro tipo de ropa ya que los güipiles que son los que más vende son muy caros y hay personas que no lo pueden pagar de un solo entonces quiere empezar a vender blusas un poco más sencillas y de menor precio porque así la gente se lo paga ya que no quiere dar al crédito porque hay personas que ya no pagan, por eso esta solicitando este credito para la compra de blusas en diferentes diseños.
texts.en:
The duo known as "Daniel" was formed by Doña Miriam. She is 29 years old, married, and has three children. Miriam has been selling traditional clothes (skirts, blouses, and aprons) for one year.

She is requesting a loan in order to buy other types of clothing. The traditional blouses are what she sells the most, but they are very expensive and not many people can afford to buy only one. Therefore, she wants to start selling blouses that are more simple and less expensive so that people can buy them. She does not want to extend credit because there are people who do not pay. Miriam is requesting a loan in order to buy blouses in different styles.

loans.use: to buy clothing in different styles.

loans.name: Banco Mujer Mango Group

texts.es:
Este es un grupo de mujeres que conforman el Banco Mujer Mango, ellas habitan en la provincia de Puntarenas, en el cantón de Corredores, en el distrito de Laurel, en la comunidad de Mango, esta es una zona urbana, donde el cultivo predominante es la Palma Aceitera, en las fincas principalmente ocupan hombres, por el tipo de trabajo, en una comunidad cercana esta el vivero de la palma y la planta procesadora en la cual tambien se da trabajo a mujeres, la demanda de empleo es grande mas no así la oferta, de alli que Heilyn toma la desición de formar parte de este grupo de mujeres con la intención de comenzar su negocio de venta de reposteria, con los préstamos que ha recibido ha podido compar implementos necesarios para el desarrollo de su actividad productiva.
Heilyn es una joven madre tiene un hijo varón de cuatro años, es conciente que aunque tiene un nuevo compañero que no es el padre de su hijo, ella necesita generar ingresos para poder dar un mejor nivel de vida a su hijo, el compañero actual es una persona que se dedica a la rama de la construcción, por lo que pasa algunas semanas sin trabajo, y es allí donde lo que genera la venta de la reposteria se convierte en un aporte importantisimo para el sosten del hogar.
Dentro de sus planes esta el poder tener un negocio en constante crecimiento, que le permita mejorar su calidad de vida
texts.en:
This group of women makes up the communal bank Banco Mujer Mango, from the province of Puntarenas in the canton of Corredores, district of Laurel, community of Mango.  This is an urban area, and the main agricultural area is Palma Aceitera.  Mostly men work the estate, because of the type of the work.  In a nearby community are the nursery and the processing plant, where women work too.  The demand for employees is high, but the supply is not, so Heilyn decided to become a part of this group with the intention of starting her own business selling pastries.  With the loan she has received, she has been able to buy the necessary tools to develop her business.  

Heilyn is a young mother with a 4-year-old son.  She knows that even though she has a new partner who is not the father of her son, she needs to generate income to be able to give her son a better life.  Her partner works in the construction industry and sometimes goes weeks without work so her pastry business becomes a very important contribution to maintaining the home.  Her plans include having her business in constant growth, which could improve her quality of life.

loans.use: buy catalog merchandise.

loans.name: Carlos Armando

texts.es:
Don Carlos tiene 45 años de edad, es casado y tiene tres hijos. Desde los 10 años de edad él se dedica a realizar trabajos agrícolas, pues él se creció con sus abuelos. Se levanta a las 4:30 a.m. a tomar su taza de café, luego camina una hora hasta llegar al lugar donde trabaja y sale a la 1:00 p.m., para después regresar a su casa. para comprar los insumos don Carlos camina a pie treinta minutos hasta llegar a la carretera para abordar un autobús que lo conduce a la ciudad, una vez que ha terminado sus compras se regresa a su casa. 

Él solicita un préstamo a Fundación Campo, para comprar 11 sacos de fertilizantes, una bolsa de semilla y un galón de herbicida y dos litros de veneno. Con esta inversión tendrá disponible el dinero para comprar sus insumos, ya que solo eso le hace falta, porque la tierra ya la tiene y por falta de insumos no ha podido sembrar. Al realizar sus cultivos a tiempo tendrá la posibilidad de vender mejor es más segura.

Don Carlos desea continuar trabajando y ahorrar lo más que pueda para preparar académicamente a sus hijos, además desea dejarles una vivienda digna, ya que viven en un terreno propiedad de sus padres.
texts.en:
Don Carlos is 45 years old. He's married and has three children. He has worked in agriculture ever since he was 10 years old, because he was raised by his grandparents. He gets up at 4:30 a.m., drinks his cup of coffee and then walks for an hour until he arrives where he works. He leaves at 1 p.m. to return to his home. In order to buy supplies, Don Carlos walks for 30 minutes on foot until he gets to the road and catches a bus that takes him into town. Once he's done with his shopping, he goes back home.
He requests a loan from Fundación Campo in order to purchase 11 sacks of fertilizer, a bag of seeds, a gallon of herbicide and two litres of poison. With this loan, he will have money available for purchasing his supplies. That's all he's missing, since he already has the land and he hasn't been able to sow for lack of supplies. By cultivating his produce on time, he will have a greater possibility to sell his crop at better prices.
Don Carlos wishes to continue working and saving as much money as possible so that he can provide education for his children. Furthermore, he wishes to give them a decent home, since they live on a plot of land owned by his parents.

loans.use: to purchase 11 sacks of fertilizer, a bag of seeds, a gallon of herbicide and two litres of poison.

loans.name: María Matilde

texts.es:
María Matilde es una mujer de 35 años, que vive junto a su esposo en una casa que les facilita la Companía Palma Tica, donde labora el esposo, unicamente deben pagar la energia electrica, proximamente deberan pagar la factura del agua; ella desarrolla su actividad comercial desde su casa de habitación,ya que ella pide la mercadería, hace la trasferencia de dinero y le envian por encomienda hasta su casa el pedido.
Vive en la provincia de Puntarenas, en el cantón de Corredores, en el distrito de Corredor, en el sector de Coto 47, esta es una zona que se caracteriza por grandes extenciones de terreno cultivadas de Palma Aceitera, la cual se procesa en la zona por medio de Cooperativa, quienes ofertan trabajo a mujeres sin embargo es insuficiente para satisfacer la necesidad de un empleo remunerado para las mujeres de la zona.
Su actividad comercial la realiza vendiendo articulos de catálogo a mujeres, que laboran en la Cooperativa que procesa la palma aceitera, asi como con esposas de trabajodes de las fincas aledañas; este préstamo se utilizara para la compra de mercadería de catálogo tales como cosmeticos, ropa interior para damas, asi mismo para ropa de mujer.
Dentro de los planes futuros de Matilde esta, el poder concluir su educación secundaria, y continuar estudios parauniversitarios o técnicos, en la actualidad  cursa su octavo grado de secundaria, asiste a clases solamente los sabados por lo que no se interrumpe se actividad de comercio.
texts.en:
María Matilde is a 35 year old woman who lives with her husband in a house provided by the Palma Tica Company, her husband's employer.  They only pay electricity and they will have to pay the water bill in the future.  She has developed a business out of her house, where she orders the merchandise, transfers the money, and the packaged order is sent to her at home.

She lives in the provice of Puntarenas, in the county and district of Corredores, in the sector Coto 47.  This is an area characterized by large expanses of terrain cultivated by Palma Aceitera (palm oil), which is is produced in the area via a cooperative.  The cooperative offers work to women; however, it is not sufficient to satisfy the need for paid female work in the area. 

Her business activities consist of selling catalog articles to women, who work in the cooperative that processes the palm oil, as well as the wives of workers in the surrounding farms.  She will use this loan for the purchase of catalog merchandise such as cosmetics, women's underwear, as well as women's clothing.

Amongst her future plans Matilde would like to finish high school and continue her studies either at a university or tecnical school.  Currently she is in the eighth grade in high school and she can only take classes on Saturdays so that it does not interrupt her business activities.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetics, underwear, and clothing

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase clothing to sell in her shop.

loans.name: Las Palomitas Group

texts.es: La Alcancía Comunal “Las Palomitas” está conformado por 07 socios responsables la cual llevan  01 año Y 04, meses  trabajando con el Programa-Prosperidad. Emilia tiene 44 años es conviviente y tiene 04 hijos, 03 de ellos aún dependientes y es la que preside al grupo. Ella brinda servicios de limpieza y de cocina, este trabajo le ha permitido cubrir algunos gastos de su hogar. Actualmente el dinero que percibe lo destina para la construcción de su vivienda. En esta oportunidad solicito el crédito para la compra de materiales de construcción como cemento, arena, etc. para algunos acabados de su vivienda, pues piensa alquilar cuartos. A futuro le gustaría instalar una boutique, pues así asegura ella tendrá mayores ganancias. Emilia al igual que todos los integrantes de la Alcancía Comunal “Las Palomitas” agradecen el crédito brindado, ya que hacen posible su progreso.   Emilia está ubicada en la parte posterior es la primera del  lado izquierdo,  viste una chompa color beige
texts.en:
The communal bank Las Palomitas is made up of 7 trustworthy members who have been working from 4 months to a year with the Prosperity Program.

Emilia is 44 years old, married with 4 children, 3 of them are still dependent, and she is the chairperson of the group. She offers cleaning and cooking services. This work has permitted her to cover some of the household expenses. Currently the money that she receives goes toward the construction of her home. 

At this time she is asking for a loan in order to buy construction materials such as cement, sand, etc., in order to finish some of her home as she plans to rent some rooms. In the future she would like to install a boutique because it would insure that she will have better income. 

Emilia, like all the members of the communal bank Las Palomitas, is grateful for the granted loans as they make their progress possible. Emilia is located in the back row, the first on the left side, wearing a beige sweater.

loans.use: to buy construction materials

loans.name: Divino Niño Jesús  (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal Divino Niño Jesús está formado por 14 socias quienes viven en diferentes lugares de la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es desde Diciembre de 1999 Patrimonio Cultural de la Humanidad, tiene un clima frió, su accidente geográfico la hace especial y cuenta con diferentes lugares para disfrutar de la naturaleza, esta es una ciudad muy rica en su cultura y tradiciones, su gastronomía es muy variada. Su gente es amable, gentil como nuestras socias, quienes son mujeres que trabajan día a día para mejorar su situación económica y sacar adelante a sus familias, laboran en diferentes actividades económicas como comercio o agricultura, se caracterizan por aun mantener la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos. 

Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. Nancy Beatriz, tiene 26 años de edad, es madre soltera de 3 hijos de 10, 6 y 4 años de edad, sus dos primeros hijos estudian en una escuelita de la ciudad. No tiene casa propia por lo que vive arrendando.

La Señora. Nancy Beatriz se encarga de los quehaceres de su hogar y para sacar adelante a sus hijos se dedica al comercio, vende todo tipo de ropa, labora de domingo a domingo sin un horario fijo y su mercadería la vende recorriendo la ciudad, se encuentra en el negocio hace 3 años.
 
Este es el primer crédito que realiza en el banco comunal al cual fue invitada por una amiga y vecina, su crédito lo va a invertir comprando ropa para surtir mas la mercadería.

Su sueño es tener una boutique.
texts.en:
The community bank Divino Niño Jesús is made up of 14 members who live throughout the city of Cuenca (a city which has been listed as a World Heritage site by UNESCO since December 1999).  The city has a cold climate and its geographical location makes it special, as it offers a variety of places to enjoy nature.  It is a city rich in culture and traditions, with varied gastronomical offerings.  The people there are friendly and gentle like the members of this group:  women who work daily to improve their economic situation for their families.  They work at different economic activities like business and agriculture, which maintain the culture and traditions of their towns.

One of the members of this group is Nancy Beatriz.  She is 26 years old and is the single mother of three children ages 10, 6 and 4.  Her first two children study in a small school in the city.  She does not have her own house, so she rents.  Nancy Beatriz is in charge of the chores of her home. She helps her family get ahead through her business selling a variety of clothing.  She works seven days a week without a fixed schedule and she sells her merchandise across the city.  She has been working at this business for three years.  

This is the first loan that she has requested through the community bank, at the invitation of a friend and neighbor.  She is going to invest the loan in the purchase of clothing in order to increase her inventory.  Her dream is to have a boutique.

loans.use: to buy clothing.

loans.name: Lázaro

texts.es: Lázaro habita en casa propia junto con su familia, desde hace 14 años. Él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y maicillo. Desde niño aprendió a cultivar la tierra, esta actividad es la que le ha permitido llevar el sustento a su hogar. Todos los días se levanta muy temprano para trabajar en la tierra y poder sacar la cosecha que es su principal fuente de ingresos. Él es el principal soporte económico de su familia y desea continuar siéndolo por mucho más tiempo.  Es muy conocido en la zona como una persona trabajadora, amble y responsable. Muchas personas dan buenas referencias, tanto de él como de su trabajo. Vale la pena destacar que habita en condiciones muy sencillas y humildes las cuales desea ir paliando poco a poco. Solicita este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra de los insumos necesarios (abonos, semillas, insecticidas, etc.) para dar inicio a la siembra ya que solo de esta forma puede llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar. Espera que con la ayuda de esta institución pueda lograr su sueño de sacar una cosecha abundante, para cancelar el préstamo y continuar llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar.
texts.en: Lazaro has lived in his own house with his family for the past fourteen years. He cultivates corn and sorghum. He learned to work the earth as a child. Farming has helped him to provide for his family. He gets up very early every day to work the earth and to be able to harvest his crops, which are his main source of income. He is the main financial provider for his family and he hopes to continue being so well into the future. He is very well-known in the region as a hard-working person who is both friendly and responsible. Many people give both him and his work good references. It is worth noting that he lives in simple and humble conditions, which he hopes to change little by little. He is requesting this loan from INTEGRAL to invest by purchasing the necessary supplies (fertilizer, seeds, and insecticides, etc.) to start planting. It is only through this work that he can bring bread to his home on a daily basis. He hopes that with the help of the institution he will be able to achieve his dream of reaping an abundant harvest, pay off his loan, and continue bringing bread to his home on a daily basis.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer, seeds, and insecticides, etc.

loans.name: Ernesto

texts.es: Ernesto vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos, él se dedica a la venta de hamacas y tiene varios años de dedicarse a este negocio, se ha hecho de mucha experiencia, elabora las hamacas más bonitas y resistentes al gusto del cliente, su venta está ubicada en el lugar de su residencia y también forma ambulante, se ha hecho de muy buenos clientes pues ellos están conscientes que todo lo que comercia es de primera calidad y a precio accesible además de un servicio inigualable; Ernesto es un hombre trabajador, dedicado y entusiasta siempre está motivado a buscar alternativas para un futuro más próspero, que le permitan alcanzar sus sueños, en esta temporada quiere aumentar la producción pero necesita de capital para poder comprar hilos, lazos, madera etc. Él es un hombre responsable y con buen record crediticio, tiene la seguridad que podrá cancelar el financiamiento en el periodo establecido y al mismo tiempo podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Ernesto lives with his life partner and their two children.  He sells hammocks and has had this business for many years.  He has a lot of experience and makes the prettiest and most resilient hammocks, to his customer's specifications.  He sells the hammocks from his home and door to door.  He has a very good customer base because they know that everything he sells is top quality, at a reasonable price and with unequaled service.  

Ernesto is a hardworking man, dedicated, and always enthusiastic. He is motivated to seek out alternatives for a more prosperous future that lets him achieve his dreams.  This season he wants to increase production but he needs capital to be able to purchase thread, rope, wood, etc.  He is responsible with a good credit record.  He is sure he will be able to make his payments on the established schedule and at the same time provide his family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase thread, rope, and wood.

loans.name: Jose Abel

texts.es: José Abel de sesenta y tres años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos en casa propia, él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y tiene varios años de trabajar en la agricultura por lo que ha obtenido experiencia  valiosa que le ayuda a obtener las mejores cosechas, su terreno es propio y está ubicado cerca del lugar donde vive, el comercia en todos los alrededores de la zona y se ha hecho  de mucha clientela pues saben que todo lo que venden es de excelente calidad y a un buen precio además del excelente servicio, José Abel es un hombre emprendedor dedicado a su labor, muy visionario siempre está a la expectativa de nuevas formas de salir adelante una de ellas es expandir el negocio pero para eso necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz por mayor, fertilizantes, herramientas; José Abel tiene experiencia crediticia y es de excelente paga por eso será puntual a la hora de la cancelación de la deuda, y a la vez tiene la confianza que podrá darle a su familia un futuro más próspero.
texts.en: Jose Abel, 63, lives with his life partner and their children in his own home.  He is a farmer who cultivates corn.  He has been farming for a number of years, and so he has obtained valuable experience that helps him to get better harvests.  He cultivates on his own land, which is located close to the house where he lives.  He sells his products everywhere around his area, and he has gained a lot of customers because they know that everything he sells is top quality.  Also, he sells at very good prices and provides excellent service.  Jose Abel is an enterprising man who is dedicated to his work.  He is very forward-looking, always on the lookout for new ideas that will allow him to get ahead.  One of these is to expand his business, but to do this he needs capital.  For this reason he is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow him to buy corn seeds at wholesale, fertilizers and tools.  Jose Abel has an excellent credit history, and so he will be punctual in making the payments on this loan.  Also, as a result of this loan, he is confident that he will be able to give his family a more prosperous future.

loans.use: to buy corn seeds at wholesale, fertilizers and tools

loans.name: Anonymous Group

texts.fr: La cliente, leader du collectif de crédit « Pendeza », est un entrepreneur, courageusement ambitieux, âgée de 46 ans, mère de 8 jeunes enfants qui étudient et d’autres ont déjà leur propre foyer. Elle est  vendeuse de tomates, arachides, épinces, etc. Son mari est chômeur. Elle installe ses marchandises dans le petit marché sectoriel de Ndosho. Elle commença son business avec son fonds propre reçu de son mari d’un montant équivalent à 30$, alors, plus tard elle bénéficia un fond additionnel de crédit de 50$ de l’IMF Hekima. Il y a 3 ans révolus qu’elle exerce ces petites activités génératrices de revenus de ce genre. Cependant, elle vient de réaliser  7  cycles en profitant  du programme de microcrédit de l’IMF Hekima. Ce nouveau crédit doit lui servir  de s’approvisionner avec  2 paniers de tomates,poissons, 15 kg d’arachides.  En plus, elle souhaite  voir ses enfants grandir  et  construire honorablement sa maison.  La cliente remercie Hekima pour  ses actions dédiées de pauvres femmes pour leur émancipation économique et financière.
texts.en: The client, who is leader of the credit group Pendeza, is a bravely ambitious businesswoman. She is 46 years old and mother of eight young children who are studying and of others who already have their own homes. She sells tomatoes, groundnuts, spices, etc. Her husband is unemployed. She installs her merchandise in the small sectorial market in Ndosho. She started her business with the equivalent of about 30$ of her own money that her husband gave her, then later on received a further sum of 50$ from IMF Hekima. She has been doing these small money making activities for over three years. However, she has just benefited from a seventh loan from the IMF Hekima micro-credit program. This new credit will enable her to stock up with 2 baskets of tomatoes, fish, and 15 kilograms of groundnuts. In addition, she wishes to build her home decently and see her children grow up. The client thanks IMF Hekima for their action dedicated to poor women to help them towards economic and financial emancipation.

loans.use: to buy 2 baskets of tomatoes, fish,15 kgs of groundnuts.

location.country: The Democratic Republic of the Congo

loans.name: Tarpuy Group

texts.es: La Sra. Olga  es casada, tiene 3 hijo Y tiene 63 años de edad , actualmente es integrante en la alcancía comunal “Tarpuy” grupo  conformado por 10 socios que se dedican a diversas actividades de comercio. Olga  trabaja desde hace 28 años  como profesora de eduaccion primaria y a su vez tiene un negocio de granja de cuy son animales que se vende para el consumo y tambien vende verdura ya que tiene una casa de campo donde lo siembra estos negocios surgen a raiz de que sus hijos ingresan a la universidad, Olga trabajo muy duro junto a asu esposo, gracias a su esfuerzo y dedicación ha logrado mejores ingresos económicos , su hijos terminaron la universidad y sobre todo  su familia tiene una mejor calidad de vida ,  con el fin de seguir creciendo a solicitado un nuevo préstamo para invertir en su negocio de granja de cuy. Olga cumplirá sus metas con mucho trabajo y esfuerzo y que los préstamos de Edaprospo le ayudaran
texts.en:
Sra. Olga is 63 years old, married, and has three children. She is currently a member of the Communal Bank group called "Tarpuy", which consists of 10 members who engage in different retail activities.

Olga has been an elementary school teacher for 28 years. She also has a business raising guinea pigs, which are sold for consumption. Olga also sells vegetables since she has a country home where she grows her products. The emergence of these businesses have helped Olga send her children to college. Most of all, she wants her entire family to have a better quality of life.

Olga's intention is to continue growing, so she is requesting a new loan to invest in her guinea pig business. She wants to accomplish her goals through hard work and effort, as well as with the help of the loans from EDAPROSPO.

loans.use: to invest in her guinea pig business.

loans.name: Duo Bethelem Group

texts.es: Duo Bethelem: este duo esta integrado por la señora Maria,es casada y tiene cuatro hijos y estan en epoca escolar, ella tiene una tortilleria donde elavora y vende tortillas los tres tiempos,y tambien elavora güipiles a mano, nos comenta que poco a poco a credido en su negocio y es por eso que esta solicitando este credito para la compra de maiz y para la compra de materia prima para la confeccion de tejidos tipicos.
texts.en: Duo Bethelem: this duo was created by Señora Maria. She is married and has 4 school-aged children. She has a tortilleria where she makes and sells tortillas three times a day. She also makes güipiles [colorful traditional Mayan textiles] by hand. She tells us that little by little her business has grown which is why she is requesting this loan to purchase corn and raw materials to create traditional fabrics.

loans.use: to purchase corn and raw materials to create traditional fabrics.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To sell jewellery and gold plated items, such as chains, bracelets and earrings

loans.name: Juana Evangelista

texts.es: Juana Evangelista de treinta y nueve años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y cinco hijos en casa propia; Ella se dedica a la elaboración de tortillas desde hace diez años, tiene mucha experiencia, su negocio está ubicado en el lugar de su residencia y le vende a todas las personas de la zona,  es muy conocida pues elabora las tortillas más ricas y calientitas, hechas con material de primera calidad y vendidas a precio accesible además el servicio es el más rápido; Juana es una mujer decidida y entregada a su labor, piensa que lo más importante es no dejar de caminar porque solo así se llega al éxito, en estas últimas semanas ha aumentado la demanda por parte de  la clientela y Juana necesita invertir más en insumos para aumentar la producción por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz por mayor, y leña suficiente para todo el invierno. Juana tiene buenas referencias crediticias y tiene la certeza que podrá pagar toda la deuda, y a la vez ofrecerle a su familia un futuro más próspero.
texts.en:
Juana Evangelista is 39 and lives with her life partner and 5 children in their own home.  She has made a living through making tortillas for 10 years.  She has a lot of experience.  Her business is located in her home, and she sells to everyone in the area.  She is very well-known because she makes delicous and hot tortillas from high-quality ingredients, and she sells them at reasonable prices.  She also has the fastest service.

Juana is very determined and committed to her work.  She thinks that the most important thing is not to stop walking because that's how one reaches success.  In recent weeks, her demand has increased, and she needs to invest in more supplies to increase her production.  This is why she is requesting a loan from Integral that will let her buy corn wholesale and enough firewood to last the winter.  Juana has good credit references and is certain that she will be able to pay back the entire loan while offering her family a more prosperous future.

loans.use: to buy corn and firewood wholesale.

loans.name: Julio Antonio

texts.es: Julio Antonio vive junto a su madre, él se dedica a la agricultura, específicamente al cultivo de maíz, tiene varios años de trabajar en este rubro y se ha hecho de experiencia valiosa que le permite obtener las mejores cosechas,  el terreno donde siembra está cerca de su vivienda y en una zona de alta incidencia agrícola, comercia en todos los alrededores y ya tiene mucha clientela pues las personas saben que lo que comercia es de calidad y lo vende a muy buen precio además el servicio es excelente; Julio es un hombre entregado a su labor, con muchos sueños que desea alcanzar, está dispuesto a no darse por vencido en ningún momento y alcanzar el éxito, en la última cosecha tuvo pérdidas y quiere recuperarse,  invertirá en insumos pero necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, fertilizante, herbicida, insecticida, etc. Julio Antonio tiene capacidad crediticia para saldar la deuda y a la vez darle a su familia una mejor vida.
texts.en: Julio Antonio lives with his mother and is a farmer who mainly cultivates corn.  He has been in this line of work for a number of years, and so he has valuable experience that allows him to get better harvests.  The land that he cultivates is located close to his house, in an area with a lot of farming and commerce all around it.  He already has a lot of customers because the people know that he has quality products, and he sells at very good prices with excellent service.  Julio is a man who is dedicated to his work.  He has a lot of dreams that he wants to fulfill.  He is prepared to never, ever give up, and to be successful.  In his last harvest he had losses and he wants to recover, so he will invest in supplies.  However, he needs capital for this, and so he is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow him to purchase corn seeds, fertilizers, herbicides, insecticides, etc.  Julio Antonio has the capacity to pay off this debt and also provide his family with a better life.

loans.use: to purchase corn seeds, fertilizers, herbicides, and insecticides

loans.name: Sandra Magali

texts.es: Sandra Magali de cuarenta y uno años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos en casa propia; ella se dedica a la venta de medicamento popular desde hace ya varios años, tiene mucha experiencia en el comercio es una excelente vendedora, vende de forma ambulante y se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues toda la medicina que comercia, le garantiza su salud, es de calidad y la vende a precios muy accesibles además que el servicio es único siempre está a la disposición de sus clientes; Sandra es una mujer entregada al hogar y a su trabajo, se dedica cada día a realizar bien su labor y a buscar alternativas que le ayuden a conseguir un futuro más próspero; desde hace algún tiempo quiere abarcar más zonas de venta que están en los alrededores donde reside , pero no le alcanza el producto por eso ahora quiere aumentar su compra de insumos y le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar medicina por mayor; Sandra Magali tiene buenas referencias de pago y moral intachable, está segura que podrá saldar su deuda y a la vez ofrecerle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en: 41-year-old Sandra Magali lives with her life partner and her children in a house she owns. She has been selling popular medicine for several years. She has a lot of experience in retail and she's an excellent seller. She does traveling sales and has gotten a lot of customers, because the high quality medicine she sells ensures their health ,and she offers very accessible prices. Furthermore, it's a unique service and she's always available to her customers. Sandra is dedicated to her home and her work. She strives everyday to do good work and to search for alternatives that help her achieve a more prosperous future. For some time now she has wished to cover more sales areas near where she lives, but she doesn't have enough merchandise. For that reason, she currently wants to increase her supply purchases, and she requests a loan from INTEGRAL in order to purchase medicine by wholesale. Sandra Magali has a good repayment record and impeccable morals. She's certain she will be able to settle her debt and, at the same time, provide her family with a full life.

loans.use: to purchase medicine by wholesale.

loans.name: Rudy Antonio

texts.es: Rudy Antonio tiene 45 años de edad y habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su esposa y sus dos hijos de 12 y 15 años. Él se dedica a la venta de variedad de fruta fresca en el parque central de la zona donde habita. Realiza esta actividad desde hace muchos años y gracias a su carisma en el negocio se ha ganado la confianza de muchas personas, los cuales cada día lo prefieren más. La ubicación del negocio es muy estratégica ya que es una zona muy transitada y visitada en la cual muchas personas llegan para descansar o pasar el rato. Tiene muchos clientes, ya que él busca la forma de tener la fruta de manera atractiva de tal forma que los clientes lo busquen y compren. Ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito para comprar variedad de frutas como: manzanas, naranjas, guineos, melones, sandia, etc. Para incrementar el su inventario el cual le permita incrementar las ventas y los ingresos, de tal forma que pueda mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: Rudy Antonio is 45 years old and lives in the house he owns, with his wife and two children, ages 12 and 15. He sells a variety of fresh fruit in the central park of the area where he lives. He has been doing this for many years and thanks to his charisma in the business has earned the trust of many people who buy from him each day. The business location is very strategic since it is a very busy area, where many people come to relax and pass the time. He has many customers as he sets out the fruit in an attractive manner so that customers will stop and buy it. He decided to apply for this loan to buy a variety of fruits such as apples, oranges, bananas, melons, watermelon, etc, to increase his inventory and allow him to increase sales and revenue, so as to improve his family's quality of life.

loans.use: To buy apples, oranges, bananas, melons, watermelons, etc.

loans.name: Luz Argentina

texts.es: Luz Argentina habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su familia. Ella se dedica al comercio de tienda desde hace mucho tiempo. Ha trabajado toda su vida para dar a su familia lo necesario para vivir dignamente. Es una mujer que se caracteriza por ser muy trabajadora, emprendedora, responsable y generosa. Muchas personas dan buenas referencias de ella y expresan estar satisfechas con el servicio que reciben ya que en su negocio pueden encontrar variedad de artículos a precios accesibles. La tienda la ha establecido en su hogar de habitación, la cual ha acomodado de manera estratégica para que los clientes puedan  sentirse atraídos a visitarla. Quiere darle un impulso a las ventas, para lo cual ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este préstamo, le permita adquirir productos de tienda como: productos de limpieza, arroz, frijoles, azúcar, café, macarrones, etc. prevé que una vez teniendo surtida su tienda podrá abarcar una mayor demanda de mercado la cual le permitirá aumentar sus ventas e ingresos y por consecuencia mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: Luz Argentina lives in her own house with her family.  She has had a store for a long time.  She has worked all of her life to provide for her family's needs so that they can live with dignity.  She is a woman who is known for being very hardworking, enterprising, responsible and generous.  Many people give good references for her and state that they are satisfied with the service they receive, since when they go to her business they can find a variety of products at affordable prices.  Her store is set up in her home, and she has conditioned the space strategically so that her customers are attracted to visit.  She wants to increase her sales, and so she has taken the decision to request this loan that will allow her to purchase products for her store such as: cleaning products, rice, beans, sugar, coffee, pasta, etc.  She predicts that once she gets her store stocked with goods, she will absorb a greater share of the market, which will allow her to increase her sales and income, and thus improve the quality of life for herself and her family.

loans.use: to buy cleaning products, rice, beans, sugar, coffee, pasta, etc.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es: Juan Carlos tiene 35 años de edad y habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su esposa y sus hijos. No logro terminar sus estudios básicos, debido a que sus padres no contaban con los recursos económicos para terminar de pagarle los estudios. Lo mas importante  que heredo de sus padres es el regalo del trabajo, ya que le enseñaron a cultivar la tierra y de esta forma es como se gana la vida y lleva el pan de cada día a su hogar. Cada año siembra y cultiva maíz y frijoles ya que son los principales granos básicos que se dan en la zona. Después de sacar la cosecha, pone a la venta una parte de esta y otras es para consumo de la familia. Debido a que la temporada para la siembra ya está presente, solicita este préstamo a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra de los insumos necesarios (semillas, abonos, insecticidas, etc.) para obtener una cosecha abundante y así poder continuar llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar y poder ir mejorando su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: Juan Carlos is thirty-five years old and lives in his own home with his wife and children. He never finished school because his parents did not have the financial resources to pay for his tuition. The most important thing he inherited from his parents is the gift of work. They taught him to work the earth and this is how he earns a living and brings bread to his home on a daily basis. Every year he plants corn and beans since they are the main staple grains grown in the region. After reaping the harvest, he sells part of his crop and keeps the rest to feed his family. Since the time to plant is right now, he is requesting this loan from INTEGRAL to invest by purchasing the necessary supplies (seeds, fertilizers, and insecticides, etc.) to realize an abundant harvest and be able to continue bringing bread to his home on a daily basis, as well as continue improving his and his family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizer, and insecticides, etc.

loans.name: Jose Lino

texts.es: José Lino vive junto a su compañero de  vida y sus hijos en casa propia; él se dedica a la venta de ropa de manta bordada , tiene varios años de dedicarse a este negocio y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia que le permite elaborar producto de calidad, vende de forma ambulante y ya tiene mucha clientela pues las personas saben  que todo lo que comercia es de calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio siempre está a la orden del día; José es un hombre emprendedor, muy dedicado a su trabajo, es honesto pero sobretodo muy humilde, piensa que si lo puedes soñar lo puedes lograr, su sueño es hacer crecer su negocio, quiere aumentar la producción pero necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar manta, hilo para bordar etc. José Lino tiene buen record crediticio y tiene la certeza que podrá cancelar el financiamiento además podrá ofrecerle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
José Lino lives with his life partner and children in his own home. He sells clothing made of embroidered manta [a natural, unbleached cotton]. He has worked this business for many years, and he has had a lot of experience which allows him to make quality products. He sells by traveling around, and he already has many clients, as people know that everything he sells is of quality and at an affordable price. Furthermore his service is always the order of the day. 

José is a hard-working man and very dedicated to his job. He is honest, but above all, humble. He believes that if you dream it, you can achieve it, and his dream is to grow his business. He wants to increase production, but needs capital, and that's why he's asking for a loan from Integral. It will allow him to buy cloth, embroidery thread, etc. José Lino has a good credit record and he is certain that he will be able to to pay off the loan, in addition to offering his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy cloth and embroidery thread.

loans.name: José Tulio

texts.es: José Tulio tiene 49 años de edad y habita en casa propia con su esposa y cuatro hijos. Junto con la ayuda de sus hijos que ya son mayores de edad y tienen un empleo, van satisfaciendo las necesidades de su hogar las cuales cada vez son mayores, debido a que la situación económica es difícil. Él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijoles desde hace mucho tiempo. Realizar esta actividad le ha permitido llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar, puesto que nunca ha contado con otra fuente de ingresos que no sea la agricultura. Después de sacar la cosecha, pone a la venta una parte de la misma, para suplir otras necesidades de la familia. Requiere de este préstamo, ya que necesita hacer una inversión en los insumos agrícolas (semillas, abonos, insecticidas, etc.) necesarios para la siembra. De esta forma prevé que podrá obtener una cosecha favorable, que le permitirá cancelar el préstamo y continuar llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar.
texts.en:
José Tulio is 49 years old, and lives in his own house with his wife and 4 children. With the help of his 2 adult children who have jobs, he is able to meet the increasingly great needs of his family, since the economic situation is difficult. He has made his living by growing corn and beans for a long time. This activity has allowed him to provide for his family’s daily needs, since he has never had any other income source than agriculture. 

After he brings in the harvest, José sells part of the crops to care for his family’s other needs. He needs this loan because he needs to make an investment in necessary agricultural inputs (seeds, fertilizers, pesticide, etc.) for planting. In this way, he predicts that he will be able to obtain a favorable harvest which will allow him to pay off the loan and continue caring for his family’s needs.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizers, pesticide, etc.

loans.name: Angel Maria

texts.es: Ángel María de cincuenta y tres años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos; ella se dedica a la venta de dulces y piñatas en el mercado municipal de la zona donde reside, tiene mucho tiempo de dedicarse al comercio y es una excelente vendedora, tiene mucha clientela pues todos sus productos son de calidad y los vende a precio accesible además el servicio es inigualable, Ángel siempre está a la orden de las personas que la visitan; es una mujer ejemplar , trabaja duro día con día para en un futuro alcanzar el éxito, quiere hacer crecer el negocio y aumentar sus insumos por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar dulces por mayor, piñatas, etc. Ángel María es muy responsable con una moral intachable, tiene buenas referencias crediticias está segura que podrá cancelar el financiamiento y a la vez llevar a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en: Ángel María is 53 and lives with her life partner and her children.  She makes a living selling candy and piñatas at the city market in the area where she lives.  She has done this work for a long time and is an excellent saleswoman.  She has a lot of customers because her products are high-quality and she sells them at reasonable prices.  Her service is also unequaled.  Ángel is always at the service of the people who visit her.  She is an exemplary woman.  She works hard day after day to be successful in the future.  She wants to grow her business and increase her supplies, which is why she is requesting a loan from Integral that will let her buy candy wholesale, piñatas, etc.  Ángel María is very responsible with impeccable morals.  She has good credit references, and she is sure that she will be able to pay off her financing while bringing her home economic security.

loans.use: to buy candy wholesale and piñatas.

loans.name: Jose Arnoldo

texts.es: José Arnoldo de cuarenta y ocho años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y su hijo; él se dedica al cultivo de maíz, tiene muchos años de dedicarse a la agricultura y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia, el terreno donde siembra es de mucha incidencia agrícola, todas las cosecha son de muy buena calidad y  comercia a precios bajos, todo lo vende a los alrededores de la zona y se ha hecho de mucha clientela fija; José es un hombre activo, siempre está motivado a trabajar duro para superarse y alcanzar el éxito, piensa que no hay que dejar que los sueños se queden en el camino hay que llevarlos al final de la meta, en la última cosecha debido a las lluvias tuvo algunas perdidas, en esta temporada de siembra quiere recuperarse pero necesita invertir en insumos por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, insecticida, fertilizante etc. José Arnoldo tiene buen record crediticio y sabe que tiene la capacidad de cancelar la deuda y a la vez ofrecerle a su familia un futuro más próspero.
texts.en:
José Arnoldo is forty-eight years old and lives with his partner and their son. He devotes himself to growing maize, and with many years in agriculture he has built up a lot of experience. The land he works is good agricultural land, so his crops are very good quality and he sells them at competitive prices. He sells them all locally and has built a base of regular customers. Jose is an active man, always motivated to work hard to succeed. He believes people should not let dreams languish by the roadside, but drive them to their goals. 

In the last harvest, he had some losses due to the rains. In this planting season he wants to make up for the loss, but needs to invest in supplies. For this reason, he is seeking a loan with INTEGRAL, to allow him to purchase seed corn, insecticide, fertilizer and so on. José Arnoldo has a good credit record and knows he will be able to repay the loan and also offer his family a more prosperous future.

loans.use: To buy seed-corn, insecticide, and fertilizer

loans.name: Afiwa

texts.fr: Âgée de 27ans et  femme au foyer, Afiwa a 02 enfants (01 est scolarisé) âgés de 08ans et 1an 6mois. Elle est coiffeuse de profession et vend en même temps des produits cosmétiques à ses clients. Depuis 2009, elle a démarré l’activité qu’elle exerce dans un salon. La difficulté qu’elle rencontre sur le terrain est la concurrence. Elle est à son second crédit de WAGES et sollicite ce prêt pour acheter des produits cosmétiques (mèches, tissage, maquillage et autre). Elle veut réinvestir dans l’activité, agrandir son marché et avoir une famille heureuse.
texts.en: Afiwa is 27 years old, a housewife, and has two children (one is in school), between the ages of 8 and 18 months. She is a trained hair stylist and also sells cosmetic products to her clients on the side. She has been in business since 2009. Her main difficulty is competition. This is her second loan request from WAGES, which she will use to buy cosmetic products (hair extensions, make-up, etc.). She would like to re-invest in the business, grow her market share and have a happy family.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetics.

loans.name: Carlos Alberto

texts.es: Carlos Alberto de cuarenta y nueve años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y su hijo; el posee un taller de pintura para autos, tiene varios años de tener el negocio y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia, su negocio está ubicado en un lugar estratégico y es muy conocido en la zona pues todas las personas conocen el excelente trabajo que realiza, todo de primera calidad y con los precios más bajos; él es un hombre entregado a su labor, siempre con la más grande disposición de salir adelante, siempre está motivado sabe que si se esfuerza al máximo logrará todos sus objetivos; mucha gente conoce ya el trabajo de Carlos y por lo mismo ha aumentado la demanda en su negocio y para no decepcionar a los clientes decidió invertir en insumos por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar pintura por mayor y herramientas. Carlos Alberto ya tiene experiencia en créditos y asegura que es capaz de saldar el financiamiento y a la vez tiene la confianza de poder darle a su familia un futuro más próspero.
texts.en: Carlos Alberto is 49 years old.  He lives with his life partner and their son.  He has an auto painting business.  He has had this business for a number of years and has a lot of experience.  His shop is strategically located, and is very well known in the area.  Everyone knows the excellent work he does, all top quality and with the lowest prices.  Carlos gives his all to his work, with a great desire to get ahead.  He is always motivated and knows that if he gives it his all he will achieve his goals.  Many people are already familiar with Carlos's work, which has increased demand at his business.  He doesn't want to disappoint his customers so he has decided to invest in supplies.  For this reason he is asking INTEGRAL for a loan so that he can buy paint wholesale and tools.  Carlos Alberto has had prior loans and is sure that he will be able to make his payments.  He is also confident that he will be able to provide his family with a more prosperous future.

loans.use: to buy paint wholesale and tools.

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es: María del Carmen de treinta y ocho años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos; ella se dedica al cultivo de maíz y sorgo, tiene varios años de dedicarse a la agricultura y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia valiosa en el negocio,  es muy conocida en la zona porque siempre obtiene las mejores cosechas y se ha hecho de mucha clientela porque todo lo que comercia es de calidad, lo vende a un buen  precio y el servicio es excelente además vende fruta que le ayuda también con los gastos del hogar; María del Carmen es una mujer ejemplar, entregada a su trabajo siempre está a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades que le permitan salir adelante pues sabe que así podrá alcanzar el éxito, En esta última siembra tuvo algunas perdidas y tiene el deseo de recuperarse pero necesita invertir en insumos por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, sorgo, fertilizante, insecticida, herramienta etc. María tiene buenas referencias crediticias y tiene la certeza que podrá cancelar la deuda y a la vez confía que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
María del Carmen is 38 years old.  She lives with her life partner and their children.  She grows corn and sorghum.  She has worked in agriculture for many years and has a great deal of valuable experience in her business.  She is well known in the area because she always has the best crops and she has a large clientele because she has quality products, sold at a good price, and with excellent service.  She also sells fruit, which helps with household expenses.  

María del Carmen is an exemplary woman, dedicated to her work.  She is always looking for new opportunities that will allow her to get ahead because she knows that is the way to achieve success.  She experienced some losses in the last planting season and wants to recover from those, but she will need to invest in supplies.  For this reason she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL to purchase corn and sorghum seeds, fertilizer, insecticide, tools, etc.  Maria has good credit references and is certain that she will be able to pay off the debt.  She also believes she will provide her family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase corn and sorghum seeds, fertilizer, insecticide, and tools.

loans.name: Rina Claribel

texts.es: Rina Claribel de treinta y tres años de edad vive junto a su madre, ella posee una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad arroz, frijoles, huevos, leche, pan entre otros, tiene varios años de dedicarse al comercio, su tienda está ubicada en el lugar de su residencia, comercia para todas las personas del lugar y se ha hecho de mucha clientela fija porque todos los productos que vende son de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es único siempre está a la orden de las personas; Rina es una mujer trabajadora, dispuesta a superarse, está a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades para lograr alcanzar un futuro con éxito, la demanda en el negocio ha aumentado porque los clientes siempre encuentran ahí lo que necesitan, Rina tiene la idea de invertir más en producto por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL  un creditito que le permita comprar granos básicos, producto instantáneo, golosinas, pan, bebidas etc. Rina Claribel tiene muy buenas referencias de crédito es responsable y con moral impecable, confía que podrá saldar el financiamiento en el periodo establecido y a la vez darle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
Rina Claribel is 33 years old, and she lives with her mother.  She has a store where she sells basic needs items like rice, beans, eggs, milk, and bread, among others.  She has been doing this for several years.  Her store is in her house, and she sells to all of the people in her area.  She has a lot of fixed customers because all of the products she sells are first quality, and they are sold for accessible prices.  Also, the service is extraordinary.  She is always at her customers’ service.  

Rina is a hard-working woman who is prepared to improve herself.  She is anticipating new opportunities in order to achieve a successful future.  The demand in her business has increased because the customers always find what they need at her store.  

Rina’s idea is to invest more in products.  That is why she is requesting a loan from Integral.  She will use the loan to buy basic grains, instant products, sweets, bread, and drinks, etc.

Rina Claribel has a lot of good credit history.  She is responsible and has moral integrity.  She is confident that she will be able to repay the loan in the established time period.  At the same time she will give her family a full life.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, instant products, sweets, bread, and drinks, etc.

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.es: Mercedes de cincuenta y ocho años de edad vive junto a sus hijas y sus nietos en casa propia; ella posee una tienda donde vende productos de primera necesidad, granos básicos, producto instantáneo, pan , bebidas entre otros, tiene más de diez años con el negocio y tiene mucha clientela que la prefiere porque su tienda es la más surtida, el negocio está ubicado en el lugar de su residencia por lo que a Mercedes le gusta mantener su casa impecable, desde hace algún tiempo la vivienda necesita de algunas mejoras en el techo ya que tiene goteras y en este tiempo de lluvia afectara la comodidad del hogar, necesita comprar material para las reparaciones pero no posee de capital, por eso solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar tejas, polines, cemento, etc. Mercedes tiene buenas referencias crediticias, está segura que tiene la capacidad de saldar la deuda y a la vez podrá darle a su familia un futuro más próspero.
texts.en: Mercedes is fifty-eight years old and lives with her daughters and grandchildren in her own home. She has a shop selling basic groceries: grains, instant meals, bread, and drinks, among other things. She has had the business for over ten years, and has many customers who come to her because it is the best-stocked shop in the neighbourhood. The business is located in Mercedes' home, which she likes to keep spotless. For some time the house has needed some improvements, as the roof leaks and makes the home uncomfortable in the rainy season. She needs to buy materials for repairs but has no capital, so is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL to allow her to purchase tiles, wood, cement, etc. Mercedes has good credit references, and is confident she can repay the debt and also give her family a brighter future.

loans.use: To buy tiles, wood, and cement

loans.name: Maria Ana De Jesus

texts.es: María Ana de cincuenta y tres años de edad vive con su madre y sus hijos en zona rural y su casa es muy sencilla, posee una tortillería, tiene varios años con el negocio, está ubicado en el lugar de su residencia, es muy conocida por toda la zona y se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues tiene el servicio más rápido del lugar y las tortillas son elaboradas con material de primera calidad y a precios accesibles; María Ana es una mujer emprendedora y visionaria, tiene muchas metas a futuro y está dispuesta a luchar por alcanzarlas, quiere aumentar su producción pero necesita invertir es por eso que se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz por mayor. María posee un buen record crediticio y tiene la capacidad de cancelar el financiamiento y a la vez darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: María Ana is 53 years old. She lives with her mother and her children in a rural area and their home is very simple. She has had a tortilla shop for several years which is located in her home. She is well known throughout the area and has made many customers as her service is the fastest around and the tortillas are made of good quality and her prices are affordable. María Ana is an entrepreneur and visionary. She has many goals for the future and she is ready to fight to achieve them. She wants to increase her production but she needs to invest and this is why she has decided to ask for a loan from Integral which will permit her to buy corn at wholesale. María has a good credit record and has the ability to repay the loan and at the same time give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy corn at wholesale

loans.name: Maria Reina Guadalupe

texts.es: María Reina Guadalupe de treinta y cinco años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos, ella se dedica a la venta ambulante de tostadas, refrescos y fruta en bolsita, tiene varios años de dedicarse al comercio y se ha hecho una excelente vendedora, ya tiene mucha clientela pues ellos saben que todo lo que comercia es de primera calidad y lo vende a precios accesibles, además se caracteriza por su buen servicio y amabilidad; María es una mujer visionaria quiere trabajar muy duro para alcanzar un futuro más próspero, últimamente ha aumentado la demanda y no quiere decepcionar a los clientes, tiene la idea de invertir más en insumos pero necesita de apoyo de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar, tostadas, fruta, agua, azúcar, etc. María es una mujer responsable y con un buen record crediticio está segura de que podrá cancelar la deuda en el tiempo establecido y a la vez podrá ofrecerle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: María Reina Guadalupe is 35 and lives with her life partner and children.  She is a street vendor and sells tostadas, soft drinks, and fruit in little bags.  She has done this work for several years, and it has made her an excellent saleswoman.  She has many customers because they know that what she sells is high quality, and she sells at reasonable prices.  She is known for her good service and friendliness.  María is a visionary woman who works very hard to reach a more prosperous future.  Lately, her demand has increased, and she doesn't want to let her customers down.  She had the idea of investing in more supplies but she needs capital, so she has requested a loan from Integral that will let her buy tostadas, fruit, water, sugar, etc.  María is a responsible woman with a good credit record.  She is sure that she will be able to pay off the loan on time while offering her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy tostadas, fruit, water, and sugar.

loans.name: Rachad

texts.fr: Rachad est un homme âgé de 34ans. Il est marié à une revendeuse et a 02 enfants qui vont à l’école. L’ainé a 10ans et le dernier 03ans.  Il a démarré en 2003 par vendre les produits d’alimentation générale et des oignons. Il exerce l’activité avec 01 personne dans une boutique et sa difficulté est la concurrence sur le terrain. Il sollicite ce premier crédit de WAGES pour acheter des produits d’alimentation générale. Il veut agrandir l’activité, diversifier les marchandises et assurer les besoins vitaux de la famille.
texts.en: Rachad is 34 years old. He is married to a retailer and has two children who attend school. The oldest is 10 and the youngest is 3.  In 2003 he began his business of selling general food items and onions. He works with one other person in his store and his biggest challenge is competition. He is requesting his first loan from WAGES to purchase general food items for resale. He wants to grow the business, diversify his merchandise and ensure his family's well-being.

loans.use: to purchase general food items.

loans.name: Víctor Manuel

texts.es: Víctor Manuel tiene 44 años de edad, y habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su esposa de 55 años y sus dos hijos de 22 y 26 años. Con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación ha logrado mantener a sus hijos en la universidad los cuales ya  lograron encontrar un trabajo con lo que colaboran con sus propios gastos y algunos del hogar. Hace muchos años comenzó con un taller de mecánica automotriz, y gracias a los ingresos percibidos del negocio es como ha sacado adelante a su familia. En la actualidad continúa percibiendo los ingresos de su taller ya que no cuenta con otra fuente de ingresos y es la única forma que conoce para ganarse la vida honradamente. Sus deseos son dar un empujoncito más a sus hijos y verlos convertidos en grandes profesionales con mejores oportunidades a las que han tenido. Con vista de mejorar la situación económica de su familia y ayudar un poco más con los estudios de sus hijos, ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su negocio en la compra de repuestos y lubricantes, con el fin de dar un mejor servicio a sus clientes cuando lo soliciten. Prevé que esto le permitirá darle mayor estabilidad a su negocio y le permitirá continuar percibiendo los ingresos que tanto le ayuda para la manutención de su familia.
texts.en: Victor Manuel is 44 years old and lives with his 55 year old wife and two children, ages 22 and 26, in a home of his own.  With great effort, he has managed to support his children through university.  They have already managed to find work and pay their own expenses and some of the household expenses.  Many years ago he started an auto repair shop and thanks to the income from the business, he has managed to get his family ahead.  Currently he continues to get income from his shop as he has no other source of income and this is the only way he knows to earn an honest living.  He wants to give his children a little push and watch them become great professionals with better opportunities than the ones he had.  With the vision of improving the family’s financial situation and in order to help a little more with his children’s studies, he has decided to request this loan through INTEGRAL, so that he can invest in his business and buy spare parts and lubricants so that he can better serve his customers when they need him.  He expects that this will allow him to give increased stability to his business and continue to bring in the income that helps him support his family so much.

loans.use: to buy spare parts and lubricants.

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.es:
Evelyn tiene 28 años, es una mujer soltera y muy trabajadora. Vive sola en la trastienda de su negocio ubicado en la localidad de Chilca. 
Trabaja junto a sus padres, quienes le ayudan constantemente. “Mi padre repara los autos, cuando llegan con algún desperfecto”, afirma.  Más su principal actividad se centra en una tienda de frenos y embragues, ya tiene 7 años de experiencia en esto y cuenta que al inicio trabajaba para otras tiendas, pero con el trascurrir del tiempo y gracias a su habilidad logró adquirir el capital necesario para tener una propia. Ahora se encuentra legalmente establecida y gracias a su experiencia tiene muchos clientes quienes constantemente la visitan, sobre todo porque saben que si tienen algún desperfecto en el vehículo podrán también encontrar asesoría en las manos del padre de Evelyn. Él está orgulloso de su hija, es la única que sigue con ellos, sus demás hermanos formaron su familia y ya son independientes. Ahora ella está trabajando muy duro para obtener mayor mercadería y tener todos los repuestos que requieren sus clientes, “no es fácil, pero lo lograré”, culmina.

Este es su segundo crédito con MFP, se siente tranquila por el apoyo que recibe, además de agradecer la confianza que depositan en ella. Promete cumplir con sus cuotas de manera puntual, pues no defraudará a su grupo, el cual lo conforman personas solidarias y responsables.
Evelyn invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de fajas y discos para abastecer su tienda.
texts.en:
Evelyn is 28 years old and is single. She is a very hard-working woman. She lives alone in the back room of her shop located in the town of Chilca. She works with her parents who help her constantly. "My father repairs the cars when they arrive with some problem", she says. But her main activity is based in a shop selling brakes and clutches. She already has 7 years experience in this, and she says that in the beginning she used to work in other people's shops but as time passed and her skills improved she was able to acquire the necessary capital to open her own. Now she is legally established and thanks to her experience she has many customers who visit regularly, above all because they know that if they have some problem with their vehicle they can also get assistance from Evelyn's father. He is proud of his daughter: she is the only one who is still with them, her other siblings have formed their own families and are now independent. Now she is working very hard to obtain better merchandise and to have all the spare parts her customers require. "It's not easy, but I'll get there", she concludes. 

This is her second loan with MFP. She feels relaxed because of the support which she receives, and she is grateful for the trust they place in her. She promises to pay her quotas punctually and she will not disappoint her group which is made up of supportive and responsible people. Evelyn will invest the money she is requesting in buying belts and disks to stock her shop.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for her shop.

loans.name: Los Innovadores Group

texts.es:
La  Sra. Pilar es casada tiene 03 hijos, su esposo trabaja maniobrando un montacargas debido a su bajo sueldo ella lo apoya trabajando, el primer negocio que empezó  fue la preparación de tamales lo hace mayormente los fines de semana sábados  y domingo. Ella prepara los tamales en su casa  y  los ofrece un día  antes, después con la ayuda de su hijo mayor los reparte de casa en casa por todo su vecindario, vende alrededor de 70 tamales, por otro lado también se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza este negocio lo empezó hace 04 años generándole ganancias adicionales, gracias a su trabajo ha mejorado su vivienda que antes era muy precaria, espera terminarla de construir para más adelante poner un negocio en ella; esta vez usara su préstamo  para la compra de productos de belleza quiere abastecerse para ofrecer variedad a  sus clientas. La Sra. Pilar pertenece a la alcancía “LOS INNOVADORES”  que está integrada por 04 vecinas y amigas de la ciudad de Ventanilla Callao.

*Pilar es la 3ra viste casaca ploma.
texts.en:
Pilar is married with three children.  Her husband is an elevator operator.  She helps him by working because of his low salary.  The first business she began was making tamales, and she does it mainly on the weekend, Saturdays and Sundays.  She makes the tamales in her house and offers them for sale the day before.  Later she distributes them door-to-door throughout the neighborhood with the help of her daughter.  She sells about 70 tamales.

On the other hand, she also works selling beauty products.  She started this business four years ago, generating additional income for herself.  Thanks to her job she has improved her home, which previously was very precarious.

This time she will use her loan to buy beauty products.  She wants to supply a variety to sell to her customers.

Pilar belongs to Los Innovadores Communal Bank, made up of four neighbors and friends from the city of Ventanilla Callao.

*Pilar is the third person, wearing a gray jacket.

loans.use: to buy beauty products.

loans.name: Victoria Del Portete  (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal Victoria del Portete está formado por 9 socias y 2 socios, quienes laboran en diferentes actividades como la agricultura o el comercio, las cuales les permiten tener su independencia económica y así poder aportar a la economía de sus hogares. Son personas amables, gentiles, carismáticas y aun mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos. Viven por la parroquia Victoria del Portete en Cuenca, lugar de clima frió que cuenta con grandes llanuras propicias para la ganadería y tiene varios lugares para disfrutar de la naturaleza.

Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. Sofía, tiene 32 años de edad, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 3 hijos de 13, 9 y 4 años, su primer hijo está estudiando en el colegio y su segundo hijo en una escuelita de la ciudad. Su esposo labora como jornalero, no tienen casa propia por lo que viven arrendando.
 
Doña Sofía labora en los quehaceres de su hogar, dedicándose el mayor de su tiempo a sus hijos y a su familia, pero para aportar a la economía de su hogar se dedica  a la cría de  cuyes y gallinas que las vende en su comunidad.
 
Este es el segundo crédito que realiza en el banco comunal y lo va a invertir en la compra de pollos y en alimento para sus animales. 

Su sueño es comprarse un terreno.
texts.en:
The communal bank Victoria del Portete consists of nine women and two men. They work in different businesses, such as agriculture and commerce, which allow them to have economic independence and provide financial support for their homes. The members are friendly, courteous, and charismatic people who still maintain their people's culture and traditions. They live in the Victoria del Portete parish in Cuenca, which is a place with a cold climate that has large prairies favorable for livestock, as well as many places to enjoy the natural environment.

One of the members of the group is Sofia, who is thirty-two years old. She is married with three children, ages thirteen, nine, and four. Her first child is in school, and her second child is in a city school. Her husband works as a day-laborer. They do not have their own home, so they rent.

Sofia does chores in her home. She spends the majority of her time with her children and family, but to support her home financially she also raises guinea pigs and chickens, which she sells in her community.

This is her second loan with the communal bank, and she will invest it by purchasing chickens and feed for her animals.

Her dream is purchase some land.

loans.use: to purchase chickens and feed for her animals.

loans.name: Margarita Josefina

texts.es: Margarita Josefina de cuarenta y seis años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos; ella posee una sala de belleza pero también se dedica al comercio de ropa, cosméticos, lociones entre otros, su negocio está ubicado en el lugar de su residencia pero cuando es necesario realiza su labor a domicilio, es muy conocida en toda la zona pues su trabajo y lo que comercia es de muy buena calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es excelente siempre recibe a sus clientes con una sonrisa en el rostro; Margarita es una mujer ejemplar, con muchos ideales que está  dispuesta a cumplir, piensa que la fe en el propio éxito garantiza los resultados, quiere acrecentar el negocio pero necesita de capital para lograrlo es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar cremas, gelatina para cabello, tintes, cosméticos, ropa, etc. Margarita Josefina tiene buenas referencias de pago y tiene la confianza que podrá cancelar la deuda del financiamiento en el periodo establecido y a la vez podrá llevar a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en: Margarita Josefina is 46 years old.  She lives with her life partner and their children.  She has a beauty salon but also sells clothing, cosmetics, and lotions, among other items.  Her business is located inside her home, but when necessary, she works at her client's home.  She is well known in her area because her work and the products she sells are of very good quality.  She has reasonable prices and provides excellent service.  She always greets her clients with a smile on her face.  Margarita is an exemplary woman, with many ideas that she wants to make a reality.  She believes that belief in success guarantees the result.  She wants to grow her business but she needs capital to do so.  For this reason she has requested a loan from INTEGRAL to purchase creams, hair gel, dyes, cosmetics, clothing, etc.  Margarita Josefina has good credit references and is confident that she will be able to make her loan payments on time and at the same time provide financial security to her family.

loans.use: to purchase creams, hair gel, dyes, cosmetics, and clothing.

loans.name: Elmer Alberto

texts.es: Elmer Alberto de treinta y cuatro años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos;  Él se dedica a la venta de lentes  de forma ambulante tiene en variedad para mujeres y hombres de todos colores, es muy conocido en todas las zonas donde comercia porque es muy buen vendedor y su producto es de calidad y a precio accesible además el servicio es único, se caracteriza por su amabilidad; Elmer es un hombre emprendedor, visionario siempre está a la expectativa de aprovechar todas las oportunidades que se le presentan, piensa que el éxito al final del camino es el que le da el coraje de continuar, quiere que crezca su pequeño negocio y necesita invertir por  eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar lentes por mayor. Elmer Alberto tiene capacidad crediticia y muy buenas referencias de pago tiene la certeza que podrá pagar el financiamiento y a la vez podrá llevar a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Elmer Alberto is 34 years old and lives with his partner and their children. He makes his living as a street vendor selling sunglasses. He has sunglasses for both men and women in many colors. He is well-known in all the areas where he sells because he is a good salesman with high quality products at affordable prices. His service is unique and he is noted for his friendliness. 

Elmer is an enterprising man and a visionary. He is always ready to take advantage of all the opportunities that present themselves. He thinks that success at the end of the road is what gives him the courage to continue. He wants his small business to grow and he needs to invest in it. For this reason, he has requested a loan from INTEGRAL that will enable him to purchase sunglasses at wholesale. Elmer Alberto has the creditworthiness and good reference. We are certain that he will be able to make his repayments and simultaneously bring financial stability to his household.

loans.use: to purchase sunglasses at wholesale.

loans.name: Gaby

texts.es:
Gaby tiene 25 años, está casada con Gerardo desde hace 4 años. Tienen un hijo, Jair, al que cuidan en su casa propia ubicada en la localidad de Carampa.  
Su esposo es músico y realiza ese servicio en diferentes festividades como bautizos, matrimonios, etc. Por esa razón, Gaby siempre tiene que acompañarlo en sus múltiples viajes a diferentes ciudades cercanas. Pero sin desatender sus sembríos, pues ella se encarga de cuidar los cultivos de maíz y papa que tienen. Sus clientes, la buscan directamente en su chacra para comprar sus cosechas. “Ellos saben de la calidad de mis productos”, comenta. Ahora desea comprar más terrenos agrícolas, pues los que heredó de su padre no son suficientes. 

Ella pertenece al grupo “Carampa” y este es su primer crédito con MFP. Gracias a este apoyo pudo obtener muchos beneficios para continuar con su actividad. Por ello promete ser puntual en sus pagos. Además le agrada pertenecer a su banco comunal donde todos los colaboradores son personas responsables y solidarias. 
Gaby invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de fertilizantes naturales para su próxima cosecha de maíz.
texts.en:
Gaby is 25, and has been married to Gary for the last 4 years. They have a son, Jair, whom they care for in their own house in the town of Carampa.
Her husband is a musician who performs on many types of occasions, such as baptisms, marriages, etc. Gaby always accompanies him on his many trips to different nearby cities, but does so without neglecting their crops, as she is in charge of raising their corn and potato crops. Her customers come to the farm to buy their crops direct. "They know the quality of my produce," she says. Now she wants to buy more agricultural land, because that which she inherited from her father is not enough.

She belongs to the "Carampa" communal bank, and this is her first loan with field partner MFP. This offer of support has many benefits for Gaby, and she promises to be punctual in her repayments. She likes belonging to the communal bank, as all the members are responsible and show solidarity.
Gaby will invest this loan in the purchase of organic fertilizer for her next crop of corn.

loans.use: To buy organic fertilizers

loans.name: Simtatcho

texts.fr: Revendeuse de produits d’alimentations générale et des condiments depuis 2006 à domicile, Simtatcho est mère de 02 enfants. Un seul fréquente  et ils sont âgés de 05ans et de 02ans. Elle manque de fonds pour mieux répondre aux demandes des clients c’est pour cela elle sollicite ce troisième crédit de WAGES pour renforcer son activité. Elle veut épargner les profits et diversifier l’activité. Elle veut également assurer les besoins vitaux de la famille.
texts.en: Simtatcho has been selling general food items and condiments from her home since 2006. She is a mother of two. Only one often [sic] and they are between the ages of 5 and 2. She doesn't have sufficient funds to responds to her client's demand. This is why she is requesting her third loan from WAGES to strengthen her business. She would like to save her profits and diversify the business. She also wants to ensure the well-being of her family.

loans.use: to purchase general food items.

loans.name: Tchotchovi

texts.fr: Pour assurer l’avenir de sa famille, Tchotchovi vend des sacs de charbon de bois et du miel à domicile et dans une boutique depuis 2010. Elle est mariée à un photographe et est mère de 02 enfants. Le premier a 05ans et le dernier 02ans. Un seul fréquente. Elle est âgée de 24ans. Pour bien répondre à la demande de la population elle sollicite de WAGES un premier crédit pour acheter des charbons de bois et du miel. Elle veut faire prospérer son activité.
texts.en: To ensure her family's future, Tchotchovi has been selling bags of charcoal and honey from her home and from a shop since 2010.
