She is married to a photographer and the mother of two children. The oldest is 5 and the youngest is 2. She is 24 years old and works exclusively at home or on her business. To respond better to the demands of her customers, she is requesting her first loan from WAGES to purchase charcoal and honey. She wants her business to thrive.

loans.use: to purchase charcoal and honey for resale.

loans.name: Duo Esmeralda Group

texts.es: Duo Esmeralda, este duo esta integrado por la señora Blanca es casada y tiene 61 años de edad tiene dos hijos mayores de edad,ella viajo desde que tenia 20 años de edad a la ciudad capital de Guatemala para comprar un terreno y contruir su casa luego su esposo encontro trabajo de albañil en una construccion y ella le ayudava con los gastos de su casa,ella elavora costuras y los vende de forma ambulante ella hace costuras de gabachas,delantales,edredones,etc. ella esta solicitando este credito para la compra de telas para seguir elavorando sus costuras y seguir con su negocio.
texts.en:
Blanca is a member of Dúo Esmeralda.  She is 61 years old and married, and has two adult children.  When she was 20 she traveled to the capital of Guatemala to buy a plot of land and build her house.  Later her husband found work in construction as a bricklayer, and she helped him with the household expenses.  She makes smocks, aprons, and quilts, and sells them as a street vendor.  

She is requesting this loan to buy fabric to continue making her smocks, aprons, and quilts, and to continue with her business.

loans.use: to make and sell smocks, aprons, and quilts.

loans.name: El Sol De Cupiche Group

texts.es: Angélica de 34 años es casada y tiene 02 hijos menores de edad, ella pertenece a la Alcancía Comunal “El Sol De Cupiche” la cual está conformada por 08 socios, la gran mayoría vecinos de la zona. Angélica  se dedica al alquiler de mototaxis y auto. Este negocio  comenzó a raíz de que su esposo viaja al extranjero pues es él quien le apoyo  en la compra de sus motos, actualmente cuenta con 04 mototaxis y 01 auto.  Gracias a este negocio de alquiler  a podido brindarle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia. En esta oportunidad solicito el crédito  para el mantenimiento de sus mototaxis. El deseo de Angélica es de comprarse otro auto.  Angélica esta agradecida con el crédito brindado.
texts.en:
Angélica, 34, is married and has two minor children.  She belongs to El Sol de Cupiche Communal Bank, made up of eight members, the vast majority of them neighbors of the area.  Angélica rents motorcycle taxis and a car.

This business started because her husband travels abroad and he helped her buy her motorcycles.  Currently she has four motorcycle taxis and one car.  Thanks to this business she has been able to give her family a better quality of life.

She requested this loan to maintain her motorcycle taxis.

Her desire is to buy herself another car.  Angélica is grateful for the loan granted.

loans.use: to maintain her motorcycle taxis.

loans.name: Flor Idalia

texts.es: Flor Idalia de treinta y uno años de edad vive junto a su compañero de  vida y sus hijos; ella posee una sala de belleza donde realiza cortes, peinados, tintes en el cabello entre otros, tiene varios años con el negocio y ya tiene experiencia en el rubro, se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues las personas siempre quedan satisfechas con la labor que realiza además de los buenos precios y el excelente servicio siempre está a la orden de los clientes; Flor es un mujer emprendedora dispuesta a superarse, piensa que la claridad en los objetivos es el punto de partida para poder avanzar, tiene muy claro lo que desea y es acrecentar el negocio pero necesita de capital porque estos últimos meses no ha tenido las ganancias esperadas, por eso se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar tintes, tijeras, cremas, cosméticos etc. Flor Idalia ha demostrado tener capacidad crediticia y tiene muy buenas referencias que es de buena paga, por eso asegura que podrá pagar la deuda y la vez intentara darle a su familia un vida plena.
texts.en: Flor Idalia is 31 years old.  She lives with her life companion and their children.  She has a beauty salon where she does haircuts, styling, hair color, etc. She has had her business for a number of years and has experience in this field. She has many clients because people are always satisfied with her work.   She also has good prices and excellent service.  She is always there for her clients.  Flor is an entrepreneurial woman interested in self-improvement.  She thinks that clear objectives are the starting point for being able to make progress.  She is very clear on what she wants, which is to grow her business.  However, she needs capital to do so because in recent months her earnings have been lower than expected.  For this reason she decided to request a loan from INTEGRAL to purchase dyes, scissors, creams, cosmetics, etc.  Flor Idalia has experience with loans and has very good references that she makes her payments. She is sure she will be able to make her payments and at the same time she will try to provide her family with a full life.

loans.use: to purchase dyes, scissors, creams, cosmetics, and shampoo.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
María es una mujer de 34 años, muy trabajadora y entusiasta, viven en la ciudad de Ica, distrito de Parcona, por circunstancias de la vida, María se separó de su esposo, tiene 2 pequeños hijos a quienes se dedica por completo para sacarlos adelante; en sus ratos libres le gusta viajar con sus pequeños hijos y en algunas ocasiones le gusta preparar su plato preferido los riquísimos "Tallarines Rojos"; con mucho empeño terminó sus estudios secundarios, lamentablemente por falta de recursos no pudo cursar una carrera universitaria, pero le hubiera gustado poder estudiar la carrera de Psicología. 
Gracias a su espíritu emprendedor y ganas de salir de adelante, por iniciativa propia puso en marcha una pequeña tienda de abarrotes, a la cual le dedica un aproximado de 10 horas diarias y puede atender a un promedio de 25 clientes, ella cree que su negocio marcha bien debido a su buena atención, carisma y clientela fija con la que cuenta.
María se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de abarrotes, tales como arroz, azúcar, aceite, etc. Para abastecer su tienda; de esta manera podrá incrementar sus ingresos y con ello espera poder contar con una tienda mas surtida e incrementar sus ingresos y con ello poder asegurar el bienestar de sus pequeños hijos.
texts.en:
María, age 34, is a very hard-working and enthusiastic woman.  She lives in the city of Ica in the Parcona district.  Due to life circumstances, María separated from her husband.  She has two young children, and she devotes herself completely to them in order to get them ahead.

In her free time she likes to travel with her little ones.  On some occasions she like to prepare her favorite dish, the delicious “Tallerines Rojos” ("red spaghetti," with a Peruvian-style red sauce).  It was with great determination that she finished high school.   Sadly, she was not able to attend the university because of the lack of resources.  However, she would have liked to have been able to study for a career in Psychology. 

Thanks to her enterprising spirit and her desire to get ahead, she started, on her own initiative, a small grocery store.  She devotes approximately ten hours a day to the store.  She is able to tend to an average of 25 customers during that time.  She believes that her business is going well because of her good service, her charisma, and the fixed clientele that she has.

María is very grateful to the Kiva lenders.  Thanks to the help they have given her, she will be able to buy groceries like rice, sugar, and cooking oil, etc. to stock her store.  This way she will be able to increase her income.  With that income she hopes to be able to stock her store more and increase her income.  Then she will be able to assure the well-being of her little ones.

loans.use: to buy groceries like rice, sugar, and cooking oil, etc.

loans.name: Lesly

texts.es:
Lesly tiene 23 años, tiene una pequeña que acaba de nacer. Vive junto a su madre en una casa alquilada ubicada en la localidad de El Tambo.
Desde muy joven trabajó para mantener a su madre y familia en buenas condiciones. El corte de cabello es su especialidad, con este ofició logró adquirir todo lo que ahora posee, hasta la fecha trabaja en un centro de belleza (los domingos), donde le pagan un porcentaje por cada corte que realiza. Sin embargo, su principal soporte económico es una tienda de dulces y helados, y un pequeño locutorio donde pasa el mayor tiempo. Ahí ofrece el servicio de llamadas a todas las zonas del país, como también al extranjero. Le va muy bien con su trabajo, ya que se ubica en una zona comercial, donde las personas transitan a menudo. Ahora se encuentra ideando más formas de ganar dinero, por ello comenzó vendiendo comida, ya tiene 6 clientes y espera tener muchos más para poder darle un buen futuro a su pequeña hija. 

Este es su primer crédito con MFP, se siente tranquila por el apoyo que recibe, además de agradecer la confianza que depositan en ella. Promete cumplir con sus cuotas de manera puntual, pues no defraudará a su grupo, conformado por personas solidarias y responsables.
Lesly invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de mesas para su tienda, además de capital para el locutorio que posee.
texts.en:
Lesly is 23 years old and she has a newborn baby daughter. She lives with her mother in a rented house in the town of El Tambo. From a very young age she has worked to keep her mother and her family in good conditions. Her speciality is hairdressing and with this trade she has acquired everything she now possesses. She works in a beauty salon on Sundays where they pay her a percentage for each haircut she carries out. However, her main source of income is a shop selling sweets and ice creams, and a small call shop where she spends the most time. Here she offers a calling service to all the regions of the country, as well as overseas. Her work is going very well as her shop is located in a commercial area where many people pass by. Now she is coming up with more ways to make money and this is why she began to sell food. She now has 6 customers and she hopes to have many more so that she can give her little daughter a good future.  

This is her first loan with MFP. She feels relaxed due to the support she receives, and she is grateful for the trust they place in her. She promises to pay her quotas punctually so that she doesn't disappoint her group which is made up of supportive and responsible people. Lesly will invest the money she is requesting in buying tables for her shop, as well as using it as capital for her call shop.

loans.use: to buy tables and to invest in her other business.

loans.name: Maria Del Rosario

texts.es: La Sra. María tiene 34 años y es soltera se dedica al servicio de fotocopias y sellos que se encuentran en una calle muy concurrida de la zona Sud de la ciudad de la Paz,  este préstamo es su segunda  secuencia dentro de la institución la Sra. María utilizara este préstamo para compra de material para fotocopias como papel y tinta para sellos, su razón para solicitar este préstamo es incremento de capital. María enfrenta retos en su negocio que son compra de nuevas maquinas y va a utilizar los beneficios estocando material,  sueña para  su negocio es modernizar su maquinaria.
texts.en: Señora María is 34 and single.  She makes a living through a photocopying service and stamp service, which is located on a very frequented street in the southern zone of the city of La Paz.  This is her second loan through the insitution, and she will use it to buy photocoping materials like paper and ink for stamps.  Her reason for requesting this loan is to increase her capital.  María faces challenges in her business, one of which is buying new machines.  She is going to use the benefits to stock up on materials.  Her dream for her business is to modernize her machines.

loans.use: to buy photocopying materials and stamps.

loans.name: Celestino

texts.es: Celestino de cuarenta y siete años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y su hijo; él se dedica al cultivo de maíz, tiene varios años de trabajar en la agricultura y eso le ha regalado experiencia muy valiosa para obtener las mejores cosechas, el terreno de cultivo está ubicado en una zona con mucha incidencia agrícola y el reside cerca del lugar, es muy conocido porque comercia producto en todos los alrededores, ya tiene mucha clientela pues las personas lo prefieren porque todo lo que vende es de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es excelente; Celestino es un hombre dedicado al trabajo, muy entusiasta y visionario, quiere ganarse un futuro más próspero por eso se esfuerza en su labor día con día, en la última cosecha debido al clima tropical tubo algunas perdidas y perdió ganancia, por eso en este periodo de cosecha quiere recuperarse e invertir en insumos pero necesita de un apoyo de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, fertilizante, insecticida, herbicida etc. Celestino tiene buenas referencias de pago y tiene la certeza que cumplirá con el pago de la deuda, y a la vez podrá ofrecerle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Celestino is 46 years old.  He lives with his life partner and their son.  He grows corn.  He has many years of experience working in agriculture and this has provided him with valuable experience for obtaining the best crops.  His fields are located in a very agricultural area, and he lives near them.  He is very well known because he sells his products in all of the surrounding areas.  He already has many customers.  People prefer him because everything he sells it top quality and at low prices, plus he provides excellent service.  

Celestino is dedicated to his work.  He is very enthusiastic and a visionary.  He wants to have a more prosperous future so he works hard day after day. In the last harvest he lost some crops due to the tropical climate and he lost earnings. Therefore with the current crop he wants to recover and invest in supplies, but he needs capital to do so.  For this reason he is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL to purchase corn seeds, fertilizer, insecticide, and herbicide.    Celestino has good payment references and is certain that he will pay his debt and at the same time be able to offer his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase corn seeds, fertilizer, insecticide, and herbicide.

loans.name: Lizet Fabiana

texts.es: La Sra. Lizet  es soltera vive en la zona del Abasto en una casa en anticrético la cual el anticrético es de su madre. Trabaja vendiendo ropa durante el día  y estudia por las noches,  vende ropa ambulando por los mercados y fines de semana viaja a los diferentes lugares aledaños a la ciudad de Santa Cruz donde se realizan ferias para poder vender sus productos de manera ambulante,  también aprovecha los días feriados cuando no tiene clases,  Lizet tiene 21 años sus ventas que realiza son de ropa nueva,  es una persona que como pilar fundamental lo tiene el estudio y el trabajo, se sacrifica mucho ya que con esta actividad  de la venta de ropa corre con sus gastos de estudio y de manutención, con el dinero del crédito comprara mercadería al por mayor de ropa de temporada de invierno, ya que con el anterior credito le fue muy bien genero mas  ingresos para incrementar su capital de trabajo,   vende desde muy tempranas horas de la mañana, es responsable y tiene ganas de superación día a día, su deseo es el de terminar sus estudios y de ejercer su profesión, de esta manera de poder mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Lizet is single and lives in the Abasto region (of Bolivia) in a house that she leases from her mother. She works selling clothing during the day and studies at night. She sells clothing in open-air markets and on weekends she travels to locations around the city of Santa Cruz where fairs take place. In order to be able to sell her products this way, Lizet also takes advantage of national holidays when she doesn't have classes. 

Lizet is twenty-one years old. She sells new clothes. Her mainstays are her studies and her work. She sacrifices a great deal so that, through this clothing sales business, she can cover her study and living expenses. With the money from the loan she will buy seasonal winter clothing wholesale, since her earlier loan was very successful and she generated more income and increased her work capital. 

She begins selling very early in the morning. She is responsible and wants, day by day, to overcome the obstacles she faces. Her desire is to finish her studies and to practice her profession. In this way she will be able to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy seasonal winter clothing

loans.name: Delia

texts.es: La Sra. Delia tiene 39 años y es Soltera con 3 hijos que son 4, 7 y 9 años, ella se dedica a la venta de comida en su puesto de venta que se encuentra ubicado en la zona de Cupesi , Este préstamo es el 1 que ha tomado de Emprender, la Sra. Delia va a usar este préstamo  para capital de inversión para su negocio ya que quiere comprar insumos como arroz y papa para la elaboración de sus comidas y también  ampliación de pensión. La Sra. Delia  enfrenta retos en su negocio que son el espacio pequeño de la pensión y la competencia. va a utilizar los beneficios ampliación de la pensión, sueña para  su negocio es tener una pensión grande para darles un futuro a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Delia is 39 years old, single, and has three children who are 4, 7, and 9 years old.  She works selling food at her stall which is located in the Cupesi area.  

This is the first loan she has taken with Emprender.  Delia is going to use this loan to invest in her business since she needs to purchase ingredients such as rice and potatoes to make her dishes and expand her premises.  

Delia faces challenges in her business such as the small size of her premises and competition from other businesses.  She is going to use the profits to expand the premises.  Her dream is to have a large premises to give her children a good future.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients such as rice and potatoes.

loans.name: Soledad

texts.es: La Sra. Soledad tiene 30 años y es Soltera con 1 hijo de la edad de 7 años, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa en su puesto de venta que se encuentran en la zona  30 de octubre del plan 3000. Este préstamo es el 1 que ha tomado de Emprender la Sra. Soledad va a usar este préstamo para capital de trabajo comprara ropa por mayor para esta temporada de invierno para  surtir su negocio, Soledad enfrenta retos en su negocio que son la competencia y que no tiene un lugar estable para su venta ya que ella quisiera tener su propia tienda donde pueda exponer sus productos y va a utilizar los beneficios en comprar más cantidad de ropa para tener mayor venta,  sueña para su negocio es tener una tienda de ropa fijo en su propia casa.
texts.en:
Soledad is 30 years old, single, and has one son who is seven years old.  She works selling clothing in the 30th of October area of the Plan 3000 neighborhood.  

This is her first loan with Emprender.  Soledad will use this loan for working capital.  She plans to purchase clothing at wholesale prices for the winter season so that she can stock her business.  

Soledad faces challenges with her business, including competition with other businesses, and not having a stable location for her sales.  She would like to have her own store where she can offer her products, so she will use her profits to purchase a larger quantity of clothing to make more sales.  Her dream is for her business to have a clothing store built in her home.

loans.use: to purchase winter clothing.

loans.name: Gulmira

texts.ru:
Гулмире 51 год. Гулмира в качестве основного источника дохода для своей семьи, с 1997 года занимается животноводством и полеводством, начав этот бизнес с суммы 14,000 сом (KGS). На сегодня хозяйство Гулмиры приносит около 16,000 сом (KGS) в месяц с продажи мясных продуктов. 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Гулмира обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку скота – молодняка на откорм и перепродажу.  Доходы от кредита Гулмира планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение бизнеса.
texts.en:
Gulmira is 51 years old. As the main source of income for her family, Gulmira has been engaged in livestock breeding and field crop cultivation since 1997, after having started this business with an amount of 14,000 som (KGS). Currently Gulmira's farm brings in around 16,000 som (KGS) per month from the sale of meat products. 

With an aim to further develop her business, Gulmira turned to the organization "Bai Tushum & Partners" for a loan in the amount of 50,000 som (KGS), for the purchase of livestock; young for fattening and reselling. Gulmira plans to invest the income from the loan in further growing her business.

loans.use: to purchase of young livestock

loans.name: Oygul

texts.ru: Ойгул проживает в районе Шахритус. Ей 39 лет. Она замужем. У нее четверо детей. Она занимается скотоводством. Кредит берет для закупа телят с целью увеличения поголовья крупнорогатого скота.
texts.en:
Oygul lives in the Shahrituz region. He is 39 years old. He is married, and has four children. He works with cattle breeding.

Oygul takes a loan for the purchase of calves, with an aim to increase the number of cattle.

loans.use: to purchase calves

loans.name: Silvia

texts.es:
Silvia tiene 32 años, está casada con César y tienen cuatro hijos, a los que cuidan con amor y dedicación en su casa propia ubicada en la localidad de Carampa. 
Ella se dedica a muchas actividades. Por la mañana cuida sus siembras de maíz, papa y fréjol que tiene en terrenos propios y en otros arrendados. Sus cosechas las comercializa a la ciudad, donde tiene clientes que siempre compran sus productos, ya que son conocedores de la buena calidad que tienen. Ya por la tarde se encarga de sus animales (caballos, cuyes, ovejas y cerdos), los cuales engorda para luego vender a los carniceros. “Cuando necesito dinero, me ayuda a cubrir ciertas necesidades”, comenta. Por la noche, cuando el sol baja, comienza a desarrollar su creatividad, ya que confecciona mandiles de diversos colores y tamaños. “Tengo pedidos, mis clientes me pagan por adelantado y yo desarrollo la prenda”, comenta. Y por último, hace poco, comenzó con la compra y venta de maíz, papa y otras hortalizas en las ferias de la ciudad.

Ella pertenece al grupo “Carampa” y este es su cuarto crédito con MFP. Gracias a ese apoyo pudo obtener muchos beneficios para continuar con su actividad. Por ello, promete ser puntual en sus pagos. Además, le agrada pertenecer a su banco comunal donde todos los colaboradores son personas responsables y solidarias.  
Silvia invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de maíz en gran cantidad para abastecer su negocio.
texts.en:
Silvia is 32 years old and married to César.  They have four children, who they care for with love and dedication in their own home located in the town of Carampa.  

She works doing many different things.  In the morning, she tends her corn, potato, and bean crops that she has on her own land and on others nearby.  She sells her harvests in the city, where she has customers who always buy her products since they know she always provides good quality.  In the afternoon, she cares for her animals (horses, guinea pigs, sheep, and pigs), which she fattens to sell to butchers.  "When I need money, they help me to cover certain necessities", she says.  At night, when the sun sets, she starts to engage her creativity, and she makes aprons of many colors and sizes.  "I take orders, my customers pay me in advance, and I make the item", she says.  And lastly, not too long ago, she started buying and selling corn, potatoes, and other vegetables at the markets in the city.

Silvia is a member of the Carampa group, and this is her fourth loan with MFP.  Thanks to this support, she has earned good profits so that she can continue with her work.  Because of this, she promises to be on time with her payments.  Also, she is thankful to belong to her community bank where all of the members are responsible and supportive people.

Silvia will invest her loan in the purchase of corn in large quantities to stock her business.

loans.use: to purchase corn to sell.

loans.name: Homidjon

texts.ru: Хомидчон в 1975 году родился в семье образованных и воспитанных людей. После окончания школы начал заниматься выращиванием сельхозпродукции. Имеет площадь земли и в основном выращивает картошки, пшеницы и другие сельхозкультуры, также бахчевых культур. Хомидчон является хорошим семьянином, заботливый муж и на воспитании имеет пятерых детей. На иждивении имеются сестры и братья. В бизнесе помогает сын. Хомидчон хотел бы получить займ для покупки минеральных удобрений, семян, а также оплаты рабочей силы. Хомидчон надеется на вашу помощь и милосердие.
texts.en:
Homidjon was born in 1975 in a well educated and trained family. After finishing school, he started working with cultivation of agricultural products. He owns a piece of land and especially grows potatoes, wheat and other crops, and also melons. 

Homidjon is a good family man, a mindful father and he is raising five children. His sisters and brothers are his dependents. His son helps him with his business. Homidjon would like to receive a loan for the purchase of mineral fertilizers, seeds and also payment for labor. He hopes for you help and kindness.

loans.use: To purchase mineral fertilizers, seeds and to pay for labor

loans.name: María

texts.es:
María tiene 59 años, es una valerosa madre soltera que tiene dos hijos, Juan y Raquel. Viven en una casa alquilada en el distrito de Chilca.  
Gracias a su constancia, ella pudo sacar adelante a sus hijos, pues realiza varias actividades. De lunes a viernes vende ropa a los pobladores de su zona, va de casa en casa, pues no cuenta con una tienda o lugar específico donde la puedan encontrar. Su secreto es estar en las ferias de la ciudad donde hay mucha gente. Pero más adelante espera alquilar un espacio en la zona céntrica de la ciudad. A su vez, los fines de semana, vende mazamorra (postre) en la feria grande que se realiza en la ciudad, donde obtiene un dinero extra. Como sabe que todo esfuerzo es recompensado, continúa trabajando sin descanso, pues desea ver a sus hijos realizados y con aspiraciones. Ahora tiene muchos pedidos de ropa para mujer, pues en esta festividad (día de la madre) espera obtener mucha ganancia.

Este es su crédito número 27 con MFP, donde espera continuar con sus objetivos. Por otro lado, promete una vez más, cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además, le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y solidarias.
María invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de ropa que tiene por entregar a sus clientes, quienes ya le hicieron pedido.
texts.en:
María is fifty-nine years old. She is a courageous single mother with two children, Juan and Raquel. They live in a rented house in the Chilca district. Thanks to her constancy, she was able to get her children ahead, which is why she has several businesses. From Monday to Friday she sells clothing to the inhabitants of her region. She goes house to house since she doesn't have a shop or a specific place where clients can find her. 

Her secret is to go to the city fairs where there are a great many people. In the future, however, she hopes to rent a space in the city center. In turn, on the weekends she sells mazamorra (maize pudding) in the big market that takes place in the city in order to earn a little extra money. As she knows that all effort is compensated, she continues working without rest, since she desires to see her children settled and with aspirations. At present, she has many requests for women's clothing, so she hopes to make significant profits during the Mother's Day holiday.

This is her twenty-seventh loan with MFP, where she hopes to continue with her objectives. For her part, she promises once again to comply with the payment of her debts. Moreover, she is grateful to be part of her communal bank because all of its members are responsible and supportive people. María will use the money she requested to purchase clothing for her clients, who have already made requests.

loans.use: to increase her merchandise

loans.name: Elena Petrona

texts.es: La Sra. Elena vive en la zona de la Villa Primero de mayo junto con su esposo en la casa de su madre. Ella se dedica a la venta de ropa y de cosméticos la cual vende al contado y a crédito su esposo es consultor independiente. El crédito que esta solicitando es para aumentar su capital de trabajo con la compra de mercadería ropa de temporada de invierno  ya que tiene muchos pedidos porque ha aumentado sus clientes tanto de ropa como de cosméticos, con el anterior credito le fue muy bien ahora tambien desea vender otros productos pero por ahora le esta yendo muy bien. La Sra. Elena se fijo como meta tener su propia casa y por eso con los créditos que le esta otorgando Emprender y Kiva ella esta saliendo adelante.
texts.en:
Elena lives in the town of Primero de Mayo with her husband.  They live in her mother's house.  She works selling clothing and cosmetics.  She offers her customers the option of paying in cash or on credit.  Her husband is an independent consultant.  

She is requesting this loan to increase her working capital with the purchase of winter clothing.  She has many orders for clothing and cosmetics because she has increased her customer base.  Her last loan was very successful and now she wants to sell other products, but for now she is doing very well.  

Elena's dream is to own her own house, and the loans she is receiving from Emprender and Kiva are helping her reach this goal.

loans.use: to purchase winter clothing and other products.

loans.name: Fatima

texts.ru:
Фатиме 60 лет, вдова, проживает вместе с семьей младшего сына и помогает воспитывать 3 внуков - 5,3 и 2 лет.  Фатима в качестве основного источника дохода для своей семьи, с 1996 года занимается животноводством и полеводством, начав этот бизнес с суммы 15,000 сом (KGS). На сегодня в хозяйстве Фатимы насчитывается 20 голов мелкого рогатого скота, 1 корова, 1 кобыла, а также 3,0 га земли, где выращивается картофель. Ежемесячная прибыль от хозяйства -  около 15,000 сом (KGS) в месяц. 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Фатима обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 40,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку минеральных удобрений.  Доходы от кредита Фатима планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение бизнеса.
texts.en:
Fatima is 60 years old. She is a widow living together with the family of her youngest son. She helps raising her three grandchildren, five, three and two years of age. As the main source of income for her family, since 1996  Fatima has been raising livestock and growing produce, having launched this business with 15,000 KGS. At present Fatima’s household includes 20 heads of goats and sheep, one cow, and one horse, as well as 3 ha [about 7.4 acres] of land where she grows potatoes. Her monthly income from her farm is about 15,000 KGS.

In order to grow her business, Fatima turned to “Bai Tushum & Partners” for a loan in the amount of 40,000 KGS to buy mineral fertilizers. Fatima plans to use the derived revenues for expanding her business further.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers.

loans.name: Gabriela Edith

texts.es:
Gabriela es una joven madre de 20 años de edad, vive al lado de su esposo el cual trabaja en la orquesta de su padre como músico, Gabriela es muy entusiasta y sobre todo porque tiene una razón muy importante para salir adelante el cual es su hijo de apenas 8 meses de edad, ella se esfuerza mucho ya que quiere lo mejor para él y sobre todo porque quiere que sea mejor que ella. Su vivienda se ubica en la ciudad de imperial, ciudad que se caracteriza por tener un clima cálido y acogedor, asimismo en esta ciudad se desarrolla la agricultura, en especial el cultivo de algodón, maíz, entre otros.  Con mucho optimismo y sobre todo esfuerzo Gabriela trabaja en su negocio de venta de jugo de naranja, ella trabaja en un pequeño carrito y camina por todas las calles de su ciudad para ofrecer sus jugos de naranja, ella lleva trabajando desde hace 2 años en su negocio y ella cree que le va bien porque es muy amable con los clientes y sobre todo porque es muy carismática.

Gabriela está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado, ella podrá comprar otra máquina para exprimir naranjas, ya que la que tiene actualmente esta gastada y ya no exprime bien las naranjas,  de esta manera ella podrá tener una herramienta para su trabajo en buenas condiciones y sobre todo para mejor atención de los clientes, lo que le permitirá seguir luchando para hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Darle una buena educación y calidad de vida a su hijo y crecer en su negocio”.
texts.en:
Gabriela is a young mother of 20. She lives with her husband, who works in his father's band as a musician. Gabriela is very enthusiastic, especially because she has a very important reason for succeeding, which is her son, who is barely 8 months old.  She works hard, as she wants the best for him, especially because she wants him to be better off than she is.

Her house is located in Imperial, a city noted for having a warm and inviting climate. In addition, agriculture is carried out in this city, especially the growing of cotton, corn, and other products. 

With a great deal of optimism and above all, effort, Gabriela works in her business selling orange juice. She works at a small cart and walks through all the streets in her city to sell her orange juice. She has been working in her business for two years, and she believes that it is going well because she is very friendly with the customers, and especially because she has a very charismatic personality.

Gabriela is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, as thanks to the help they have offered her, she will be able to buy another juicer for making orange juice. The one she currently has is worn out, and doesn't extract the orange juice well. This way she will be able to have a work tool in good condition, in order to serve her customers better. This will allow her to keep striving to make her greatest dream a reality: "To provide her son with a good education and quality of life, and to see her business grow".

loans.use: To buy a juicer.

loans.name: Las Orquídeas De Oquendo Group

texts.es:
La Sra. Danila junto a 3 amigas han formado la alcancía comunal “LAS ORQUIDEAS DE OQUENDO” todas ellas son vecinas del mismo lugar, Danila es dueña de la ferretería Marys,  en su negocio vende toda clase de artículos de construcción ya son 13 años que tiene el negocio y gracias a él ha podido terminar  el primer piso de su casa y está empezando el segundo, su trabajo también le permite el sustento de su familia sobretodo los estudios de sus hijos, ahora está ahorrando para comprarse un camión que será de mucha utilidad para los repartos de sus productos, con su préstamo seguirá abasteciéndose de algunos materiales para su ferretería para de esa manera tenerlo bien surtido.
*La Sra. Danila es la 4ta de la derecha viste chompa crema.
texts.en:
Danila and three of her friends have formed the community bank "Las Orquideas de Oquendo".  They are all neighbors in the same place.

Danila is the owner of Marys hardware store.  She sells all types of construction materials.  She has had this business for 13 years and it has allowed her to finish the first floor of her house.  She is starting work on the second floor.  Her work also allows her to support her family, especially her children's education.  Currently she is saving to purchase a truck, which would be very useful for delivering her products.  With this loan, she will purchase items for her hardware store so that she will have it well stocked.

*Danila is the 4th on the right, wearing a cream colored sweater.

loans.use: to purchase materials for her hardware store.

loans.name: Kelsin

texts.ru:
Келсин 49 лет, замужем, заботится о своей семье и больной матери. Келсин в качестве основного источника дохода для своей семьи, с 2002 года занимается полеводством, начав этот бизнес с суммы 45,000 сом (KGS). На сегодня в хозяйстве Келсин имеется 1,80 га земли, где она выращивает фасоль и свеклу. 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Келсин обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 45,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку минеральных удобрений и семян.  Доходы от кредита Келсин планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение бизнеса.
texts.en:
Kelsin is 49 years old, married, and she takes care of her family and her ill mother. As a main income for her family, Kelsin has been engaged in field crop cultivation cine 2002, after having started this business with a sum of 45,000 som (KGS). Currently Kelsin's farm has 1.80 hectares of land, where she grows beans and beetroot. 

With an aim to further develop her business, Kelsin turned to the organization "Bai Tushum & Partners" for a loan in the amount of 45,000 som (KGS) for the purchase of mineral fertilizers and seeds. Kelsin plans to invest the income from the loan in further expanding her business.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and seeds

loans.name: Lourdes

texts.es:
Lourdes tiene 31 años, tiene dos hijos: Denis y Silvia, a los que cuida en su casa propia ubicada en la localidad de El Tambo. 
Ella realiza dos actividades que le gustan mucho. La primera la aprendió de muy pequeña, su mamá y hermanos bordaban las faldas típicas y ella aprendía cada vez que los observaba. En la actualidad las cosas no cambiaron mucho, ya que continúan trabajando juntas. Las faldas que preparan son pedidos de los clientes que obtuvieron en todo este tiempo de esfuerzo, obtiene buenas ganancias y le apasiona mucho su trabajo. La segunda actividad que realiza es la compra y venta de ganado (cerdos, vacas, toros y ovejas), los cuales engorda, si es que se encuentra flacos, para luego venderlos en las ferias ganaderas de los diversos distritos de la ciudad. Ahora está juntando muchos animales porque se aproxima una festividad importante donde espera obtener muchas ganancias.

Este es su tercer crédito con MFP, se siente tranquila por el apoyo que recibe, además de agradecer la confianza que depositan en ella. Promete cumplir con sus cuotas de manera puntual, pues no defraudará a su grupo, conformado por personas solidarias y responsables.
Lourdes invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de varias cabezas de ganado para abastecer su negocio.
texts.en:
Lourdes, 31, has two children, Denis and Silvia, whom she cares for in her own home, located in the town of El Tambo.

She has two businesses that she enjoys very much.  She learned the first one when she was very small.  Her mother and siblings used to embroider traditional skirts, and she learned from observing them.  Now things have not changed too much, because they continue to work together.  They make the skirts based on orders from customers that they have gained over all of this time working.  She gets good earnings from this activity, and is very passionate about the work.  Her second economic activity is buying and selling livestock (pigs, cows, bulls and sheep).  She fattens the animals that arrive underdeveloped, and later sells them in the livestock markets in the various parts of the city.  Now she is gathering together a big quantity of animals, because an important festival is approaching when she hopes to make a lot of profit.

This is her third loan with MFP, and she feels tranquil because of the support that she is receiving.  Also, she thanks those who are placing their trust in her.  She promises to make her payments in a punctual manner, because she doesn't want to disappoint her communal bank, which is made up of supportive and responsible people.

Lourdes will invest the money she requests in the purchase of a number of heads of cattle for her livestock business.

loans.use: to buy more animals

loans.name: Guzal

texts.ru: Гузал 1991 года рождения, не замужем, живет с родителями. Она начала сотрудничать  с нашей организацией в этом году. Гузал  занимается откормом скота около 5 лет.  Её отец шофер и только этим зарабатывает денги.Этих денег не хватает им на проживание. Её мать, домохозяйка. Не смотря на свою молодость, Гузал очень старательная девушка поэтому она старается сама развивать свой бизнес и копит на жизнь и тем самым помогает родителям. На полученный кредит хочет увеличить поголвье скота чтобы в будущем продать за хорошую цену.Она благодарна таким организациям за финансовую поддержку.
texts.en:
Guzal was born in 1991, is not married, and lives with her parents. She started working with our organization this year. Guzal has been engaged in fattening of livestock for around five years. 

Guzal's father is a driver, and only earns money from this. The money is not enough for them to live on. Her mother is a housewife. Despite her young age, Guzal is a very diligent girl, and therefore she tries to develop her business by herself, both to save up for life and to help her parents. 

For the loan received, Guzal wants to increase the number of livestock, which she can sell for a good price in the future. She thanks the organization for the financial support.

loans.use: purchase of livestock for fattening and reselling

loans.name: Anvar

texts.ru:
Анвар 49 лет, одинока, имеет дочь. Анвар в качестве основного источника дохода для своей семьи, с 2007 года занимается полеводством и животноводством, начав этот бизнес с суммы 15,000 сом (KGS). На сегодня в хозяйстве Анвар имеется 1 корова, 15 овец и 1,20 га земли, где она выращивает фасоль и перец. 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Анвар обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 130,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку 2 коров и минеральных удобрений.  Доходы от кредита Анвар планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение бизнеса.
texts.en:
Anvar is 49 years old, single, and has one daughter. As a main source of income for his family, Anvar has been engaged in field crop cultivation and livestock breeding since 2007, after having started this business with an amount of 15,000 som (KGS). Currently, Anvar's farm has one cow, 15 sheep and 1.20 hectares of land, where he grows beans and peppers. 

With an aim to further develop his business, Anvar turned to the organization "Bai Tushum & Partners" for a loan in the amount of 130,000 som (KGS) for the purchase of two cows and mineral fertilizer. Anvar plans to invest the income from the loan in further expanding his business.

loans.use: to purchase two cows and mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Maribel Del Rocio

texts.es: Maribel vive en el sector norte de Guayaquil en la zona conocida como Orquídeas. Tiene 45 años está casada con Leonardo quien trabaja en la compañía de aviación Tame con el cargo de servicios a bordo.  Su esposo es quien mantiene el hogar pero una ayuda nunca está de más. Maribel nos cuenta que le gusta trabajar sobre todo en las ventas. Su negocio en ventas lo realiza con los productos de diferentes empresas, avon, yanbal, lebel, cyzone, esika, las cuales están destinadas a la estética de la mujer en cosméticos, bisutería, perfumes, etc. esta forma de trabajo de manera independiente le permite cuidar de sus hijos y manejar su propio horario. Maribel tiene 3 hijos estudiantes que asisten al colegio particular. Con el préstamo desea tener un ingreso más ya que incrementaría su capital para poder seguir en la venta de cosméticos y bisutería. Su sueño es incrementar más sus ventas para hacer su negocio más rentable de esta manera viendo su negocio superado, supera su vida y alcanza sus metas.
texts.en:
Maribel lives in the northern part of the city of Guayaquil in an area called Orquídeas. She is 45 years old and is married to Leonardo who works as an inflight attendant for the Tame airline company. He pays the household bills, but a bit of extra help never goes amiss. 

Maribel says that she enjoys working, especially in sales. She sells beauty products like cosmetics, jewelry, and perfumes from different companies such as Avon, Yanbel, Lebel, Cyzone, and Esika. As she works independently, she can choose when she works so has time to look after her children. They all attend private school.

With the loan Maribel wishes to have more working capital to buy more  cosmetics and jewelry. Her goals are to increase sales, have a more profitable business, overcome all obstacles, succeed in life, and reach her objectives.

loans.use: to buy makeup, jewelry, and perfumes

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es:
Sonia tiene 43 años, vive en compañía de sus padres y su único hijo, Fred, a quien cuida en su casa propia ubicada en la localidad de El Tambo. 
Desde que era muy niña sus padres tuvieron una tienda de comestibles, muy surtida y con mucha clientela. En ese entonces vivían en otra ciudad, cuando llegaron a Huancayo y compraron su propia casita, decidieron seguir con el mismo trabajo. Es así que hace 10 años abrieron una tienda del mismo rubro, donde venden, no solo productos de primera necesidad, si no también carnes, legumbres y bebidas de todo tipo. En este tiempo Sonia tomó la administración de la tienda, donde le va muy bien, es por ello que está pensando renovar las vitrinas para cambiar el aspecto y hacer que los clientes se sientan cómodos con el servicio.

Ella pertenece al grupo “Mujeres emprendedoras” y este es su primer crédito con MFP, donde agradece el apoyo brindado. Además de prometer ser puntual en el pago de las cuotas, pues las sus compañeras son personas responsables y solidarias.
Sonia invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de vitrinas para mostrar los productos de su tienda.
texts.en:
Sonia is 43 years old and lives with her parents and her one child, Fred. She raises him in her own house located in the community of El Tambo. Since she was very young her parents had a small, very well supplied grocery store with a lot of customers. Back then they lived in another city. When they came to Huancayo and bought their own house, they decided to continue in the same business. 

That is how, ten years ago, they opened the same type of store where, in addition to basic needs items, they sell meat, vegetables, and drinks of all kinds. It was then that Sonia took over the management of the store and it has gone very well for her. This is why she is thinking about replacing the glass cases to change the image and make the customers feel comfortable with their service. 

She belongs to the group "Mujeres Emprendadoras" and this is her first loan with MFP. She is grateful for the support she has been given. In addition, she promises to be punctual in making her payments. Her fellow members are responsible and united people. 

Sonia will invest the money requested in the purchase of glass cases to display the products in her store.

loans.use: to buy glass cases for her store.
